/install/ -> _functions_evoupgrade.php (source)

[Summary view] [Print] [Text view] 

   1  <?php
   2  /**
   3   * This file implements upgrading of DB tables
   4   *
   5   * b2evolution - {@link http://b2evolution.net/}
   6   * Released under GNU GPL License - {@link http://b2evolution.net/about/gnu-gpl-license}
   7   * @copyright (c)2003-2015 by Francois Planque - {@link http://fplanque.com/}
   8   *
   9   * @package install
  10   */
  11  if( !defined('EVO_MAIN_INIT') ) die( 'Please, do not access this page directly.' );
  12  
  13  load_funcs('_core/_param.funcs.php');
  14  
  15  
  16  /**
  17   * Create a DB version checkpoint
  18   *
  19   * This is useful when the next operation might timeout or fail!
  20   * The checkpoint will allow to restart the script and continue where it stopped
  21   *
  22   * @param string version of DB at checkpoint
  23   */
  24  function set_upgrade_checkpoint( $version )
  25  {
  26      global $DB, $script_start_time, $locale, $action;
  27  
  28      global $recreate_autogenerated_excerpts;
  29  
  30      echo "Creating DB schema version checkpoint at $version... ";
  31  
  32      if( $version < 8060 )
  33      {
  34          $query = 'UPDATE T_settings SET db_version = '.$version;
  35      }
  36      else
  37      {
  38          $query = "UPDATE T_settings
  39                                  SET set_value = '$version'
  40                                  WHERE set_name = 'db_version'";
  41      }
  42      $DB->query( $query );
  43  
  44  
  45      $elapsed_time = time() - $script_start_time;
  46  
  47      echo "OK. (Elapsed upgrade time: $elapsed_time seconds)<br />\n";
  48  
  49      // Update the progress bar status
  50      update_install_progress_bar();
  51  
  52      evo_flush();
  53  
  54      $max_exe_time = ini_get( 'max_execution_time' );
  55      if( $max_exe_time && ( $elapsed_time > ( $max_exe_time - 20 ) ) )
  56      { // Max exe time not disabled and we're recahing the end
  57          $upgrade_action = ( ( $action == 'svn_upgrade' ) || ( $action == 'auto_upgrade' ) ) ? $action : 'evoupgrade';
  58          $recreate_excerpts = $recreate_autogenerated_excerpts ? '&amp;recreate_excerpts=1' : '';
  59          echo 'We are reaching the time limit for this script. Please click <a href="index.php?locale='.$locale.'&amp;action='.$upgrade_action.$recreate_excerpts.'">continue</a>...';
  60          // Dirty temporary solution:
  61          exit(0);
  62      }
  63  }
  64  
  65  
  66  /**
  67   * @return boolean Does a given index key name exist in DB?
  68   */
  69  function db_index_exists( $table, $index_name )
  70  {
  71      global $DB;
  72  
  73      $index_name = strtolower($index_name);
  74  
  75      $DB->query('SHOW INDEX FROM '.$table);
  76      while( $row = $DB->get_row() )
  77      {
  78          if( strtolower($row->Key_name) == $index_name )
  79          {
  80              return true;
  81          }
  82      }
  83  
  84      return false;
  85  }
  86  
  87  
  88  /**
  89   * @param string Table name
  90   * @param array Column names
  91   * @return boolean Does a list of given column names exist in DB?
  92   */
  93  function db_cols_exist( $table, $col_names )
  94  {
  95      global $DB;
  96  
  97      foreach( $col_names as $k => $v )
  98          $col_names[$k] = strtolower($v);
  99  
 100      foreach( $DB->get_results('SHOW COLUMNS FROM '.$table) as $row )
 101          if( ($key = array_search(strtolower($row->Field), $col_names)) !== false )
 102              unset( $col_names[$key] );
 103  
 104      return count($col_names) == 0;
 105  }
 106  
 107  /**
 108   * Drops a column, if it exists.
 109   */
 110  function db_drop_col( $table, $col_name )
 111  {
 112      global $DB;
 113  
 114      if( ! db_col_exists($table, $col_name) )
 115          return false;
 116  
 117      $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE '.$table.' DROP COLUMN '.$col_name );
 118  }
 119  
 120  /**
 121   * Add a column, if it does not already exist.
 122   * If it exists already, a "ALTER TABLE" statement will get executed instead.
 123   *
 124   * @return boolean True if the column has been added, False if not.
 125   */
 126  function db_add_col( $table, $col_name, $col_desc )
 127  {
 128      global $DB;
 129  
 130      if( db_col_exists($table, $col_name) )
 131      { // Column exists already, make sure it's the same.
 132          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE '.$table.' MODIFY COLUMN '.$col_name.' '.$col_desc );
 133          return false;
 134      }
 135  
 136      $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE '.$table.' ADD COLUMN '.$col_name.' '.$col_desc );
 137  }
 138  
 139  
 140  /**
 141   * Add an INDEX. If another index with the same name already exists, it will
 142   * get dropped before.
 143   */
 144  function db_add_index( $table, $name, $def, $type = 'INDEX' )
 145  {
 146      global $DB;
 147      if( db_index_exists($table, $name) )
 148      {
 149          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE '.$table.' DROP INDEX '.$name );
 150      }
 151      $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE '.$table.' ADD '.$type.' '.$name.' ('.$def.')' );
 152  }
 153  
 154  
 155  /**
 156   * Check if a key item value already exists on database
 157   */
 158  function db_key_exists( $table, $field_name, $field_value )
 159  {
 160      global $DB;
 161      return $DB->get_var( '
 162          SELECT COUNT('.$field_name.')
 163          FROM '.$table.'
 164          WHERE '.$field_name.' = '.$field_value );
 165  }
 166  
 167  /**
 168   * Add a Foreign Key constraint.
 169   * If another foreign key exists between these two fields then the old FK will be deleted and a new will be created.
 170   * If the table engine is not InnoDB, then it will be changed automatically.
 171   * If the FK table contains data which would prevent foreign key creation then these records will be deleted.
 172   *
 173   * @param string foreign key table
 174   * @param string foreing key column name
 175   * @param string foreign key refrence table name
 176   * @param string reference column name in the reference table
 177   * @param string foreign key definition ( e.g. "ON DELETE CASCADE" or "ON UPDATE RESTRICT" )
 178   */
 179  function db_add_foreign_key( $table, $field_name, $reference_table, $reference_field_name, $definition )
 180  {
 181      global $DB;
 182      $table = preg_replace( $DB->dbaliases, $DB->dbreplaces, $table );
 183      $reference_table = preg_replace( $DB->dbaliases, $DB->dbreplaces, $reference_table );
 184      $foreign_key_fields = array( array(
 185              'fk_fields' => $field_name,
 186              'reference_table' => $reference_table,
 187              'reference_columns' => $reference_field_name,
 188              'fk_definition' => $definition,
 189              'create' => true, // This FK should be created if not exists
 190          ) );
 191      db_delta_foreign_keys( $foreign_key_fields, $table, true, 'add' );
 192  }
 193  
 194  /**
 195   * Drop a Foreign Key constraint.
 196   * If this foreign key not exists the function won't give error.
 197   *
 198   * @param string foreign key table
 199   * @param string foreing key column name
 200   * @param string foreign key refrence table name
 201   * @param string reference column name in the reference table
 202   */
 203  function db_drop_foreign_key( $table, $field_name, $reference_table, $reference_field_name )
 204  {
 205      global $DB;
 206      $table = preg_replace( $DB->dbaliases, $DB->dbreplaces, $table );
 207      $reference_table = preg_replace( $DB->dbaliases, $DB->dbreplaces, $reference_table );
 208      $foreign_key_fields = array( array(
 209              'fk_fields' => $field_name,
 210              'reference_table' => $reference_table,
 211              'reference_columns' => $reference_field_name,
 212              'fk_definition' => '',
 213              'create' => false, // This FK shouldn't be created if not exists
 214          ) );
 215      db_delta_foreign_keys( $foreign_key_fields, $table, true, 'drop' );
 216  }
 217  
 218  /**
 219   * Converts languages in a given table into according locales
 220   *
 221   * @param string name of the table
 222   * @param string name of the column where lang is stored
 223   * @param string name of the table's ID column
 224   */
 225  function convert_lang_to_locale( $table, $columnlang, $columnID )
 226  {
 227      global $DB, $locales, $default_locale;
 228  
 229      if( !preg_match('/[a-z]{2}-[A-Z]{2}(-.{1,14})?/', $default_locale) )
 230      { // we want a valid locale
 231          $default_locale = 'en-EU';
 232      }
 233  
 234      echo 'Converting langs to locales for '. $table. '...<br />';
 235  
 236      // query given languages in $table
 237      $query = "SELECT $columnID, $columnlang FROM $table";
 238      $languagestoconvert = array();
 239      foreach( $DB->get_results( $query, ARRAY_A ) as $row )
 240      {
 241          // remember the ID for that locale
 242          $languagestoconvert[ $row[ $columnlang ] ][] = $row[ $columnID ];
 243      }
 244  
 245      foreach( $languagestoconvert as $lkey => $lIDs)
 246      { // converting the languages we've found
 247          $converted = false;
 248          echo '&nbsp; Converting lang \''. $lkey. '\' '; // (with IDs: '. implode( ', ', $lIDs ). ').. ';
 249  
 250          if( preg_match('/[a-z]{2}-[A-Z]{2}(-.{1,14})?/', $lkey) )
 251          { // Already valid
 252              echo 'nothing to update, already valid!<br />';
 253              continue;
 254          }
 255  
 256          if( (strlen($lkey) == 2) && ( substr( $default_locale, 0, 2 ) != $lkey ) )
 257          { // we have an old two letter lang code to convert
 258              // and it doesn't match the default locale
 259              foreach( $locales as $newlkey => $v )
 260              {  // loop given locales
 261                  if( substr($newlkey, 0, 2) == strtolower($lkey) ) # TODO: check if valid/suitable
 262                  {  // if language matches, update
 263                      $converted = $DB->query( "
 264                          UPDATE $table
 265                             SET $columnlang = '$newlkey'
 266                           WHERE $columnlang = '$lkey'" );
 267                      echo 'to locale \''. $newlkey. '\'<br />';
 268                      break;
 269                  }
 270              }
 271          }
 272  
 273          if( !$converted )
 274          { // we have nothing converted yet, setting default:
 275              $DB->query( "UPDATE $table
 276                                              SET $columnlang = '$default_locale'
 277                                          WHERE $columnlang = '$lkey'" );
 278              echo 'forced to default locale \''. $default_locale. '\'<br />';
 279          }
 280      }
 281      echo "\n";
 282  }  // convert_lang_to_locale(-)
 283  
 284  
 285  /**
 286   * upgrade_b2evo_tables(-)
 287   *
 288   * @param string the action param value corresponding the current upgrade process ( evoupgrade, svn_upgrade, auto_upgrade )
 289   */
 290  function upgrade_b2evo_tables( $upgrade_action = 'evoupgrade' )
 291  {
 292      global $db_config, $tableprefix;
 293      global $baseurl, $old_db_version, $new_db_version;
 294      global $Group_Admins, $Group_Privileged, $Group_Bloggers, $Group_Users;
 295      global $locales, $locale;
 296      global $DB;
 297      global $admin_url;
 298      global $Settings, $Plugins;
 299  
 300      // used for defaults, when upgrading to 1.6
 301      global $use_fileupload, $fileupload_allowedtypes, $fileupload_maxk, $doubleCheckReferers;
 302  
 303      // new DB-delta functionality
 304      global $schema_queries, $inc_path;
 305  
 306      // used to check script time before starting to create db delta
 307      global $script_start_time;
 308  
 309      // Create an option which can be turned on if we need to regenerate the autogenerated excerpts in the end of the upgrade script
 310      global $recreate_autogenerated_excerpts;
 311      $recreate_autogenerated_excerpts = param( 'recreate_excerpts', 'boolean', 0 );
 312  
 313      // Load DB schema from modules
 314      load_db_schema();
 315  
 316      // Update the progress bar status
 317      update_install_progress_bar();
 318  
 319      load_funcs('_core/model/db/_upgrade.funcs.php');
 320  
 321      // Force MySQL strict mode:
 322      $DB->query( 'SET sql_mode = ""', 'REMOVE MySQL "strict" mode in order not to worry about missing defaults until the end of the upgrade.' );
 323  
 324      echo '<p>'.T_('Checking DB schema version...').' ';
 325      $old_db_version = get_db_version();
 326  
 327      if( empty($old_db_version) )
 328      {
 329          echo '<p><strong>OOPS! b2evolution doesn\'t seem to be installed yet.</strong></p>';
 330          return false;
 331      }
 332  
 333      echo $old_db_version, ' : ';
 334  
 335      if( $old_db_version < 8000 ) debug_die( T_('This version is too old!') );
 336      if( $old_db_version > $new_db_version ) debug_die( T_('This version is too recent! We cannot downgrade to the version you are trying to install...') );
 337      echo "OK.<br />\n";
 338  
 339      if( $old_db_version < 8010 )
 340      {
 341          echo 'Upgrading users table... ';
 342          $query = "ALTER TABLE T_users
 343                              MODIFY COLUMN user_pass CHAR(32) NOT NULL";
 344          $DB->query( $query );
 345          echo "OK.<br />\n";
 346  
 347          echo 'Upgrading blogs table... ';
 348          $query = "ALTER TABLE T_blogs
 349                              MODIFY COLUMN blog_lang VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'en_US',
 350                              MODIFY COLUMN blog_longdesc TEXT NULL DEFAULT NULL";
 351          $DB->query( $query );
 352          echo "OK.<br />\n";
 353  
 354          echo 'Upgrading categories table... ';
 355          $query = "ALTER TABLE T_categories
 356                              ADD COLUMN cat_description VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
 357                              ADD COLUMN cat_longdesc TEXT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
 358                              ADD COLUMN cat_icon VARCHAR(30) NULL DEFAULT NULL";
 359          $DB->query( $query );
 360          echo "OK.<br />\n";
 361  
 362          echo 'Upgrading posts table... ';
 363          $query = "ALTER TABLE {$tableprefix}posts
 364                              MODIFY COLUMN post_lang VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'en_US',
 365                              ADD COLUMN post_urltitle VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER post_title,
 366                              ADD COLUMN post_url VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER post_urltitle,
 367                              ADD COLUMN post_comments ENUM('disabled', 'open', 'closed') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'open' AFTER post_wordcount";
 368          $DB->query( $query );
 369          echo "OK.<br />\n";
 370  
 371          echo 'Generating wordcounts... ';
 372          load_funcs('items/model/_item.funcs.php');
 373          $query = "SELECT ID, post_content FROM {$tableprefix}posts WHERE post_wordcount IS NULL";
 374          $i = 0;
 375          foreach( $DB->get_results( $query, ARRAY_A ) as $row )
 376          {
 377              $query_update_wordcount = "UPDATE {$tableprefix}posts
 378                                                                  SET post_wordcount = " . bpost_count_words($row['post_content']) . "
 379                                                                  WHERE ID = " . $row['ID'];
 380              $DB->query($query_update_wordcount);
 381              $i++;
 382          }
 383          echo "OK. ($i rows updated)<br />\n";
 384  
 385          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '8010' );
 386      }
 387  
 388  
 389      if( $old_db_version < 8020 )
 390      {
 391          echo 'Encoding passwords... ';
 392          $query = "UPDATE T_users
 393                              SET user_pass = MD5(user_pass)";
 394          $DB->query( $query );
 395          echo "OK.<br />\n";
 396  
 397          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '8020' );
 398      }
 399  
 400  
 401      if( $old_db_version < 8030 )
 402      {
 403          echo 'Deleting unecessary logs... ';
 404          $query = "DELETE FROM T_hitlog
 405                              WHERE hit_ignore = 'badchar'";
 406          $DB->query( $query );
 407          echo "OK.<br />\n";
 408  
 409          echo 'Updating blog urls... ';
 410          $query = "SELECT blog_ID, blog_siteurl FROM T_blogs";
 411          $i = 0;
 412          foreach( $DB->get_results( $query, ARRAY_A ) as $row )
 413          {
 414              $blog_ID = $row['blog_ID'];
 415              $blog_siteurl = $row['blog_siteurl'];
 416              // echo $blog_ID.':'.$blog_siteurl;
 417              if( strpos( $blog_siteurl.'/', $baseurl ) !== 0 )
 418              { // If not found at position 0
 419                  echo ' <strong>WARNING: please check blog #', $blog_ID, ' manually.</strong><br /> ';
 420                  continue;
 421              }
 422              // crop off the baseurl:
 423              $blog_siteurl = utf8_substr( $blog_siteurl.'/', utf8_strlen($baseurl) );
 424              // echo ' -> ', $blog_siteurl,'<br />';
 425  
 426              $query_update_blog = "UPDATE T_blogs SET blog_siteurl = '$blog_siteurl' WHERE blog_ID = $blog_ID";
 427              // echo $query_update_blog, '<br />';
 428              $DB->query( $query_update_blog );
 429              $i++;
 430          }
 431          echo "OK. ($i rows updated)<br />\n";
 432  
 433          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '8030' );
 434      }
 435  
 436  
 437      if( $old_db_version < 8040 )
 438      { // upgrade to 0.8.7
 439          echo 'Creating table for Antispam Blackist... ';
 440          $query = "CREATE TABLE {$tableprefix}antispam (
 441              aspm_ID bigint(11) NOT NULL auto_increment,
 442              aspm_string varchar(80) NOT NULL,
 443              aspm_source enum( 'local','reported','central' ) NOT NULL default 'reported',
 444              PRIMARY KEY aspm_ID (aspm_ID),
 445              UNIQUE aspm_string (aspm_string)
 446          )";
 447          $DB->query( $query );
 448          echo "OK.<br />\n";
 449  
 450          echo 'Creating default blacklist entries... ';
 451          // This string contains antispam information that is obfuscated because some hosting
 452          // companies prevent uploading PHP files containing "spam" strings.
 453          // pre_dump(get_antispam_query());
 454          $query = get_antispam_query();
 455          $DB->query( $query );
 456          echo "OK.<br />\n";
 457  
 458          echo 'Upgrading Settings table... ';
 459          $query = "ALTER TABLE T_settings
 460                              ADD COLUMN last_antispam_update datetime NOT NULL default '2000-01-01 00:00:00'";
 461          $DB->query( $query );
 462          echo "OK.<br />\n";
 463  
 464          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '8040' );
 465      }
 466  
 467  
 468      if( $old_db_version < 8050 )
 469      { // upgrade to 0.8.9
 470          echo 'Upgrading blogs table... ';
 471          $query = "ALTER TABLE T_blogs
 472                              ADD COLUMN blog_allowtrackbacks tinyint(1) NOT NULL default 1,
 473                              ADD COLUMN blog_allowpingbacks tinyint(1) NOT NULL default 0,
 474                              ADD COLUMN blog_pingb2evonet tinyint(1) NOT NULL default 0,
 475                              ADD COLUMN blog_pingtechnorati tinyint(1) NOT NULL default 0,
 476                              ADD COLUMN blog_pingweblogs tinyint(1) NOT NULL default 0,
 477                              ADD COLUMN blog_pingblodotgs tinyint(1) NOT NULL default 0,
 478                              ADD COLUMN blog_disp_bloglist tinyint NOT NULL DEFAULT 1";
 479          $DB->query( $query );
 480          echo "OK.<br />\n";
 481  
 482          // Create User Groups
 483          global $Group_Admins, $Group_Privileged, $Group_Bloggers, $Group_Users;
 484          echo 'Creating table for Groups... ';
 485          $query = "CREATE TABLE T_groups (
 486              grp_ID int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment,
 487              grp_name varchar(50) NOT NULL default '',
 488              grp_perm_admin enum('none','hidden','visible') NOT NULL default 'visible',
 489              grp_perm_blogs enum('user','viewall','editall') NOT NULL default 'user',
 490              grp_perm_stats enum('none','view','edit') NOT NULL default 'none',
 491              grp_perm_spamblacklist enum('none','view','edit') NOT NULL default 'none',
 492              grp_perm_options enum('none','view','edit') NOT NULL default 'none',
 493              grp_perm_users enum('none','view','edit') NOT NULL default 'none',
 494              grp_perm_templates TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
 495              grp_perm_files enum('none','view','add','edit','all') NOT NULL default 'none',
 496              PRIMARY KEY grp_ID (grp_ID)
 497          )";
 498          $DB->query( $query );
 499          echo "OK.<br />\n";
 500  
 501          // This table needs to be created here for proper group insertion
 502          task_begin( 'Creating table for Group Settings... ' );
 503          $DB->query( "CREATE TABLE T_groups__groupsettings (
 504              gset_grp_ID INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
 505              gset_name VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,
 506              gset_value VARCHAR(255) NULL,
 507              PRIMARY KEY (gset_grp_ID, gset_name)
 508          ) ENGINE = innodb" );
 509          task_end();
 510  
 511          echo 'Creating default groups... ';
 512          $Group_Admins = new Group(); // COPY !
 513          $Group_Admins->set( 'name', 'Administrators' );
 514          $Group_Admins->set( 'perm_admin', 'visible' );
 515          $Group_Admins->set( 'perm_blogs', 'editall' );
 516          $Group_Admins->set( 'perm_stats', 'edit' );
 517          $Group_Admins->set( 'perm_spamblacklist', 'edit' );
 518          $Group_Admins->set( 'perm_files', 'all' );
 519          $Group_Admins->set( 'perm_options', 'edit' );
 520          $Group_Admins->set( 'perm_templates', 1 );
 521          $Group_Admins->set( 'perm_users', 'edit' );
 522          $Group_Admins->dbinsert();
 523  
 524          $Group_Privileged = new Group(); // COPY !
 525          $Group_Privileged->set( 'name', 'Privileged Bloggers' );
 526          $Group_Privileged->set( 'perm_admin', 'visible' );
 527          $Group_Privileged->set( 'perm_blogs', 'viewall' );
 528          $Group_Privileged->set( 'perm_stats', 'view' );
 529          $Group_Privileged->set( 'perm_spamblacklist', 'edit' );
 530          $Group_Privileged->set( 'perm_files', 'add' );
 531          $Group_Privileged->set( 'perm_options', 'view' );
 532          $Group_Privileged->set( 'perm_templates', 0 );
 533          $Group_Privileged->set( 'perm_users', 'view' );
 534          $Group_Privileged->dbinsert();
 535  
 536          $Group_Bloggers = new Group(); // COPY !
 537          $Group_Bloggers->set( 'name', 'Bloggers' );
 538          $Group_Bloggers->set( 'perm_admin', 'visible' );
 539          $Group_Bloggers->set( 'perm_blogs', 'user' );
 540          $Group_Bloggers->set( 'perm_stats', 'none' );
 541          $Group_Bloggers->set( 'perm_spamblacklist', 'view' );
 542          $Group_Bloggers->set( 'perm_files', 'view' );
 543          $Group_Bloggers->set( 'perm_options', 'none' );
 544          $Group_Bloggers->set( 'perm_templates', 0 );
 545          $Group_Bloggers->set( 'perm_users', 'none' );
 546          $Group_Bloggers->dbinsert();
 547  
 548          $Group_Users = new Group(); // COPY !
 549          $Group_Users->set( 'name', 'Basic Users' );
 550          $Group_Users->set( 'perm_admin', 'none' );
 551          $Group_Users->set( 'perm_blogs', 'user' );
 552          $Group_Users->set( 'perm_stats', 'none' );
 553          $Group_Users->set( 'perm_spamblacklist', 'none' );
 554          $Group_Users->set( 'perm_files', 'none' );
 555          $Group_Users->set( 'perm_options', 'none' );
 556          $Group_Users->set( 'perm_templates', 0 );
 557          $Group_Users->set( 'perm_users', 'none' );
 558          $Group_Users->dbinsert();
 559          echo "OK.<br />\n";
 560  
 561  
 562          echo 'Creating table for Blog-User permissions... ';
 563          $query = "CREATE TABLE T_coll_user_perms (
 564              bloguser_blog_ID int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default 0,
 565              bloguser_user_ID int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default 0,
 566              bloguser_ismember tinyint NOT NULL default 0,
 567              bloguser_perm_poststatuses set('published','deprecated','protected','private','draft') NOT NULL default '',
 568              bloguser_perm_delpost tinyint NOT NULL default 0,
 569              bloguser_perm_comments tinyint NOT NULL default 0,
 570              bloguser_perm_cats tinyint NOT NULL default 0,
 571              bloguser_perm_properties tinyint NOT NULL default 0,
 572              bloguser_perm_media_upload tinyint NOT NULL default 0,
 573              bloguser_perm_media_browse tinyint NOT NULL default 0,
 574              bloguser_perm_media_change tinyint NOT NULL default 0,
 575              PRIMARY KEY bloguser_pk (bloguser_blog_ID,bloguser_user_ID)
 576          )";
 577          $DB->query( $query );
 578          echo "OK.<br />\n";
 579          $tablegroups_isuptodate = true;
 580          $tableblogusers_isuptodate = true;
 581  
 582          echo 'Creating user blog permissions... ';
 583          // Admin: full rights for all blogs (look 'ma, doing a natural join! :>)
 584          $query = "INSERT INTO T_coll_user_perms( bloguser_blog_ID, bloguser_user_ID, bloguser_ismember,
 585                                  bloguser_perm_poststatuses, bloguser_perm_delpost, bloguser_perm_comments,
 586                                  bloguser_perm_cats, bloguser_perm_properties)
 587                              SELECT blog_ID, ID, 1, 'published,deprecated,protected,private,draft', 1, 1, 1, 1
 588                              FROM T_users, T_blogs
 589                              WHERE user_level = 10";
 590          $DB->query( $query );
 591  
 592          // Normal users: basic rights for all blogs (can't stop doing joins :P)
 593          $query = "INSERT INTO T_coll_user_perms( bloguser_blog_ID, bloguser_user_ID, bloguser_ismember,
 594                                  bloguser_perm_poststatuses, bloguser_perm_delpost, bloguser_perm_comments,
 595                                  bloguser_perm_cats, bloguser_perm_properties)
 596                              SELECT blog_ID, ID, 1, 'published,protected,private,draft', 0, 1, 0, 0
 597                              FROM T_users, T_blogs
 598                              WHERE user_level > 0 AND user_level < 10";
 599          $DB->query( $query );
 600          echo "OK.<br />\n";
 601  
 602          echo 'Upgrading users table... ';
 603          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_users
 604                                        SET dateYMDhour = \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\'
 605                                      WHERE ( dateYMDhour = \'0000-00-00 00:00:00\' OR dateYMDhour = \'2000-00-00 00:00:01\' )' );
 606          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_users
 607                              MODIFY COLUMN dateYMDhour DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\'' );
 608          $query = "ALTER TABLE T_users
 609                              ADD COLUMN user_notify tinyint(1) NOT NULL default 1,
 610                              ADD COLUMN user_grp_ID int(4) NOT NULL default 1,
 611                              MODIFY COLUMN user_idmode varchar(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'login'";
 612          $DB->query( $query );
 613  
 614          $query = "ALTER TABLE T_users
 615                              ADD KEY user_grp_ID (user_grp_ID)";
 616          $DB->query( $query );
 617          echo "OK.<br />\n";
 618  
 619          echo 'Assigning user groups... ';
 620  
 621          // Default is 1, so admins are already set.
 622  
 623          // Basic Users:
 624          $query = "UPDATE T_users
 625                              SET user_grp_ID = $Group_Users->ID
 626                              WHERE user_level = 0";
 627          $DB->query( $query );
 628  
 629          // Bloggers:
 630          $query = "UPDATE T_users
 631                              SET user_grp_ID = $Group_Bloggers->ID
 632                              WHERE user_level > 0 AND user_level < 10";
 633          $DB->query( $query );
 634  
 635          echo "OK.<br />\n";
 636  
 637          echo 'Upgrading settings table... ';
 638          $query = "ALTER TABLE T_settings
 639                              DROP COLUMN time_format,
 640                              DROP COLUMN date_format,
 641                              ADD COLUMN pref_newusers_grp_ID int unsigned DEFAULT 4 NOT NULL,
 642                              ADD COLUMN pref_newusers_level tinyint unsigned DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
 643                              ADD COLUMN pref_newusers_canregister tinyint unsigned DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL";
 644          $DB->query( $query );
 645          echo "OK.<br />\n";
 646  
 647          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '8050' );
 648      }
 649  
 650  
 651      if( $old_db_version < 8060 )
 652      { // upgrade to 0.9
 653          // Important check:
 654          $stub_list = $DB->get_col( "
 655              SELECT blog_stub
 656                FROM T_blogs
 657               GROUP BY blog_stub
 658              HAVING COUNT(*) > 1" );
 659          if( !empty($stub_list) )
 660          {
 661              echo '<div class="error"><p class="error">';
 662              printf( T_("It appears that the following blog stub names are used more than once: ['%s']" ), implode( "','", $stub_list ) );
 663              echo '</p><p>';
 664              printf( T_("I can't upgrade until you make them unique. DB field: [%s]" ), $db_config['aliases']['T_blogs'].'.blog_stub' );
 665              echo '</p></div>';
 666              return false;
 667          }
 668  
 669          // Create locales
 670          echo 'Creating table for Locales... ';
 671          $query = "CREATE TABLE T_locales (
 672                  loc_locale varchar(20) NOT NULL default '',
 673                  loc_charset varchar(15) NOT NULL default 'iso-8859-1',
 674                  loc_datefmt varchar(10) NOT NULL default 'y-m-d',
 675                  loc_timefmt varchar(10) NOT NULL default 'H:i:s',
 676                  loc_name varchar(40) NOT NULL default '',
 677                  loc_messages varchar(20) NOT NULL default '',
 678                  loc_priority tinyint(4) UNSIGNED NOT NULL default '0',
 679                  loc_enabled tinyint(4) NOT NULL default '1',
 680                  PRIMARY KEY loc_locale( loc_locale )
 681              ) COMMENT='saves available locales'";
 682          $DB->query( $query );
 683          echo "OK.<br />\n";
 684  
 685          echo 'Upgrading posts table... ';
 686          $query = "UPDATE {$tableprefix}posts
 687                              SET post_urltitle = NULL";
 688          $DB->query( $query );
 689  
 690          $query = "ALTER TABLE {$tableprefix}posts
 691                              CHANGE COLUMN post_date post_issue_date datetime NOT NULL default '1000-01-01 00:00:00',
 692                              ADD COLUMN post_mod_date datetime NOT NULL default '1000-01-01 00:00:00'
 693                                          AFTER post_issue_date,
 694                              CHANGE COLUMN post_lang post_locale varchar(20) NOT NULL default 'en-EU',
 695                              DROP COLUMN post_url,
 696                              CHANGE COLUMN post_trackbacks post_url varchar(250) NULL default NULL,
 697                              ADD COLUMN post_renderers VARCHAR(179) NOT NULL default 'default'";
 698          $DB->query( $query );
 699  
 700          $query = "ALTER TABLE {$tableprefix}posts
 701                              ADD INDEX post_issue_date( post_issue_date ),
 702                              ADD UNIQUE post_urltitle( post_urltitle )";
 703          $DB->query( $query );
 704          
 705          $query = "ALTER TABLE {$tableprefix}posts
 706                      DROP INDEX post_date";
 707          $DB->query( $query );
 708  
 709          $query = "UPDATE {$tableprefix}posts
 710                              SET post_mod_date = post_issue_date";
 711          $DB->query( $query );
 712          echo "OK.<br />\n";
 713  
 714          // convert given languages to locales
 715          convert_lang_to_locale( "{$tableprefix}posts", 'post_locale', 'ID' );
 716  
 717          echo 'Upgrading blogs table... ';
 718          $query = "ALTER TABLE T_blogs
 719                              CHANGE blog_lang blog_locale varchar(20) NOT NULL default 'en-EU',
 720                              CHANGE blog_roll blog_notes TEXT NULL,
 721                              MODIFY COLUMN blog_default_skin VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'custom',
 722                              DROP COLUMN blog_filename,
 723                              ADD COLUMN blog_access_type VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'index.php' AFTER blog_locale,
 724                              ADD COLUMN blog_force_skin tinyint(1) NOT NULL default 0 AFTER blog_default_skin,
 725                              ADD COLUMN blog_in_bloglist tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 AFTER blog_disp_bloglist,
 726                              ADD COLUMN blog_links_blog_ID INT(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
 727                              ADD UNIQUE KEY blog_stub (blog_stub)";
 728          $DB->query( $query );
 729  
 730          $query = "UPDATE T_blogs
 731                              SET blog_access_type = 'stub',
 732                                      blog_default_skin = 'custom'";
 733          $DB->query( $query );
 734  
 735          echo "OK.<br />\n";
 736  
 737          // convert given languages to locales
 738          convert_lang_to_locale( 'T_blogs', 'blog_locale', 'blog_ID' );
 739  
 740  
 741          echo 'Converting settings table... ';
 742  
 743          // get old settings
 744          $query = 'SELECT * FROM T_settings';
 745          $row = $DB->get_row( $query, ARRAY_A );
 746  
 747          #echo 'oldrow:<br />'; pre_dump($row);
 748          $transform = array(
 749              'posts_per_page' => array(5),      // note: moved to blogsettings in 2.0
 750              'what_to_show' => array('posts'),  // note: moved to blogsettings in 2.0
 751              'archive_mode' => array('monthly'),// note: moved to blogsettings in 2.0
 752              'time_difference' => array(0),
 753              'AutoBR' => array(0),
 754              'last_antispam_update' => array('2000-01-01 00:00:00', 'antispam_last_update'),
 755              'pref_newusers_grp_ID' => array($Group_Users->ID, 'newusers_grp_ID'),
 756              'pref_newusers_level'  => array(1, 'newusers_level'),
 757              'pref_newusers_canregister' => array(0, 'newusers_canregister'),
 758          );
 759  
 760          $_trans = array();
 761          foreach( $transform as $oldkey => $newarr )
 762          {
 763              $newname = ( isset($newarr[1]) ? $newarr[1] : $oldkey );
 764              if( !isset( $row[$oldkey] ) )
 765              {
 766                  echo '&nbsp;&middot;Setting '.$oldkey.' not found, using defaults.<br />';
 767                  $_trans[ $newname ] = $newarr[0];
 768              }
 769              else
 770              {
 771                  $_trans[ $newname ] = $row[$oldkey];
 772              }
 773          }
 774  
 775          // drop old table
 776          $DB->query( 'DROP TABLE IF EXISTS T_settings' );
 777  
 778          // create new table
 779          $DB->query(
 780              'CREATE TABLE T_settings (
 781                  set_name VARCHAR( 30 ) NOT NULL ,
 782                  set_value VARCHAR( 255 ) NULL ,
 783                  PRIMARY KEY ( set_name )
 784              )');
 785  
 786          // insert defaults and use transformed settings
 787          create_default_settings( $_trans );
 788  
 789          if( !isset( $tableblogusers_isuptodate ) )
 790          {
 791              echo 'Upgrading Blog-User permissions table... ';
 792              $query = "ALTER TABLE T_coll_user_perms
 793                                  ADD COLUMN bloguser_ismember tinyint NOT NULL default 0 AFTER bloguser_user_ID";
 794              $DB->query( $query );
 795  
 796              // Any row that is created holds at least one permission,
 797              // minimum permsission is to be a member, so we add that one too, to all existing rows.
 798              $DB->query( "UPDATE T_coll_user_perms
 799                                              SET bloguser_ismember = 1" );
 800              echo "OK.<br />\n";
 801          }
 802  
 803          echo 'Upgrading Comments table... ';
 804          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_comments
 805                                        SET comment_date = \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\'
 806                                      WHERE comment_date = \'0000-00-00 00:00:00\'' );
 807          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_comments
 808                              MODIFY COLUMN comment_date DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\'' );
 809          $query = "ALTER TABLE T_comments
 810                              ADD COLUMN comment_author_ID int unsigned NULL default NULL AFTER comment_status,
 811                              MODIFY COLUMN comment_author varchar(100) NULL,
 812                              MODIFY COLUMN comment_author_email varchar(100) NULL,
 813                              MODIFY COLUMN comment_author_url varchar(100) NULL,
 814                              MODIFY COLUMN comment_author_IP varchar(23) NOT NULL default ''";
 815          $DB->query( $query );
 816          echo "OK.<br />\n";
 817  
 818          echo 'Upgrading Users table... ';
 819          $query = "ALTER TABLE T_users ADD user_locale VARCHAR( 20 ) DEFAULT 'en-EU' NOT NULL AFTER user_yim";
 820          $DB->query( $query );
 821          echo "OK.<br />\n";
 822  
 823          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '8060' );
 824      }
 825  
 826  
 827      if( $old_db_version < 8062 )
 828      { // upgrade to 0.9.0.4
 829          echo "Checking for extra quote escaping in posts... ";
 830          $query = "SELECT ID, post_title, post_content
 831                                  FROM {$tableprefix}posts
 832                               WHERE post_title LIKE '%\\\\\\\\\'%'
 833                                      OR post_title LIKE '%\\\\\\\\\"%'
 834                                      OR post_content LIKE '%\\\\\\\\\'%'
 835                                      OR post_content LIKE '%\\\\\\\\\"%' ";
 836          /* FP: the above looks overkill, but MySQL is really full of surprises...
 837                          tested on 4.0.14-nt */
 838          // echo $query;
 839          $rows = $DB->get_results( $query, ARRAY_A );
 840          if( $DB->num_rows )
 841          {
 842              echo 'Updating '.$DB->num_rows.' posts... ';
 843              foreach( $rows as $row )
 844              {
 845                  // echo '<br />'.$row['post_title'];
 846                  $query = "UPDATE {$tableprefix}posts
 847                                      SET post_title = ".$DB->quote( stripslashes( $row['post_title'] ) ).",
 848                                              post_content = ".$DB->quote( stripslashes( $row['post_content'] ) )."
 849                                      WHERE ID = ".$row['ID'];
 850                  // echo '<br />'.$query;
 851                  $DB->query( $query );
 852              }
 853          }
 854          echo "OK.<br />\n";
 855  
 856          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '8062' );
 857      }
 858  
 859  
 860      if( $old_db_version < 8064 )
 861      { // upgrade to 0.9.0.6
 862          cleanup_comment_quotes();
 863  
 864          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '8064' );
 865      }
 866  
 867  
 868      if( $old_db_version < 8066 )
 869      {    // upgrade to 0.9.1
 870          echo 'Adding catpost index... ';
 871          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_postcats ADD UNIQUE catpost ( postcat_cat_ID, postcat_post_ID )' );
 872          echo "OK.<br />\n";
 873  
 874          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '8066' );
 875      }
 876  
 877  
 878      if( $old_db_version < 8800 )
 879      { // ---------------------------------- upgrade to 1.6 "phoenix ALPHA"
 880  
 881          echo 'Dropping old Hitlog table... ';
 882          $DB->query( 'DROP TABLE IF EXISTS T_hitlog' );
 883          echo "OK.<br />\n";
 884  
 885          // New tables:
 886              echo 'Creating table for active sessions... ';
 887              $DB->query( "CREATE TABLE T_sessions (
 888                                              sess_ID        INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
 889                                              sess_key       CHAR(32) NULL,
 890                                              sess_lastseen  DATETIME NOT NULL,
 891                                              sess_ipaddress VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
 892                                              sess_user_ID   INT(10) DEFAULT NULL,
 893                                              sess_agnt_ID   INT UNSIGNED NULL,
 894                                              sess_data      TEXT DEFAULT NULL,
 895                                              PRIMARY KEY( sess_ID )
 896                                          )" );
 897              echo "OK.<br />\n";
 898  
 899  
 900              echo 'Creating user settings table... ';
 901              $DB->query( "CREATE TABLE {$tableprefix}usersettings (
 902                                              uset_user_ID INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
 903                                              uset_name    VARCHAR( 30 ) NOT NULL,
 904                                              uset_value   VARCHAR( 255 ) NULL,
 905                                              PRIMARY KEY ( uset_user_ID, uset_name )
 906                                          )");
 907              echo "OK.<br />\n";
 908  
 909  
 910              echo 'Creating plugins table... ';
 911              $DB->query( "CREATE TABLE T_plugins (
 912                                              plug_ID        INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL auto_increment,
 913                                              plug_priority  INT(11) NOT NULL default 50,
 914                                              plug_classname VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL default '',
 915                                              PRIMARY KEY ( plug_ID )
 916                                          )");
 917              echo "OK.<br />\n";
 918  
 919  
 920              echo 'Creating table for Post Statuses... ';
 921              $query="CREATE TABLE {$tableprefix}poststatuses (
 922                                              pst_ID   int(11) unsigned not null AUTO_INCREMENT,
 923                                              pst_name varchar(30)      not null,
 924                                              primary key ( pst_ID )
 925                                          )";
 926              $DB->query( $query );
 927              echo "OK.<br />\n";
 928  
 929  
 930              echo 'Creating table for Post Types... ';
 931              $query="CREATE TABLE {$tableprefix}posttypes (
 932                                              ptyp_ID   int(11) unsigned not null AUTO_INCREMENT,
 933                                              ptyp_name varchar(30)      not null,
 934                                              primary key (ptyp_ID)
 935                                          )";
 936              $DB->query( $query );
 937              echo "OK.<br />\n";
 938  
 939  
 940              echo 'Creating table for File Meta Data... ';
 941              $DB->query( "CREATE TABLE T_files (
 942                                           file_ID        int(11) unsigned  not null AUTO_INCREMENT,
 943                                           file_root_type enum('absolute','user','group','collection') not null default 'absolute',
 944                                           file_root_ID   int(11) unsigned  not null default 0,
 945                                           file_path      varchar(255)      not null default '',
 946                                           file_title     varchar(255),
 947                                           file_alt       varchar(255),
 948                                           file_desc      text,
 949                                           primary key (file_ID),
 950                                           unique file (file_root_type, file_root_ID, file_path)
 951                                      )" );
 952              echo "OK.<br />\n";
 953  
 954  
 955              echo 'Creating table for base domains... ';
 956              $DB->query( "CREATE TABLE T_basedomains (
 957                                          dom_ID     INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
 958                                          dom_name   VARCHAR(250) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
 959                                          dom_status ENUM('unknown','whitelist','blacklist') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'unknown',
 960                                          dom_type   ENUM('unknown','normal','searcheng','aggregator') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'unknown',
 961                                          PRIMARY KEY (dom_ID),
 962                                          UNIQUE dom_name (dom_name)
 963                                      )" );    // fp> the unique key was only named in version 1.9. Crap. Put the name back here to save as many souls as possible. bulk has not upgraded from 0.9 yet :/
 964              echo "OK.<br />\n";
 965  
 966          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '8820' );
 967      }
 968  
 969  
 970      if( $old_db_version < 8840 )
 971      {
 972  
 973              echo 'Creating table for user agents... ';
 974              $DB->query( "CREATE TABLE {$tableprefix}useragents (
 975                                          agnt_ID        INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
 976                                          agnt_signature VARCHAR(250) NOT NULL,
 977                                          agnt_type      ENUM('rss','robot','browser','unknown') DEFAULT 'unknown' NOT NULL,
 978                                          PRIMARY KEY (agnt_ID) )" );
 979              echo "OK.<br />\n";
 980  
 981  
 982              echo 'Creating table for Hit-Logs... ';
 983              $query = "CREATE TABLE T_hitlog (
 984                                      hit_ID             INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
 985                                      hit_sess_ID        INT UNSIGNED,
 986                                      hit_datetime       DATETIME NOT NULL,
 987                                      hit_uri            VARCHAR(250) DEFAULT NULL,
 988                                      hit_referer_type   ENUM('search','blacklist','referer','direct','spam') NOT NULL,
 989                                      hit_referer        VARCHAR(250) DEFAULT NULL,
 990                                      hit_referer_dom_ID INT UNSIGNED DEFAULT NULL,
 991                                      hit_blog_ID        int(11) UNSIGNED NULL DEFAULT NULL,
 992                                      hit_remote_addr    VARCHAR(40) DEFAULT NULL,
 993                                      PRIMARY KEY (hit_ID),
 994                                      INDEX hit_datetime ( hit_datetime ),
 995                                      INDEX hit_blog_ID (hit_blog_ID)
 996                                  )";
 997              $DB->query( $query );
 998              echo "OK.<br />\n";
 999  
1000  
1001              echo 'Creating table for subscriptions... ';
1002              $DB->query( "CREATE TABLE T_subscriptions (
1003                                           sub_coll_ID     int(11) unsigned    not null,
1004                                           sub_user_ID     int(11) unsigned    not null,
1005                                           sub_items       tinyint(1)          not null,
1006                                           sub_comments    tinyint(1)          not null,
1007                                           primary key (sub_coll_ID, sub_user_ID)
1008                                          )" );
1009              echo "OK.<br />\n";
1010  
1011  
1012              echo 'Creating table for blog-group permissions... ';
1013              $DB->query( "CREATE TABLE T_coll_group_perms (
1014                                              bloggroup_blog_ID int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default 0,
1015                                              bloggroup_group_ID int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default 0,
1016                                              bloggroup_ismember tinyint NOT NULL default 0,
1017                                              bloggroup_perm_poststatuses set('published','deprecated','protected','private','draft') NOT NULL default '',
1018                                              bloggroup_perm_delpost tinyint NOT NULL default 0,
1019                                              bloggroup_perm_comments tinyint NOT NULL default 0,
1020                                              bloggroup_perm_cats tinyint NOT NULL default 0,
1021                                              bloggroup_perm_properties tinyint NOT NULL default 0,
1022                                              bloggroup_perm_media_upload tinyint NOT NULL default 0,
1023                                              bloggroup_perm_media_browse tinyint NOT NULL default 0,
1024                                              bloggroup_perm_media_change tinyint NOT NULL default 0,
1025                                              PRIMARY KEY bloggroup_pk (bloggroup_blog_ID,bloggroup_group_ID) )" );
1026              echo "OK.<br />\n";
1027  
1028  
1029          echo 'Upgrading blogs table... ';
1030          $query = "ALTER TABLE T_blogs
1031                              MODIFY COLUMN blog_ID int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment,
1032                              MODIFY COLUMN blog_links_blog_ID INT(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
1033                              CHANGE COLUMN blog_stub blog_urlname VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'urlname',
1034                              ADD COLUMN blog_allowcomments VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL default 'post_by_post' AFTER blog_keywords,
1035                              ADD COLUMN blog_allowblogcss TINYINT(1) NOT NULL default 1 AFTER blog_allowpingbacks,
1036                              ADD COLUMN blog_allowusercss TINYINT(1) NOT NULL default 1 AFTER blog_allowblogcss,
1037                              ADD COLUMN blog_stub VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'stub' AFTER blog_staticfilename,
1038                              ADD COLUMN blog_commentsexpire INT(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 AFTER blog_links_blog_ID,
1039                              ADD COLUMN blog_media_location ENUM( 'default', 'subdir', 'custom', 'none' ) DEFAULT 'default' NOT NULL AFTER blog_commentsexpire,
1040                              ADD COLUMN blog_media_subdir VARCHAR( 255 ) NOT NULL AFTER blog_media_location,
1041                              ADD COLUMN blog_media_fullpath VARCHAR( 255 ) NOT NULL AFTER blog_media_subdir,
1042                              ADD COLUMN blog_media_url VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL AFTER blog_media_fullpath";
1043          $DB->query( $query );
1044  
1045          $query = "ALTER TABLE T_blogs
1046                              ADD UNIQUE blog_urlname ( blog_urlname )";
1047          $DB->query( $query );
1048  
1049          $query = "ALTER TABLE T_blogs
1050                              DROP INDEX blog_stub";
1051          $DB->query( $query );
1052          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1053  
1054          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '8840' );
1055      }
1056  
1057  
1058      // sam2kb>fp: We need to make sure there are no values like "blog_a.php" in blog_urlname,
1059      //            after this upgrade blog URLs look like $baseurl.'blog_a.php' which might be OK in 0.x version,
1060      //            but this config will not work in b2evo 4. Blog URLs will be broken!
1061      if( $old_db_version < 8850 )
1062      {
1063          echo 'Updating relative URLs... ';
1064          // We need to move the slashes to the end:
1065          $query = "UPDATE T_blogs
1066                                   SET blog_siteurl = CONCAT( SUBSTRING(blog_siteurl,2) , '/' )
1067                               WHERE blog_siteurl LIKE '/%'";
1068          $DB->query( $query );
1069          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1070  
1071          echo 'Copying urlnames to stub names... ';
1072          $query = 'UPDATE T_blogs
1073                              SET blog_stub = blog_urlname';
1074          $DB->query( $query );
1075          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1076  
1077          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '8850' );
1078      }
1079  
1080  
1081      if( $old_db_version < 8855 )
1082      {
1083          echo 'Upgrading posts table... ';
1084          $query = "ALTER TABLE {$tableprefix}posts
1085                              DROP INDEX post_author,
1086                              DROP INDEX post_issue_date,
1087                              DROP INDEX post_category";
1088          $DB->query( $query );
1089          
1090          $query = "ALTER TABLE {$tableprefix}posts
1091                              DROP COLUMN post_karma,
1092                              DROP COLUMN post_autobr,
1093                              CHANGE COLUMN ID post_ID int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment,
1094                              CHANGE COLUMN post_author    post_creator_user_ID int(11) unsigned NOT NULL,
1095                              CHANGE COLUMN post_issue_date    post_datestart datetime NOT NULL,
1096                              CHANGE COLUMN post_mod_date    post_datemodified datetime NOT NULL,
1097                              CHANGE COLUMN post_category post_main_cat_ID int(11) unsigned NOT NULL,
1098                              ADD post_parent_ID                int(11) unsigned NULL AFTER post_ID,
1099                              ADD post_lastedit_user_ID    int(11) unsigned NULL AFTER post_creator_user_ID,
1100                              ADD post_assigned_user_ID    int(11) unsigned NULL AFTER post_lastedit_user_ID,
1101                              ADD post_datedeadline         datetime NULL AFTER post_datestart,
1102                              ADD post_datecreated            datetime NULL AFTER post_datedeadline,
1103                              ADD post_pst_ID                        int(11) unsigned NULL AFTER post_status,
1104                              ADD post_ptyp_ID                    int(11) unsigned NULL AFTER post_pst_ID,
1105                              ADD post_views                        int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 AFTER post_flags,
1106                              ADD post_commentsexpire        datetime DEFAULT NULL AFTER post_comments,
1107                              ADD post_priority                    int(11) unsigned null";
1108          $DB->query( $query );
1109  
1110          $query = "ALTER TABLE {$tableprefix}posts
1111                              ADD INDEX post_creator_user_ID( post_creator_user_ID ),
1112                              ADD INDEX post_parent_ID( post_parent_ID ),
1113                              ADD INDEX post_assigned_user_ID( post_assigned_user_ID ),
1114                              ADD INDEX post_datestart( post_datestart ),
1115                              ADD INDEX post_main_cat_ID( post_main_cat_ID ),
1116                              ADD INDEX post_ptyp_ID( post_ptyp_ID ),
1117                              ADD INDEX post_pst_ID( post_pst_ID ) ";
1118          $DB->query( $query );
1119          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1120  
1121          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '8855' );
1122      }
1123  
1124  
1125      if( $old_db_version < 8860 )
1126      {
1127          echo 'Updating post data... ';
1128          $query = "UPDATE {$tableprefix}posts
1129                              SET post_lastedit_user_ID = post_creator_user_ID,
1130                                      post_datecreated = post_datestart";
1131          $DB->query( $query );
1132          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1133  
1134  
1135          task_begin( 'Upgrading users table... ' );
1136          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_users
1137                                        SET dateYMDhour = \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\'
1138                                      WHERE dateYMDhour = \'0000-00-00 00:00:00\'' );
1139          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_users
1140                              MODIFY COLUMN dateYMDhour DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\',
1141                              CHANGE COLUMN ID user_ID int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment,
1142                              MODIFY COLUMN user_icq int(11) unsigned DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
1143                              ADD COLUMN user_showonline tinyint(1) NOT NULL default 1 AFTER user_notify' );
1144          task_end();
1145  
1146  
1147          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '8860' );
1148      }
1149  
1150  
1151      if( $old_db_version < 8900 )
1152      {
1153  
1154          echo 'Setting new defaults... ';
1155          $query = 'INSERT INTO T_settings (set_name, set_value)
1156                              VALUES
1157                                  ( "reloadpage_timeout", "300" ),
1158                                  ( "upload_enabled", "'.(isset($use_fileupload) ? (int)$use_fileupload : '1').'" ),
1159                                  ( "upload_allowedext", "'.(isset($fileupload_allowedtypes) ? $fileupload_allowedtypes : 'jpg gif png').'" ),
1160                                  ( "upload_maxkb", "'.(isset($fileupload_maxk) ? (int)$fileupload_maxk : '96').'" )
1161                              ';
1162          $DB->query( $query );
1163          // Replace "paged" mode with "posts" // note: moved to blogsettings in 2.0
1164          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_settings
1165                                          SET set_value = "posts"
1166                                      WHERE set_name = "what_to_show"
1167                                        AND set_value = "paged"' );
1168          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1169  
1170  
1171          if( !isset( $tableblogusers_isuptodate ) )
1172          {    // We have created the blogusers table before and it's already clean!
1173              echo 'Altering table for Blog-User permissions... ';
1174              $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_coll_user_perms
1175                                          MODIFY COLUMN bloguser_blog_ID int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default 0,
1176                                          MODIFY COLUMN bloguser_user_ID int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default 0,
1177                                          ADD COLUMN bloguser_perm_media_upload tinyint NOT NULL default 0,
1178                                          ADD COLUMN bloguser_perm_media_browse tinyint NOT NULL default 0,
1179                                          ADD COLUMN bloguser_perm_media_change tinyint NOT NULL default 0' );
1180              echo "OK.<br />\n";
1181          }
1182  
1183  
1184          task_begin( 'Altering comments table...' );
1185          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_comments
1186                                        SET comment_date = \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\'
1187                                      WHERE comment_date = \'0000-00-00 00:00:00\'' );
1188          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_comments
1189                                      MODIFY COLUMN comment_date DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\',
1190                                      MODIFY COLUMN comment_post_ID        int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default 0' );
1191          task_end();
1192  
1193          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '8900' );
1194      }
1195  
1196      if( $old_db_version < 9000 )
1197      {
1198          echo 'Altering Posts to Categories table... ';
1199          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_postcats
1200                                      MODIFY COLUMN postcat_post_ID int(11) unsigned NOT NULL,
1201                                      MODIFY COLUMN postcat_cat_ID int(11) unsigned NOT NULL" );
1202          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1203  
1204  
1205          echo 'Altering Categories table... ';
1206          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_categories
1207                                      MODIFY COLUMN cat_ID int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment,
1208                                      MODIFY COLUMN cat_parent_ID int(11) unsigned NULL,
1209                                      MODIFY COLUMN cat_blog_ID int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default 2" );
1210          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1211  
1212  
1213          echo 'Altering Locales table... ';
1214          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_locales
1215                                      ADD loc_startofweek TINYINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 AFTER loc_timefmt' );
1216          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1217  
1218  
1219          if( !isset( $tablegroups_isuptodate ) )
1220          {    // We have created the groups table before and it's already clean!
1221              echo 'Altering Groups table... ';
1222              $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_groups
1223                                          ADD COLUMN grp_perm_admin enum('none','hidden','visible') NOT NULL default 'visible' AFTER grp_name,
1224                                          ADD COLUMN grp_perm_files enum('none','view','add','edit') NOT NULL default 'none'" );
1225              echo "OK.<br />\n";
1226          }
1227  
1228  
1229          echo 'Creating table for Post Links... ';
1230          $DB->query( "CREATE TABLE T_links (
1231                                      link_ID               int(11) unsigned  not null AUTO_INCREMENT,
1232                                      link_datecreated      datetime          not null,
1233                                      link_datemodified     datetime          not null,
1234                                      link_creator_user_ID  int(11) unsigned  not null,
1235                                      link_lastedit_user_ID int(11) unsigned  not null,
1236                                      link_item_ID          int(11) unsigned  NOT NULL,
1237                                      link_dest_item_ID     int(11) unsigned  NULL,
1238                                      link_file_ID          int(11) unsigned  NULL,
1239                                      link_ltype_ID         int(11) unsigned  NOT NULL default 1,
1240                                      link_external_url     VARCHAR(255)      NULL,
1241                                      link_title            TEXT              NULL,
1242                                      PRIMARY KEY (link_ID),
1243                                      INDEX link_item_ID( link_item_ID ),
1244                                      INDEX link_dest_item_ID (link_dest_item_ID),
1245                                      INDEX link_file_ID (link_file_ID)
1246                                  )" );
1247          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1248  
1249  
1250          echo 'Creating default Post Types... ';
1251          $DB->query( "
1252              INSERT INTO {$tableprefix}posttypes ( ptyp_ID, ptyp_name )
1253              VALUES ( 1, 'Post' ),
1254                     ( 2, 'Link' )" );
1255          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1256  
1257  
1258          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9000' );
1259      }
1260  
1261  
1262      if( $old_db_version < 9100 )
1263      {    // 1.8 ALPHA
1264  
1265          echo 'Creating table for plugin events... ';
1266          $DB->query( '
1267              CREATE TABLE T_pluginevents(
1268                      pevt_plug_ID INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
1269                      pevt_event VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL,
1270                      pevt_enabled TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
1271                      PRIMARY KEY( pevt_plug_ID, pevt_event )
1272                  )' );
1273          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1274  
1275  
1276          echo 'Altering Links table... ';
1277          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_links
1278                       CHANGE link_item_ID link_itm_ID INT( 11 ) UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
1279                       CHANGE link_dest_item_ID link_dest_itm_ID INT( 11 ) UNSIGNED NULL' );
1280          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1281  
1282  
1283          if( $old_db_version >= 9000 )
1284          { // sess_agnt_ID used in Phoenix-Alpha
1285              echo 'Altering sessions table... ';
1286              $query = "
1287                      ALTER TABLE T_sessions
1288                       DROP COLUMN sess_agnt_ID";
1289              $DB->query( $query );
1290              echo "OK.<br />\n";
1291          }
1292  
1293          echo 'Creating table for file types... ';
1294          $DB->query( '
1295                  CREATE TABLE T_filetypes (
1296                      ftyp_ID int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment,
1297                      ftyp_extensions varchar(30) NOT NULL,
1298                      ftyp_name varchar(30) NOT NULL,
1299                      ftyp_mimetype varchar(50) NOT NULL,
1300                      ftyp_icon varchar(20) default NULL,
1301                      ftyp_viewtype varchar(10) NOT NULL,
1302                      ftyp_allowed tinyint(1) NOT NULL default 0,
1303                      PRIMARY KEY (ftyp_ID)
1304                  )' );
1305          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1306  
1307          echo 'Creating default file types... ';
1308          $DB->query( "INSERT INTO T_filetypes
1309                  (ftyp_ID, ftyp_extensions, ftyp_name, ftyp_mimetype, ftyp_icon, ftyp_viewtype, ftyp_allowed)
1310              VALUES
1311                  (1, 'gif', 'GIF image', 'image/gif', 'image2.png', 'image', 1),
1312                  (2, 'png', 'PNG image', 'image/png', 'image2.png', 'image', 1),
1313                  (3, 'jpg jpeg', 'JPEG image', 'image/jpeg', 'image2.png', 'image', 1),
1314                  (4, 'txt', 'Text file', 'text/plain', 'document.png', 'text', 1),
1315                  (5, 'htm html', 'HTML file', 'text/html', 'html.png', 'browser', 0),
1316                  (6, 'pdf', 'PDF file', 'application/pdf', 'pdf.png', 'browser', 1),
1317                  (7, 'doc', 'Microsoft Word file', 'application/msword', 'doc.gif', 'external', 1),
1318                  (8, 'xls', 'Microsoft Excel file', 'application/vnd.ms-excel', 'xls.gif', 'external', 1),
1319                  (9, 'ppt', 'Powerpoint', 'application/vnd.ms-powerpoint', 'ppt.gif', 'external', 1),
1320                  (10, 'pps', 'Slideshow', 'pps', 'pps.gif', 'external', 1),
1321                  (11, 'zip', 'ZIP archive', 'application/zip', 'zip.gif', 'external', 1),
1322                  (12, 'php php3 php4 php5 php6', 'PHP script', 'application/x-httpd-php', 'php.gif', 'text', 0),
1323                  (13, 'css', 'Style sheet', 'text/css', '', 'text', 1)
1324              " );
1325          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1326  
1327          echo 'Giving Administrator Group edit perms on files... ';
1328          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_groups
1329                       SET grp_perm_files = "edit"
1330                       WHERE grp_ID = 1' );
1331           // Later versions give 'all' on install, but we won't upgrade to that for security.
1332          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1333  
1334          echo 'Giving Administrator Group full perms on media for all blogs... ';
1335          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_coll_group_perms
1336                       SET bloggroup_perm_media_upload = 1,
1337                           bloggroup_perm_media_browse = 1,
1338                           bloggroup_perm_media_change = 1
1339                       WHERE bloggroup_group_ID = 1' );
1340          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1341  
1342  
1343          if( $old_db_version >= 9000 )
1344          { // Uninstall all ALPHA (potentially incompatible) plugins
1345              echo 'Uninstalling all existing plugins... ';
1346              $DB->query( 'DELETE FROM T_plugins WHERE 1=1' );
1347              echo "OK.<br />\n";
1348          }
1349  
1350          // NOTE: basic plugins get installed separatly for upgrade and install..
1351  
1352  
1353          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9100' );
1354      }
1355  
1356  
1357      if( $old_db_version < 9190 ) // Note: changed from 9200, to include the block below, if DB is not yet on 1.8
1358      {    // 1.8 ALPHA (block #2)
1359          echo 'Altering Posts table... ';
1360          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE {$tableprefix}posts
1361                       CHANGE post_comments post_comment_status ENUM('disabled', 'open', 'closed') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'open'" );
1362          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1363  
1364  
1365          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9190' );
1366      }
1367  
1368  
1369      if( $old_db_version < 9192 )
1370      { // 1.8 ALPHA (block #3) - The payload that db_delta() handled before
1371  
1372          // This is a fix, which broke upgrade to 1.8 (from 1.6) in MySQL strict mode (inserted after 1.8 got released!):
1373          if( $DB->get_row( 'SHOW COLUMNS FROM T_hitlog LIKE "hit_referer_type"' ) )
1374          { // a niiiiiiiice extra check :p
1375              task_begin( 'Deleting all "spam" hitlog entries... ' );
1376              $DB->query( '
1377                      DELETE FROM T_hitlog
1378                       WHERE hit_referer_type = "spam"' );
1379              task_end();
1380          }
1381  
1382          task_begin( 'Upgrading users table... ' );
1383          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_users
1384                                          CHANGE COLUMN user_firstname user_firstname varchar(50) NULL,
1385                                          CHANGE COLUMN user_lastname user_lastname varchar(50) NULL,
1386                                          CHANGE COLUMN user_nickname user_nickname varchar(50) NULL,
1387                                          CHANGE COLUMN user_icq user_icq int(11) unsigned NULL,
1388                                          CHANGE COLUMN user_email user_email varchar(255) NOT NULL,
1389                                          CHANGE COLUMN user_url user_url varchar(255) NULL,
1390                                          CHANGE COLUMN user_ip user_ip varchar(15) NULL,
1391                                          CHANGE COLUMN user_domain user_domain varchar(200) NULL,
1392                                          CHANGE COLUMN user_browser user_browser varchar(200) NULL,
1393                                          CHANGE COLUMN user_aim user_aim varchar(50) NULL,
1394                                          CHANGE COLUMN user_msn user_msn varchar(100) NULL,
1395                                          CHANGE COLUMN user_yim user_yim varchar(50) NULL,
1396                                          ADD COLUMN user_allow_msgform TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT \'1\' AFTER user_idmode,
1397                                          ADD COLUMN user_validated TINYINT(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 AFTER user_grp_ID' );
1398          task_end();
1399  
1400          task_begin( 'Creating blog settings...' );
1401          $DB->query( 'CREATE TABLE T_coll_settings (
1402                                                              cset_coll_ID INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
1403                                                              cset_name    VARCHAR( 30 ) NOT NULL,
1404                                                              cset_value   VARCHAR( 255 ) NULL,
1405                                                              PRIMARY KEY ( cset_coll_ID, cset_name )
1406                                              )' );
1407          task_end();
1408          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9192' );
1409      }
1410  
1411  
1412      if( $old_db_version < 9195 )
1413      {
1414          task_begin( 'Upgrading posts table... ' );
1415          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE '.$tableprefix.'posts
1416                                          CHANGE COLUMN post_content post_content         text NULL,
1417                                          CHANGE COLUMN post_url post_url                      VARCHAR(255) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
1418                                          CHANGE COLUMN post_renderers post_renderers     TEXT NOT NULL' );
1419          task_end();
1420  
1421          task_begin( 'Upgrading comments table... ' );
1422          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_comments
1423                                          CHANGE COLUMN comment_author_email comment_author_email varchar(255) NULL,
1424                                          CHANGE COLUMN comment_author_url comment_author_url varchar(255) NULL,
1425                                          ADD COLUMN comment_spam_karma TINYINT NULL AFTER comment_karma,
1426                                          ADD COLUMN comment_allow_msgform TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 AFTER comment_spam_karma' );
1427          task_end();
1428  
1429          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9195' );
1430      }
1431  
1432  
1433      if( $old_db_version < 9200 )
1434      {
1435          task_begin( 'Upgrading hitlog table... ' );
1436          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_hitlog
1437                                          CHANGE COLUMN hit_referer_type hit_referer_type   ENUM(\'search\',\'blacklist\',\'referer\',\'direct\') NOT NULL,
1438                                          ADD COLUMN hit_agnt_ID        INT UNSIGNED NULL AFTER hit_remote_addr' );
1439          task_end();
1440  
1441          task_begin( 'Upgrading post links table... ' );
1442          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_links
1443                                          ADD INDEX link_itm_ID( link_itm_ID ),
1444                                          ADD INDEX link_dest_itm_ID (link_dest_itm_ID)' );
1445          task_end();
1446  
1447          task_begin( 'Upgrading plugins table... ' );
1448          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_plugins
1449                                          CHANGE COLUMN plug_priority plug_priority        TINYINT NOT NULL default 50,
1450                                          ADD COLUMN plug_code            VARCHAR(32) NULL AFTER plug_classname,
1451                                          ADD COLUMN plug_apply_rendering ENUM( \'stealth\', \'always\', \'opt-out\', \'opt-in\', \'lazy\', \'never\' ) NOT NULL DEFAULT \'never\' AFTER plug_code,
1452                                          ADD COLUMN plug_version         VARCHAR(42) NOT NULL default \'0\' AFTER plug_apply_rendering,
1453                                          ADD COLUMN plug_status          ENUM( \'enabled\', \'disabled\', \'needs_config\', \'broken\' ) NOT NULL AFTER plug_version,
1454                                          ADD COLUMN plug_spam_weight     TINYINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 AFTER plug_status');
1455          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_plugins
1456                                          ADD UNIQUE plug_code( plug_code ),
1457                                          ADD INDEX plug_status( plug_status )' );
1458          task_end();
1459  
1460          task_begin( 'Creating plugin settings table... ' );
1461          $DB->query( 'CREATE TABLE T_pluginsettings (
1462                                                              pset_plug_ID INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
1463                                                              pset_name VARCHAR( 30 ) NOT NULL,
1464                                                              pset_value TEXT NULL,
1465                                                              PRIMARY KEY ( pset_plug_ID, pset_name )
1466                                              )' );
1467          task_end();
1468  
1469          task_begin( 'Creating plugin user settings table... ' );
1470          $DB->query( 'CREATE TABLE T_pluginusersettings (
1471                                                              puset_plug_ID INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
1472                                                              puset_user_ID INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
1473                                                              puset_name VARCHAR( 30 ) NOT NULL,
1474                                                              puset_value TEXT NULL,
1475                                                              PRIMARY KEY ( puset_plug_ID, puset_user_ID, puset_name )
1476                                              )' );
1477          task_end();
1478  
1479          task_begin( 'Creating scheduled tasks table... ' );
1480          $DB->query( 'CREATE TABLE T_cron__task(
1481                                                   ctsk_ID              int(10) unsigned      not null AUTO_INCREMENT,
1482                                                   ctsk_start_datetime  datetime              not null,
1483                                                   ctsk_repeat_after    int(10) unsigned,
1484                                                   ctsk_name            varchar(50)           not null,
1485                                                   ctsk_controller      varchar(50)           not null,
1486                                                   ctsk_params          text,
1487                                                   primary key (ctsk_ID)
1488                                              )' );
1489          task_end();
1490  
1491          task_begin( 'Creating cron log table... ' );
1492          $DB->query( 'CREATE TABLE T_cron__log(
1493                                                               clog_ctsk_ID              int(10) unsigned   not null,
1494                                                               clog_realstart_datetime   datetime           not null,
1495                                                               clog_realstop_datetime    datetime,
1496                                                               clog_status               enum(\'started\',\'finished\',\'error\',\'timeout\') not null default \'started\',
1497                                                               clog_messages             text,
1498                                                               primary key (clog_ctsk_ID)
1499                                              )' );
1500          task_end();
1501  
1502          task_begin( 'Upgrading blogs table... ' );
1503          // blog_allowpingbacks is "DEFAULT 1" in the 0.9.0.11 dump.. - changed in 0.9.2?!
1504          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_blogs
1505                                          ALTER COLUMN blog_allowpingbacks SET DEFAULT 0,
1506                                      CHANGE COLUMN blog_media_subdir blog_media_subdir VARCHAR( 255 ) NULL,
1507                                          CHANGE COLUMN blog_media_fullpath blog_media_fullpath VARCHAR( 255 ) NULL,
1508                                          CHANGE COLUMN blog_media_url blog_media_url VARCHAR( 255 ) NULL' );
1509          task_end();
1510  
1511  
1512          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9200' ); // at 1.8 "Summer Beta" release
1513      }
1514  
1515  
1516      // ____________________________ 1.9: ____________________________
1517  
1518      if( $old_db_version < 9290 )
1519      {
1520          echo 'Post-fix hit_referer_type == NULL... ';
1521          // If you've upgraded from 1.6 to 1.8 and it did not break because of strict mode, there are now NULL values for what "spam" was:
1522          $DB->query( '
1523                      DELETE FROM T_hitlog
1524                       WHERE hit_referer_type IS NULL' );
1525          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1526  
1527          echo 'Marking administrator accounts as validated... ';
1528          $DB->query( '
