1529                  UPDATE T_users
1530                     SET user_validated = 1
1531                   WHERE user_grp_ID = 1' );
1532          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1533  
1534          echo 'Converting auto_prune_stats setting... ';
1535          $old_auto_prune_stats = $DB->get_var( '
1536                  SELECT set_value
1537                    FROM T_settings
1538                   WHERE set_name = "auto_prune_stats"' );
1539          if( ! is_null($old_auto_prune_stats) && $old_auto_prune_stats < 1 )
1540          { // This means it has been disabled before, so set auto_prune_stats_mode to "off"!
1541              $DB->query( '
1542                      REPLACE INTO T_settings ( set_name, set_value )
1543                       VALUES ( "auto_prune_stats_mode", "off" )' );
1544          }
1545          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1546  
1547          echo 'Converting time_difference from hours to seconds... ';
1548          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_settings SET set_value = set_value*3600 WHERE set_name = "time_difference"' );
1549          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1550  
1551  
1552          echo 'Updating hitlog capabilities... ';
1553          $DB->query( '
1554                  ALTER TABLE '.$tableprefix.'useragents ADD INDEX agnt_type ( agnt_type )' );
1555          $DB->query( '
1556                  ALTER TABLE T_hitlog
1557                    CHANGE COLUMN hit_referer_type hit_referer_type ENUM(\'search\',\'blacklist\',\'referer\',\'direct\',\'self\',\'admin\') NOT NULL' );
1558          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1559  
1560          echo 'Updating plugin capabilities... ';
1561          $DB->query( '
1562                  ALTER TABLE T_plugins
1563                      MODIFY COLUMN plug_status ENUM( \'enabled\', \'disabled\', \'needs_config\', \'broken\' ) NOT NULL' );
1564          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1565  
1566          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9290' );
1567      }
1568  
1569  
1570      if( $old_db_version < 9300 )
1571      {
1572          // This can be so long, it needs its own checkpoint protected block in case of failure
1573          echo 'Updating hitlog indexes... ';
1574          $DB->query( '
1575                  ALTER TABLE T_hitlog
1576                    ADD INDEX hit_agnt_ID        ( hit_agnt_ID ),
1577                    ADD INDEX hit_uri            ( hit_uri ),
1578                    ADD INDEX hit_referer_dom_ID ( hit_referer_dom_ID )
1579                  ' );
1580          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1581  
1582          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9300' );
1583      }
1584  
1585  
1586      if( $old_db_version < 9310 )
1587      {
1588          echo 'Updating basedomains... ';
1589          $DB->query( '
1590                  UPDATE T_basedomains
1591                     SET dom_status = "unknown"' );        // someone has filled this up with junk blacklists before
1592          $DB->query( '
1593                  ALTER TABLE T_basedomains  ADD INDEX dom_type (dom_type)' );
1594          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1595  
1596          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9310' );
1597      }
1598  
1599  
1600      if( $old_db_version < 9315 )
1601      {
1602          echo 'Altering locales table... ';
1603          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_locales CHANGE COLUMN loc_datefmt loc_datefmt varchar(20) NOT NULL default 'y-m-d'" );
1604          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_locales CHANGE COLUMN loc_timefmt loc_timefmt varchar(20) NOT NULL default 'H:i:s'" );
1605          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1606  
1607          echo 'Creating item prerendering cache table... ';
1608          $DB->query( "
1609                  CREATE TABLE {$tableprefix}item__prerendering(
1610                      itpr_itm_ID                   INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
1611                      itpr_format                   ENUM('htmlbody', 'entityencoded', 'xml', 'text') NOT NULL,
1612                      itpr_renderers                TEXT NOT NULL,
1613                      itpr_content_prerendered      TEXT NULL,
1614                      itpr_datemodified             TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
1615                      PRIMARY KEY (itpr_itm_ID, itpr_format)
1616                  )" );
1617          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1618  
1619          echo 'Altering plugins table... ';
1620          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_plugins ADD COLUMN plug_name            VARCHAR(255) NULL default NULL AFTER plug_version" );
1621          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_plugins ADD COLUMN plug_shortdesc       VARCHAR(255) NULL default NULL AFTER plug_name" );
1622          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1623  
1624          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9315' );
1625      }
1626  
1627  
1628      if( $old_db_version < 9320 )
1629      { // Dropping hit_datetime because it's very slow on INSERT (dh)
1630          // This can be so long, it needs its own checkpoint protected block in case of failure
1631          if( db_index_exists( 'T_hitlog', 'hit_datetime' ) )
1632          { // only drop, if it still exists (may have been removed manually)
1633              echo 'Updating hitlog indexes... ';
1634              $DB->query( '
1635                      ALTER TABLE T_hitlog
1636                          DROP INDEX hit_datetime
1637                      ' );
1638              echo "OK.<br />\n";
1639          }
1640  
1641          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9320' );
1642      }
1643  
1644  
1645      if( $old_db_version < 9326 )
1646      {
1647          echo 'Removing obsolete settings... ';
1648          $DB->query( 'DELETE FROM T_settings WHERE set_name = "upload_allowedext"' );
1649          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1650  
1651          echo 'Updating blogs... ';
1652          db_drop_col( 'T_blogs', 'blog_allowpingbacks' );
1653  
1654          // Remove and transform obsolete fields blog_pingb2evonet, blog_pingtechnorati, blog_pingweblogs, blog_pingblodotgs
1655          if( db_cols_exist( 'T_blogs', array('blog_pingb2evonet', 'blog_pingtechnorati', 'blog_pingweblogs', 'blog_pingblodotgs') ) )
1656          {
1657              foreach( $DB->get_results( '
1658                      SELECT blog_ID, blog_pingb2evonet, blog_pingtechnorati, blog_pingweblogs, blog_pingblodotgs
1659                          FROM T_blogs' ) as $row )
1660              {
1661                  $ping_plugins = $DB->get_var( 'SELECT cset_value FROM T_coll_settings WHERE cset_coll_ID = '.$row->blog_ID.' AND cset_name = "ping_plugins"' );
1662                  $ping_plugins = explode(',', $ping_plugins);
1663                  if( $row->blog_pingb2evonet )
1664                  {
1665                      $ping_plugins[] = 'ping_b2evonet';
1666                  }
1667                  if( $row->blog_pingtechnorati || $row->blog_pingweblogs || $row->blog_pingblodotgs )
1668                  { // if either one of the previous pingers was enabled, add ping-o-matic:
1669                      $ping_plugins[] = 'ping_pingomatic';
1670                  }
1671  
1672                  // Insert transformed/generated ping plugins collection setting:
1673                  $ping_plugins = array_unique($ping_plugins);
1674                  $DB->query( 'REPLACE INTO T_coll_settings
1675                          ( cset_coll_ID, cset_name, cset_value )
1676                          VALUES ( '.$row->blog_ID.', "ping_plugins", "'.implode( ',', $ping_plugins ).'" )' );
1677              }
1678              $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_blogs
1679                      DROP COLUMN blog_pingb2evonet,
1680                      DROP COLUMN blog_pingtechnorati,
1681                      DROP COLUMN blog_pingweblogs,
1682                      DROP COLUMN blog_pingblodotgs' );
1683          }
1684          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1685  
1686  
1687          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9326' );
1688      }
1689  
1690  
1691      if( $old_db_version < 9328 )
1692      {
1693          echo 'Updating posts... ';
1694          db_add_col( "{$tableprefix}posts", 'post_notifications_status',  'ENUM("noreq","todo","started","finished") NOT NULL DEFAULT "noreq" AFTER post_flags' );
1695          db_add_col( "{$tableprefix}posts", 'post_notifications_ctsk_ID', 'INT(10) unsigned NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER post_notifications_status' );
1696          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1697          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9328' );
1698      }
1699  
1700  
1701      if( $old_db_version < 9330 )
1702      {
1703          if( db_col_exists( "{$tableprefix}posts", 'post_flags') )
1704          {
1705              echo 'Updating post notifications... ';
1706              $DB->query( "
1707                  UPDATE {$tableprefix}posts
1708                       SET post_notifications_status = 'finished'
1709                   WHERE post_flags LIKE '%pingsdone%'" );
1710              db_drop_col( "{$tableprefix}posts", 'post_flags' );
1711              echo "OK.<br />\n";
1712          }
1713          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9330' );
1714      }
1715  
1716  
1717      if( $old_db_version < 9340 )
1718      {
1719          echo 'Removing duplicate post link indexes... ';
1720          if( db_index_exists( 'T_links', 'link_item_ID' ) )
1721          { // only drop, if it still exists (may have been removed manually)
1722              $DB->query( '
1723                      ALTER TABLE T_links
1724                          DROP INDEX link_item_ID
1725                      ' );
1726          }
1727          if( db_index_exists( 'T_links', 'link_dest_item_ID' ) )
1728          { // only drop, if it still exists (may have been removed manually)
1729              $DB->query( '
1730                      ALTER TABLE T_links
1731                          DROP INDEX link_dest_item_ID
1732                      ' );
1733          }
1734          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1735  
1736          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9340' );
1737      }
1738  
1739      // ____________________________ 1.10: ____________________________
1740  
1741      if( $old_db_version < 9345 )
1742      {
1743          echo 'Updating post table... ';
1744          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE {$tableprefix}posts CHANGE COLUMN post_content post_content MEDIUMTEXT NULL" );
1745          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1746          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9345' );
1747      }
1748  
1749      if( $old_db_version < 9346 )
1750      {
1751          echo 'Updating prerendering table... ';
1752          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE {$tableprefix}item__prerendering CHANGE COLUMN itpr_content_prerendered itpr_content_prerendered MEDIUMTEXT NULL" );
1753          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1754          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9346' );
1755      }
1756  
1757      if( $old_db_version < 9348 )
1758      {
1759          echo 'Updating sessions table... ';
1760          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_sessions CHANGE COLUMN sess_data sess_data MEDIUMBLOB DEFAULT NULL' );
1761          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1762          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9348' );
1763      }
1764  
1765      if( $old_db_version < 9350 )
1766      {
1767          echo 'Updating hitlog table... ';
1768          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_hitlog CHANGE COLUMN hit_referer_type hit_referer_type   ENUM(\'search\',\'blacklist\',\'spam\',\'referer\',\'direct\',\'self\',\'admin\') NOT NULL' );
1769          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1770  
1771          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9350' );
1772      }
1773  
1774  
1775      // TODO: "If a user has permission to edit a blog, he should be able to put files in the media folder for that blog." - see http://forums.b2evolution.net/viewtopic.php?p=36417#36417
1776      /*
1777      // blueyed>> I've came up with the following, but it's too generic IMHO
1778      if( $old_db_version < 9300 )
1779      {
1780          echo 'Setting automatic media perms on blogs (members can upload)... ';
1781          $users = $DB->query( '
1782                  UPDATE T_users
1783                     SET bloguser_perm_media_upload = 1
1784                   WHERE bloguser_ismember = 1' );
1785          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1786      }
1787      */
1788  
1789  
1790      // ____________________________ 2.0: ____________________________
1791  
1792      if( $old_db_version < 9406 )
1793      {
1794          echo 'Updating chapter url names... ';
1795          $DB->query( '
1796              ALTER TABLE T_categories
1797                  ADD COLUMN cat_urlname VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL' );
1798  
1799          // Create cat_urlname from cat_name:
1800          // TODO: Also use it for cafelog upgrade.
1801          load_funcs('locales/_charset.funcs.php');
1802          foreach( $DB->get_results('SELECT cat_ID, cat_name FROM T_categories') as $cat )
1803          {
1804              $cat_name = trim($cat->cat_name);
1805              if( strlen($cat_name) )
1806              {
1807                  // TODO: dh> pass locale (useful for transliteration). From main blog?
1808                  $cat_urlname = urltitle_validate('', $cat_name, $cat->cat_ID, false, 'cat_urlname', 'cat_ID', 'T_categories');
1809              }
1810              else
1811              {
1812                  $cat_urlname = 'c'.$cat->cat_ID;
1813              }
1814  
1815              $DB->query( '
1816                  UPDATE T_categories
1817                       SET cat_urlname = '.$DB->quote($cat_urlname).'
1818                   WHERE cat_ID = '.$cat->cat_ID );
1819          }
1820  
1821          $DB->query( '
1822              ALTER TABLE T_categories
1823                  ADD UNIQUE cat_urlname ( cat_urlname )' );
1824          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1825  
1826          echo 'Updating Settings... ';
1827          $DB->query( '
1828        UPDATE T_settings
1829           SET set_value = "disabled"
1830         WHERE set_name = "links_extrapath"
1831           AND set_value = 0' );
1832          $DB->query( '
1833        UPDATE T_settings
1834           SET set_value = "ymd"
1835         WHERE set_name = "links_extrapath"
1836           AND set_value <> 0' );
1837          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1838  
1839          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9406' );
1840      }
1841  
1842  
1843      if( $old_db_version < 9407 )
1844      {
1845          echo 'Moving general settings to blog settings... ';
1846          $DB->query( 'REPLACE INTO T_coll_settings( cset_coll_ID, cset_name, cset_value )
1847                       SELECT blog_ID, set_name, set_value
1848                                       FROM T_blogs, T_settings
1849                                      WHERE set_name = "posts_per_page"
1850                                         OR set_name = "what_to_show"
1851                                         OR set_name = "archive_mode"' );
1852          $DB->query( 'DELETE FROM T_settings
1853                                      WHERE set_name = "posts_per_page"
1854                                         OR set_name = "what_to_show"
1855                                         OR set_name = "archive_mode"' );
1856          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1857  
1858          echo 'Upgrading blogs table... ';
1859          $query = "ALTER TABLE T_blogs
1860                              DROP COLUMN blog_force_skin";
1861          $DB->query( $query );
1862          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1863  
1864          echo 'Upgrading groups table... ';
1865          $query = "ALTER TABLE T_groups
1866                              CHANGE COLUMN grp_perm_files grp_perm_files enum('none','view','add','edit','all') NOT NULL default 'none'";
1867          $DB->query( $query );
1868          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1869  
1870          echo 'Upgrading files table... ';
1871          $query = "ALTER TABLE T_files
1872                              CHANGE COLUMN file_root_type file_root_type enum('absolute','user','group','collection','skins') not null default 'absolute'";
1873          $DB->query( $query );
1874          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1875  
1876          echo 'Updating file types... ';
1877          // Only change this if it's close enough to a default install (non customized)
1878          $DB->query( "UPDATE T_filetypes
1879                                          SET ftyp_viewtype = 'text'
1880                                      WHERE ftyp_ID = 12
1881                                          AND ftyp_extensions = 'php php3 php4 php5 php6'
1882                                          AND ftyp_mimetype ='application/x-httpd-php'
1883                                          AND ftyp_icon = 'php.gif'" );
1884          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1885  
1886          echo 'Remove obsolete user settings... ';
1887          $DB->query( 'DELETE FROM '.$tableprefix.'usersettings
1888                                      WHERE uset_name = "plugins_disp_avail"' );
1889          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1890  
1891          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9407' );
1892      }
1893  
1894  
1895      if( $old_db_version < 9408 )
1896      {
1897          echo 'Creating skins table... ';
1898          $DB->query( 'CREATE TABLE T_skins__skin (
1899                skin_ID      int(10) unsigned      NOT NULL auto_increment,
1900                skin_name    varchar(32)           NOT NULL,
1901                skin_type    enum(\'normal\',\'feed\') NOT NULL default \'normal\',
1902                skin_folder  varchar(32)           NOT NULL,
1903                PRIMARY KEY skin_ID (skin_ID),
1904                UNIQUE skin_folder( skin_folder ),
1905                KEY skin_name( skin_name )
1906              )' );
1907          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1908  
1909          echo 'Creating skin containers table... ';
1910          $DB->query( 'CREATE TABLE T_skins__container (
1911                sco_skin_ID   int(10) unsigned      NOT NULL,
1912                sco_name      varchar(40)           NOT NULL,
1913                PRIMARY KEY (sco_skin_ID, sco_name)
1914              )' );
1915          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1916  
1917          echo 'Creating widgets table... ';
1918          $DB->query( 'CREATE TABLE T_widget (
1919                           wi_ID                    INT(10) UNSIGNED auto_increment,
1920                          wi_coll_ID    INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
1921                          wi_sco_name   VARCHAR( 40 ) NOT NULL,
1922                          wi_order            INT(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
1923                          wi_type       ENUM( \'core\', \'plugin\' ) NOT NULL DEFAULT \'core\',
1924                          wi_code       VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL,
1925                          wi_params     TEXT NULL,
1926                          PRIMARY KEY ( wi_ID ),
1927                          UNIQUE wi_order( wi_coll_ID, wi_sco_name, wi_order )
1928            )' );
1929          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1930  
1931          install_basic_skins( false );
1932  
1933          echo 'Updating blogs table... ';
1934          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_blogs
1935                                   ALTER COLUMN blog_allowtrackbacks SET DEFAULT 0,
1936                                      DROP COLUMN blog_default_skin,
1937                                       ADD COLUMN blog_owner_user_ID   int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default 1 AFTER blog_name,
1938                                       ADD COLUMN blog_skin_ID INT(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 AFTER blog_allowusercss' );
1939          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1940  
1941  
1942          install_basic_widgets( $old_db_version );
1943  
1944          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9408' );
1945      }
1946  
1947  
1948      if( $old_db_version < 9409 )
1949      {
1950          // Upgrade the blog access types:
1951          echo 'Updating blogs access types... ';
1952          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_blogs
1953                                          SET blog_access_type = "absolute"
1954                                      WHERE blog_siteurl LIKE "http://%"
1955                                         OR blog_siteurl LIKE "https://%"' );
1956  
1957          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_blogs
1958                                          SET blog_access_type = "relative",
1959                                                  blog_siteurl = CONCAT( blog_siteurl, blog_stub )
1960                                      WHERE blog_access_type = "stub"' );
1961  
1962          db_drop_col( 'T_blogs', 'blog_stub' );
1963  
1964          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1965  
1966  
1967           echo 'Updating columns... ';
1968          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_groups CHANGE COLUMN grp_perm_stats grp_perm_stats enum('none','user','view','edit') NOT NULL default 'none'" );
1969  
1970          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_coll_user_perms CHANGE COLUMN bloguser_perm_poststatuses bloguser_perm_poststatuses set('published','deprecated','protected','private','draft','redirected') NOT NULL default ''" );
1971  
1972          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_coll_group_perms CHANGE COLUMN bloggroup_perm_poststatuses bloggroup_perm_poststatuses set('published','deprecated','protected','private','draft','redirected') NOT NULL default ''" );
1973  
1974          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE {$tableprefix}posts CHANGE COLUMN post_status post_status enum('published','deprecated','protected','private','draft','redirected') NOT NULL default 'published'" );
1975          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1976  
1977          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9409' );
1978      }
1979  
1980  
1981      if( $old_db_version < 9410 )
1982      {
1983           echo 'Updating columns... ';
1984          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_comments CHANGE COLUMN comment_status comment_status ENUM('published','deprecated','protected','private','draft','redirected') DEFAULT 'published' NOT NULL" );
1985  
1986          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_sessions CHANGE COLUMN sess_data sess_data MEDIUMBLOB DEFAULT NULL" );
1987  
1988          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_hitlog CHANGE COLUMN hit_referer_type hit_referer_type ENUM('search','blacklist','spam','referer','direct','self','admin') NOT NULL" );
1989  
1990          echo "OK.<br />\n";
1991  
1992          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9410' );
1993      }
1994  
1995  
1996      if( $old_db_version < 9411 )
1997      {
1998          echo 'Adding default Post Types... ';
1999          $DB->query( "
2000              REPLACE INTO {$tableprefix}posttypes ( ptyp_ID, ptyp_name )
2001              VALUES ( 1000, 'Page' ),
2002                           ( 2000, 'Reserved' ),
2003                           ( 3000, 'Reserved' ),
2004                           ( 4000, 'Reserved' ),
2005                           ( 5000, 'Reserved' ) " );
2006          echo "OK.<br />\n";
2007          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9411' );
2008      }
2009  
2010  
2011      if( $old_db_version < 9412 )
2012      {
2013          echo 'Adding field for post excerpts... ';
2014          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE {$tableprefix}posts ADD COLUMN post_excerpt  text NULL AFTER post_content" );
2015          echo "OK.<br />\n";
2016          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9412' );
2017      }
2018  
2019      if( $old_db_version < 9414 )
2020      {
2021          echo "Renaming tables...";
2022          $DB->query( "RENAME TABLE {$tableprefix}item__prerendering TO T_items__prerendering" );
2023          $DB->query( "RENAME TABLE {$tableprefix}poststatuses TO T_items__status" );
2024          $DB->query( "RENAME TABLE {$tableprefix}posttypes TO T_items__type" );
2025          $DB->query( "RENAME TABLE {$tableprefix}posts TO T_items__item" );
2026          echo "OK.<br />\n";
2027  
2028          echo "Creating Tag tables...";
2029          $DB->query( "CREATE TABLE T_items__tag (
2030                tag_ID   int(11) unsigned not null AUTO_INCREMENT,
2031                tag_name varchar(50) not null,
2032                primary key (tag_ID),
2033                UNIQUE tag_name( tag_name )
2034              )" );
2035  
2036          $DB->query( "CREATE TABLE T_items__itemtag (
2037                itag_itm_ID int(11) unsigned NOT NULL,
2038                itag_tag_ID int(11) unsigned NOT NULL,
2039                PRIMARY KEY (itag_itm_ID, itag_tag_ID),
2040                UNIQUE tagitem ( itag_tag_ID, itag_itm_ID )
2041              )" );
2042          echo "OK.<br />\n";
2043  
2044          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9414' );
2045      }
2046  
2047  
2048      if( $old_db_version < 9416 )
2049      {
2050          echo "Updating blogs table...";
2051          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_blogs
2052                                      ADD COLUMN blog_advanced_perms  TINYINT(1) NOT NULL default 0 AFTER blog_owner_user_ID,
2053                                      DROP COLUMN blog_staticfilename" );
2054          $DB->query( "UPDATE T_blogs
2055                                        SET blog_advanced_perms = 1" );
2056          echo "OK.<br />\n";
2057  
2058          echo "Additionnal blog permissions...";
2059          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_coll_user_perms
2060                                      ADD COLUMN bloguser_perm_admin tinyint NOT NULL default 0 AFTER bloguser_perm_properties,
2061                                      ADD COLUMN bloguser_perm_edit  ENUM('no','own','lt','le','all','redirected') NOT NULL default 'no' AFTER bloguser_perm_poststatuses" );
2062  
2063          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_coll_group_perms
2064                                      ADD COLUMN bloggroup_perm_admin tinyint NOT NULL default 0 AFTER bloggroup_perm_properties,
2065                                      ADD COLUMN bloggroup_perm_edit  ENUM('no','own','lt','le','all','redirected') NOT NULL default 'no' AFTER bloggroup_perm_poststatuses" );
2066  
2067          // Preserve full admin perms:
2068          $DB->query( "UPDATE T_coll_user_perms
2069                                          SET bloguser_perm_admin = 1
2070                                      WHERE bloguser_perm_properties <> 0" );
2071          $DB->query( "UPDATE T_coll_group_perms
2072                                          SET bloggroup_perm_admin = 1
2073                                      WHERE bloggroup_perm_properties <> 0" );
2074  
2075          // Preserve full edit perms:
2076          $DB->query( "UPDATE T_coll_user_perms
2077                                          SET bloguser_perm_edit = 'all'" );
2078          $DB->query( "UPDATE T_coll_group_perms
2079                                          SET bloggroup_perm_edit = 'all'" );
2080  
2081          echo "OK.<br />\n";
2082  
2083          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9416' );
2084      }
2085  
2086  
2087      if( $old_db_version < 9500 )
2088      {
2089          task_begin( 'Normalizing columns...' );
2090          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_blogs
2091                                          ALTER COLUMN blog_shortname SET DEFAULT \'\',
2092                                          ALTER COLUMN blog_tagline SET DEFAULT \'\',
2093                                          CHANGE COLUMN blog_description blog_description     varchar(250) NULL default \'\',
2094                                          ALTER COLUMN blog_siteurl SET DEFAULT \'\'' );
2095          task_end();
2096  
2097          task_begin( 'Normalizing dates...' );
2098          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_users
2099                                          SET dateYMDhour = \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\'
2100                                      WHERE dateYMDhour = \'0000-00-00 00:00:00\'' );
2101          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_users
2102                                      MODIFY COLUMN dateYMDhour DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\'' );
2103          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_comments
2104                                          SET comment_date = \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\'
2105                                      WHERE comment_date = \'0000-00-00 00:00:00\'' );
2106          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_comments
2107                                      MODIFY COLUMN comment_date DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\'' );
2108          task_end();
2109  
2110          task_begin( 'Normalizing cron jobs...' );
2111          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_cron__task
2112                                          SET ctsk_controller = REPLACE(ctsk_controller, "cron/_", "cron/jobs/_" )
2113                                      WHERE ctsk_controller LIKE "cron/_%"' );
2114          task_end();
2115  
2116          task_begin( 'Extending comments table...' );
2117          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_comments
2118                                      ADD COLUMN comment_rating     TINYINT(1) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER comment_content,
2119                                      ADD COLUMN comment_featured   TINYINT(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 AFTER comment_rating,
2120                                      ADD COLUMN comment_nofollow   TINYINT(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 AFTER comment_featured;');
2121          task_end();
2122  
2123          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9500' );
2124      }
2125  
2126  
2127      if( $old_db_version < 9600 )
2128      {    // 2.2.0
2129          task_begin( 'Creating global cache table...' );
2130          $DB->query( 'CREATE TABLE T_global__cache (
2131                                    cach_name VARCHAR( 30 ) NOT NULL ,
2132                                    cach_cache MEDIUMBLOB NULL ,
2133                                    PRIMARY KEY ( cach_name )
2134                                  )' );
2135          task_end();
2136  
2137          task_begin( 'Altering posts table...' );
2138          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_items__item
2139                                          MODIFY COLUMN post_datestart DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\',
2140                                          MODIFY COLUMN post_datemodified DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\',
2141                                          ADD COLUMN post_order    float NULL AFTER post_priority,
2142                                          ADD COLUMN post_featured tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 AFTER post_order');
2143          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_items__item
2144                                          ADD INDEX post_order( post_order )' );
2145          task_end();
2146  
2147          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9600' );
2148      }
2149  
2150  
2151      if( $old_db_version < 9700 )
2152      {    // 2.3.2
2153        echo 'Creating PodCast Post Type... ';
2154          $DB->query( "
2155              REPLACE INTO T_items__type ( ptyp_ID, ptyp_name )
2156              VALUES ( 2000, 'Podcast' )" );
2157          echo "OK.<br />\n";
2158  
2159          // 2.4.0
2160        echo 'Adding additional group permissions... ';
2161          $DB->query( "
2162            ALTER TABLE T_groups
2163                      ADD COLUMN grp_perm_bypass_antispam         TINYINT(1)  NOT NULL DEFAULT 0        AFTER grp_perm_blogs,
2164                      ADD COLUMN grp_perm_xhtmlvalidation         VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL default 'always' AFTER grp_perm_bypass_antispam,
2165                      ADD COLUMN grp_perm_xhtmlvalidation_xmlrpc  VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL default 'always' AFTER grp_perm_xhtmlvalidation,
2166                      ADD COLUMN grp_perm_xhtml_css_tweaks        TINYINT(1)  NOT NULL DEFAULT 0        AFTER grp_perm_xhtmlvalidation_xmlrpc,
2167                ADD COLUMN grp_perm_xhtml_iframes           TINYINT(1)  NOT NULL DEFAULT 0        AFTER grp_perm_xhtml_css_tweaks,
2168                ADD COLUMN grp_perm_xhtml_javascript        TINYINT(1)  NOT NULL DEFAULT 0        AFTER grp_perm_xhtml_iframes,
2169                      ADD COLUMN grp_perm_xhtml_objects           TINYINT(1)  NOT NULL DEFAULT 0        AFTER grp_perm_xhtml_javascript " );
2170          echo "OK.<br />\n";
2171  
2172          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9700' );
2173      }
2174  
2175  
2176      if( $old_db_version < 9800 )
2177      {    // 2.5.0
2178          echo 'Upgrading blogs table... ';
2179          db_drop_col( 'T_blogs', 'blog_commentsexpire' );
2180          echo "OK.<br />\n";
2181  
2182          echo 'Upgrading items table... ';
2183          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_items__item
2184              CHANGE COLUMN post_urltitle post_urltitle VARCHAR(210) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
2185              CHANGE COLUMN post_order    post_order DOUBLE NULL,
2186              ADD COLUMN post_titletag  VARCHAR(255) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER post_urltitle,
2187              ADD COLUMN post_double1   DOUBLE NULL COMMENT 'Custom double value 1' AFTER post_priority,
2188              ADD COLUMN post_double2   DOUBLE NULL COMMENT 'Custom double value 2' AFTER post_double1,
2189              ADD COLUMN post_double3   DOUBLE NULL COMMENT 'Custom double value 3' AFTER post_double2,
2190              ADD COLUMN post_double4   DOUBLE NULL COMMENT 'Custom double value 4' AFTER post_double3,
2191              ADD COLUMN post_double5   DOUBLE NULL COMMENT 'Custom double value 5' AFTER post_double4,
2192              ADD COLUMN post_varchar1  VARCHAR(255) NULL COMMENT 'Custom varchar value 1' AFTER post_double5,
2193              ADD COLUMN post_varchar2  VARCHAR(255) NULL COMMENT 'Custom varchar value 2' AFTER post_varchar1,
2194              ADD COLUMN post_varchar3  VARCHAR(255) NULL COMMENT 'Custom varchar value 3' AFTER post_varchar2" );
2195          echo "OK.<br />\n";
2196  
2197          echo 'Creating keyphrase table... ';
2198          $query = "CREATE TABLE T_track__keyphrase (
2199              keyp_ID      INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
2200              keyp_phrase  VARCHAR( 255 ) NOT NULL,
2201              PRIMARY KEY        ( keyp_ID ),
2202              UNIQUE keyp_phrase ( keyp_phrase )
2203            )";
2204          $DB->query( $query );
2205          echo "OK.<br />\n";
2206  
2207          echo 'Upgrading hitlog table... ';
2208          evo_flush();
2209          $query = "ALTER TABLE T_hitlog
2210               CHANGE COLUMN hit_ID hit_ID              INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
2211               CHANGE COLUMN hit_datetime hit_datetime  DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT '2000-01-01 00:00:00',
2212               ADD COLUMN hit_keyphrase_keyp_ID         INT UNSIGNED DEFAULT NULL AFTER hit_referer_dom_ID,
2213               ADD INDEX hit_remote_addr ( hit_remote_addr ),
2214               ADD INDEX hit_sess_ID        ( hit_sess_ID )";
2215          $DB->query( $query );
2216          echo "OK.<br />\n";
2217  
2218          echo 'Upgrading sessions table... ';
2219          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_sessions
2220              ALTER COLUMN sess_lastseen SET DEFAULT '2000-01-01 00:00:00',
2221              ADD COLUMN sess_hitcount  INT(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 AFTER sess_key,
2222              ADD KEY sess_user_ID (sess_user_ID)" );
2223          echo "OK.<br />\n";
2224  
2225          echo 'Creating goal tracking table... ';
2226      $DB->query( "CREATE TABLE T_track__goal(
2227                        goal_ID int(10) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment,
2228                        goal_name varchar(50) default NULL,
2229                        goal_key varchar(32) default NULL,
2230                        goal_redir_url varchar(255) default NULL,
2231                        goal_default_value double default NULL,
2232                        PRIMARY KEY (goal_ID),
2233                        UNIQUE KEY goal_key (goal_key)
2234            )" );
2235  
2236      $DB->query( "CREATE TABLE T_track__goalhit (
2237                        ghit_ID int(10) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment,
2238                        ghit_goal_ID    int(10) unsigned NOT NULL,
2239                        ghit_hit_ID     int(10) unsigned NOT NULL,
2240                        ghit_params     TEXT default NULL,
2241                        PRIMARY KEY  (ghit_ID),
2242                        KEY ghit_goal_ID (ghit_goal_ID),
2243                        KEY ghit_hit_ID (ghit_hit_ID)
2244           )" );
2245          echo "OK.<br />\n";
2246  
2247          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9800' );
2248      }
2249  
2250  
2251      if( $old_db_version < 9900 )
2252      {    // 3.0 part 1
2253          task_begin( 'Updating keyphrases in hitlog table... ' );
2254          load_class( 'sessions/model/_hit.class.php', 'Hit' );
2255          // New Hit object creation was added later, to fix upgrades from very old versions.
2256          // We create a new temp Hit object to be able to call the Hit::extract_params_from_referer() function which was static when this upgrade block was created.
2257          $tempHit = new Hit();
2258          $sql = 'SELECT SQL_NO_CACHE hit_ID, hit_referer
2259                      FROM T_hitlog
2260                      WHERE hit_referer_type = "search"
2261                     AND hit_keyphrase_keyp_ID IS NULL'; // this line just in case we crashed in the middle, so we restart where we stopped
2262          $rows = $DB->get_results( $sql, OBJECT, 'get all search hits' );
2263          foreach( $rows as $row )
2264          {
2265              $params = $tempHit->extract_params_from_referer( $row->hit_referer );
2266              if( empty( $params['keyphrase'] ) )
2267              {
2268                  continue;
2269              }
2270  
2271              $DB->begin();
2272  
2273              $sql = 'SELECT keyp_ID
2274                        FROM T_track__keyphrase
2275                       WHERE keyp_phrase = '.$DB->quote($params['keyphrase']);
2276              $keyp_ID = $DB->get_var( $sql, 0, 0, 'Get keyphrase ID' );
2277  
2278              if( empty( $keyp_ID ) )
2279              {
2280                  $sql = 'INSERT INTO T_track__keyphrase( keyp_phrase )
2281                          VALUES ('.$DB->quote($params['keyphrase']).')';
2282                  $DB->query( $sql, 'Add new keyphrase' );
2283                  $keyp_ID = $DB->insert_id;
2284              }
2285  
2286              $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_hitlog
2287                              SET hit_keyphrase_keyp_ID = '.$keyp_ID.'
2288                            WHERE hit_ID = '.$row->hit_ID, 'Update hit' );
2289  
2290              $DB->commit();
2291              echo ". \n";
2292          }
2293          task_end();
2294  
2295          task_begin( 'Upgrading widgets table... ' );
2296          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_widget
2297              CHANGE COLUMN wi_order wi_order INT(10) NOT NULL" );
2298          task_end();
2299  
2300          task_begin( 'Upgrading Files table... ' );
2301          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_files
2302                                  CHANGE COLUMN file_root_type file_root_type enum('absolute','user','collection','shared','skins') not null default 'absolute'" );
2303          task_end();
2304  
2305          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9900' );
2306      }
2307  
2308      if( $old_db_version < 9910 )
2309      {    // 3.0 part 2
2310  
2311          task_begin( 'Upgrading Blogs table... ' );
2312          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_blogs CHANGE COLUMN blog_name blog_name varchar(255) NOT NULL default ''" );
2313          task_end();
2314  
2315          task_begin( 'Adding new Post Types...' );
2316          $DB->query( "
2317              REPLACE INTO T_items__type( ptyp_ID, ptyp_name )
2318              VALUES ( 1500, 'Intro-Main' ),
2319                           ( 1520, 'Intro-Cat' ),
2320                           ( 1530, 'Intro-Tag' ),
2321                           ( 1570, 'Intro-Sub' ),
2322                           ( 1600, 'Intro-All' ) " );
2323          task_end();

2327                                      ADD COLUMN user_avatar_file_ID int(10) unsigned default NULL AFTER user_validated" );
2328          task_end();

2335                  PRIMARY KEY  (ufdf_ID)
2336              )" );
2337          task_end();
2338

2340          $DB->query( "
2341          INSERT INTO T_users__fielddefs (ufdf_ID, ufdf_type, ufdf_name)
2342               VALUES ( 10000, 'email',    'MSN/Live IM'),
2343                              ( 10100, 'word',     'Yahoo IM'),
2344                              ( 10200, 'word',     'AOL AIM'),
2345                              ( 10300, 'number',   'ICQ ID'),
2346                              ( 40000, 'phone',    'Skype'),
2347                              ( 50000, 'phone',    'Main phone'),
2348                              ( 50100, 'phone',    'Cell phone'),
2349                              ( 50200, 'phone',    'Office phone'),
2350                              ( 50300, 'phone',    'Home phone'),
2351                              ( 60000, 'phone',    'Office FAX'),
2352                              ( 60100, 'phone',    'Home FAX'),
2353                              (100000, 'url',      'Website'),
2354                              (100100, 'url',      'Blog'),
2355                              (110000, 'url',      'Linkedin'),
2356                              (120000, 'url',      'Twitter'),
2357                              (130100, 'url',      'Facebook'),
2358                              (130200, 'url',      'Myspace'),
2359                              (140000, 'url',      'Flickr'),
2360                              (150000, 'url',      'YouTube'),
2361                              (160000, 'url',      'Digg'),
2362                              (160100, 'url',      'StumbleUpon'),
2363                              (200000, 'text',     'Role'),
2364                              (200100, 'text',     'Company/Org.'),
2365                              (200200, 'text',     'Division'),
2366                              (211000, 'text',     'VAT ID'),
2367                              (300000, 'text',     'Main address'),
2368                              (300300, 'text',     'Home address');" );
2369          task_end();
2370  
2371          task_begin( 'Creating table for User fields...' );
2372          $DB->query( "CREATE TABLE {$tableprefix}users_fields (
2373                  uf_ID      int(10) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment,
2374                uf_user_ID int(10) unsigned NOT NULL,
2375                uf_ufdf_ID int(10) unsigned NOT NULL,
2376                uf_varchar varchar(255) NOT NULL,
2377                PRIMARY KEY (uf_ID)
2378              )" );
2379          task_end();
2380  
2381          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9910' );
2382      }
2383  
2384      if( $old_db_version < 9920 )
2385      {    // 3.1
2386          task_begin( 'Upgrading Posts table... ' );
2387          // This is for old posts that may have a post type of NULL which should never happen. ptyp 1 is for regular posts
2388          $DB->query( "UPDATE T_items__item
2389                                          SET post_ptyp_ID = 1
2390                                      WHERE post_ptyp_ID IS NULL" );
2391          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_items__item
2392                              CHANGE COLUMN post_ptyp_ID post_ptyp_ID int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT 1" );
2393          task_end();
2394  
2395          task_begin( 'Upgrading Categories table... ' );
2396          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_categories
2397              CHANGE COLUMN cat_name cat_name varchar(255) NOT NULL,
2398              CHANGE COLUMN cat_description cat_description varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT NULL" );
2399          db_add_col( 'T_categories', 'cat_order', 'int(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER cat_description' );
2400          db_add_index( 'T_categories', 'cat_order', 'cat_order' );
2401  
2402          $DB->query( "UPDATE T_categories
2403                      SET cat_order = cat_ID" );
2404          task_end();
2405  
2406          task_begin( 'Upgrading widgets table... ' );
2407          db_add_col( 'T_widget', 'wi_enabled', 'tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 AFTER wi_order' );
2408          task_end();
2409      }
2410      if( $old_db_version < 9930 )
2411      {    // 3.1 continued

2415              VALUES ( 3000, 'Sidebar link' )" );
2416          echo "OK.<br />\n";
2417          task_end();
2418  
2419          task_begin( 'Updating items table...' );
2420          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_items__item ENGINE=innodb" );    // fp> hum... this originally was a test :)
2421          task_end();
2422  
2423          task_begin( 'Creating versions table...' );
2424          $DB->query( "CREATE TABLE T_items__version (
2425                  iver_itm_ID        INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL ,
2426                  iver_edit_user_ID  INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL ,
2427                  iver_edit_datetime DATETIME NOT NULL ,
2428                  iver_status        ENUM('published','deprecated','protected','private','draft','redirected') NULL ,
2429                  iver_title         TEXT NULL ,
2430                  iver_content       MEDIUMTEXT NULL ,
2431                  INDEX iver_itm_ID ( iver_itm_ID )
2432                  ) ENGINE = innodb" );
2433          task_end();
2434

2436          $DB->query( "UPDATE T_groups
2437                                          SET grp_perm_xhtml_css_tweaks = 1
2438                                      WHERE grp_ID <= 3" );
2439          task_end();
2440  
2441          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9930' );
2442      }
2443  
2444      if( $old_db_version < 9940 )
2445      {    // 3.2

2469        ALTER COLUMN clog_realstart_datetime SET DEFAULT '2000-01-01 00:00:00'" );
2470          task_end();

2472           task_begin( 'Altering Items table... ' );
2473          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_items__item
2474              ADD COLUMN post_metadesc VARCHAR(255) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER post_titletag,
2475              ADD COLUMN post_metakeywords VARCHAR(255) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER post_metadesc,
2476              ADD COLUMN post_editor_code VARCHAR(32) NULL COMMENT 'Plugin code of the editor used to edit this post' AFTER post_varchar3" );
2477          task_end();
2478  
2479          task_begin( 'Forcing AutoP posts to html editor...' );
2480          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_items__item
2481                                              SET post_editor_code = "html"
2482                                          WHERE post_renderers = "default"
2483                                               OR post_renderers LIKE "%b2WPAutP%"' );
2484          task_end();
2485  
2486          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9950' );
2487      }
2488  
2489      if( $old_db_version < 9960 )
2490      {    // 3.3
2491  
2492          echo "Renaming tables...";
2493          $DB->save_error_state();
2494          $DB->halt_on_error = false;
2495          $DB->show_errors = false;
2496          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE {$tableprefix}users_fields RENAME TO T_users__fields" );
2497          $DB->restore_error_state();
2498          echo "OK.<br />\n";
2499  
2500          // fp> The following is more tricky to do with CHARACTER SET. During upgrade, we don't know what the admin actually wants.
2501          task_begin( 'Making sure all tables use desired storage ENGINE as specified in the b2evo schema...' );
2502          foreach( $schema_queries as $table_name=>$table_def )
2503          {
2504              if( $DB->query( 'SHOW TABLES LIKE \''.$table_name.'\'' )
2505                  && preg_match( '/\sENGINE\s*=\s*([a-z]+)/is', $table_def[1], $matches ) )
2506              {    // If the table exists and has an ENGINE definition:
2507                  echo $table_name.':'.$matches[1].'<br />';
2508                  $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE $table_name ENGINE = ".$matches[1] );
2509              }
2510          }
2511          task_end();
2512  
2513          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9960' );
2514      }
2515  
2516      if( $old_db_version < 9970 )
2517      {    // 4.0 part 1
2518  
2519          // For create_default_currencies() and create_default_countries():
2520          require_once dirname(__FILE__).'/_functions_create.php';
2521  
2522          task_begin( 'Creating table for default currencies... ' );
2523          $DB->query( 'CREATE TABLE '.$tableprefix.'currency (
2524                  curr_ID int(10) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment,
2525                  curr_code char(3) NOT NULL,
2526                  curr_shortcut varchar(30) NOT NULL,
2527                  curr_name varchar(40) NOT NULL,
2528                  PRIMARY KEY curr_ID (curr_ID),
2529                  UNIQUE curr_code (curr_code)
2530              ) ENGINE = innodb' );
2531          task_end();
2532  
2533          create_default_currencies( $tableprefix.'currency' );
2534  
2535          task_begin( 'Creating table for default countries... ' );
2536          $DB->query( 'CREATE TABLE '.$tableprefix.'country (
2537                  ctry_ID int(10) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment,
2538                  ctry_code char(2) NOT NULL,
2539                  ctry_name varchar(40) NOT NULL,
2540                  ctry_curr_ID int(10) unsigned,
2541                  PRIMARY KEY ctry_ID (ctry_ID),
2542                  UNIQUE ctry_code (ctry_code)
2543              ) ENGINE = innodb' );
2544          task_end();
2545  
2546          create_default_countries( $tableprefix.'country', false );
2547  
2548          task_begin( 'Upgrading user permissions table... ' );
2549          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_coll_user_perms
2550              ADD COLUMN bloguser_perm_page        tinyint NOT NULL default 0 AFTER bloguser_perm_media_change,
2551              ADD COLUMN bloguser_perm_intro        tinyint NOT NULL default 0 AFTER bloguser_perm_page,
2552              ADD COLUMN bloguser_perm_podcast    tinyint NOT NULL default 0 AFTER bloguser_perm_intro,
2553              ADD COLUMN bloguser_perm_sidebar    tinyint NOT NULL default 0 AFTER bloguser_perm_podcast" );
2554          task_end();
2555

2557          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_coll_group_perms
2558              ADD COLUMN bloggroup_perm_page        tinyint NOT NULL default 0 AFTER bloggroup_perm_media_change,
2559              ADD COLUMN bloggroup_perm_intro        tinyint NOT NULL default 0 AFTER bloggroup_perm_page,
2560              ADD COLUMN bloggroup_perm_podcast    tinyint NOT NULL default 0 AFTER bloggroup_perm_intro,
2561              ADD COLUMN bloggroup_perm_sidebar    tinyint NOT NULL default 0 AFTER bloggroup_perm_podcast" );
2562          task_end();
2563  
2564          task_begin( 'Upgrading users table... ' );
2565          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_users
2566              ADD COLUMN user_ctry_ID int(10) unsigned NULL AFTER user_avatar_file_ID" );
2567          task_end();
2568  
2569          // Creating tables for messaging module
2570  
2571          task_begin( 'Creating table for message threads... ' );
2572          $DB->query( "CREATE TABLE T_messaging__thread (
2573              thrd_ID int(10) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment,
2574              thrd_title varchar(255) NOT NULL,
2575              thrd_datemodified datetime NOT NULL,
2576              PRIMARY KEY thrd_ID (thrd_ID)
2577          ) ENGINE = innodb" );
2578          task_end();
2579  
2580          task_begin( 'Creating table for messagee... ' );
2581          $DB->query( "CREATE TABLE T_messaging__message (
2582              msg_ID int(10) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment,
2583              msg_author_user_ID int(10) unsigned NOT NULL,
2584              msg_datetime datetime NOT NULL,
2585              msg_thread_ID int(10) unsigned NOT NULL,
2586              msg_text text NULL,
2587              PRIMARY KEY msg_ID (msg_ID)
2588          ) ENGINE = innodb" );
2589          task_end();
2590  
2591          task_begin( 'Creating table for message thread statuses... ' );
2592          $DB->query( "CREATE TABLE T_messaging__threadstatus (
2593              tsta_thread_ID int(10) unsigned NOT NULL,
2594              tsta_user_ID int(10) unsigned NOT NULL,
2595              tsta_first_unread_msg_ID int(10) unsigned NULL,
2596              INDEX(tsta_user_ID)
2597          ) ENGINE = innodb" );
2598          task_end();
2599  
2600          task_begin( 'Creating table for messaging contacts... ' );
2601          $DB->query( "CREATE TABLE T_messaging__contact (
2602              mct_from_user_ID int(10) unsigned NOT NULL,
2603              mct_to_user_ID int(10) unsigned NOT NULL,
2604              mct_blocked tinyint(1) default 0,
2605              mct_last_contact_datetime datetime NOT NULL,
2606              PRIMARY KEY mct_PK (mct_from_user_ID, mct_to_user_ID)
2607          ) ENGINE = innodb" );
2608          task_end();
2609  
2610          task_begin( 'Upgrading skins table... ' );
2611          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_skins__skin
2612                          MODIFY skin_type enum('normal','feed','sitemap') NOT NULL default 'normal'" );
2613          task_end();
2614  
2615          task_begin( 'Setting skin type of sitemap skin to "sitemap"... ' );
2616          $DB->query( "UPDATE T_skins__skin
2617                          SET skin_type = 'sitemap'
2618                          WHERE skin_folder = '_sitemap'" );
2619          task_end();
2620  
2621          // Creating table for pluggable permissions
2622  
2623          // This table gets created during upgrade to v0.8.9 at checkpoint 8050
2624          task_begin( 'Creating table for Group Settings... ' );
2625          $DB->query( "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS T_groups__groupsettings (
2626              gset_grp_ID INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
2627              gset_name VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,
2628              gset_value VARCHAR(255) NULL,
2629              PRIMARY KEY (gset_grp_ID, gset_name)
2630          ) ENGINE = innodb" );
2631          task_end();
2632  
2633          // Rename T_usersettings table to T_users__usersettings
2634          task_begin( 'Rename T_usersettings table to T_users__usersettings... ' );
2635          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE '.$tableprefix.'usersettings RENAME TO T_users__usersettings' );
2636          task_end();
2637  
2638          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9970' );
2639      }
2640  
2641  
2642      if( $old_db_version < 9980 )
2643      {    // 4.0 part 2
2644  
2645          task_begin( 'Upgrading posts... ' );
2646          $DB->query( '
2647              UPDATE T_items__item
2648                 SET post_datestart = FROM_UNIXTIME( FLOOR(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(post_datestart)/60)*60 )
2649               WHERE post_datestart > NOW()' );
2650          db_add_col( 'T_items__item', 'post_excerpt_autogenerated', 'TINYINT NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER post_excerpt' );
2651          db_add_col( 'T_items__item', 'post_dateset', 'tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 AFTER post_assigned_user_ID' );
2652          task_end();
2653  
2654          task_begin( 'Upgrading countries... ' );
2655          db_add_col( $tableprefix.'country', 'ctry_enabled', 'tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 AFTER ctry_curr_ID' );
2656          task_end();
2657  
2658  
2659          task_begin( 'Upgrading links... ' );
2660  
2661          // Add link_position. Temporary allow NULL, set compatibility default, then do not allow NULL.
2662          // TODO: dh> actually, using "teaser" for the first link and "aftermore" for the rest would make more sense (and "aftermore" should get displayed with "no-more" posts anyway).
2663          //           Opinions? Could be heavy to transform this though..
2664          // fp> no, don't change past posts unexpectedly.
2665          db_add_col( 'T_links', 'link_position', "varchar(10) NULL AFTER link_title" );
2666          $DB->query( "UPDATE T_links SET link_position = 'teaser' WHERE link_position IS NULL" );
2667          db_add_col( 'T_links', 'link_position', "varchar(10) NOT NULL AFTER link_title" ); // change to NOT NULL
2668  
2669          // Add link_order. Temporary allow NULL, use order from ID, then do not allow NULL and add UNIQUE index.
2670          db_add_col( 'T_links', 'link_order', 'int(11) unsigned NULL AFTER link_position' );
2671          $DB->query( "UPDATE T_links SET link_order = link_ID WHERE link_order IS NULL" );
2672          db_add_col( 'T_links', 'link_order', 'int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AFTER link_position' ); // change to NOT NULL
2673          db_add_index( 'T_links', 'link_itm_ID_order', 'link_itm_ID, link_order', 'UNIQUE' );
2674  
2675          task_end();
2676  
2677          task_begin( 'Upgrading sessions... ' );
2678          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_sessions CHANGE COLUMN sess_ipaddress sess_ipaddress VARCHAR(39) NOT NULL DEFAULT ''" );
2679          task_end();
2680  
2681          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9980' );
2682      }
2683  
2684      if( $old_db_version < 9990 )
2685      {    // 4.0 part 3
2686  
2687          task_begin( 'Upgrading hitlog... ' );
2688  
2689          db_add_col( 'T_hitlog', 'hit_agent_type', "ENUM('rss','robot','browser','unknown') DEFAULT 'unknown' NOT NULL AFTER hit_remote_addr" );
2690  
2691          if( db_col_exists('T_hitlog', 'hit_agnt_ID') )
2692          {
2693              $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_hitlog, '.$tableprefix.'useragents
2694                              SET hit_agent_type = agnt_type
2695                            WHERE hit_agnt_ID = agnt_ID
2696                              AND agnt_type <> "unknown"' ); // We already have the unknown as default
2697              db_drop_col( 'T_hitlog', 'hit_agnt_ID' );
2698          }
2699          $DB->query( 'DROP TABLE IF EXISTS '.$tableprefix.'useragents' );
2700  
2701          task_end();
2702  
2703          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '9990' );
2704      }
2705  
2706      if( $old_db_version < 10000 )
2707      {    // 4.0 part 4
2708          // Integrate comment_secret
2709          task_begin( 'Extending Comment table... ' );
2710          db_add_col( 'T_comments', 'comment_secret', 'varchar(32) NULL default NULL' );
2711          task_end();
2712  
2713          // Create T_slug table and, Insert all slugs from T_items
2714          task_begin( 'Create Slugs table... ' );
2715          $DB->query( 'CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS T_slug (
2716                          slug_ID int(10) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment,
2717                          slug_title varchar(255) NOT NULL COLLATE ascii_bin,
2718                          slug_type char(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT "item",
2719                          slug_itm_ID int(11) unsigned,
2720                          PRIMARY KEY slug_ID (slug_ID),
2721                          UNIQUE    slug_title (slug_title)
2722                      ) ENGINE = innodb' );
2723          task_end();
2724  
2725          task_begin( 'Making sure all posts have a slug...' );
2726          // Get posts with empty urltitle:
2727          $sql = 'SELECT post_ID, post_title
2728                        FROM T_items__item
2729                       WHERE post_urltitle IS NULL OR post_urltitle = ""';
2730          $rows = $DB->get_results( $sql, OBJECT, 'Get posts with empty urltitle' );
2731          // Create URL titles when non existent:
2732          foreach( $rows as $row )
2733          {
2734              // TODO: dh> pass locale (useful for transliteration).
2735              $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_items__item
2736                                SET post_urltitle = "'.urltitle_validate( '', $row->post_title, 0 ).'"
2737                          WHERE post_ID = '.$row->post_ID, 'Set posts urltitle' );
2738          }
2739          task_end();
2740  
2741          task_begin( 'Populating Slugs table... ' );
2742          $DB->query( 'REPLACE INTO T_slug( slug_title, slug_type, slug_itm_ID)
2743                        SELECT post_urltitle, "item", post_ID
2744                                    FROM T_items__item' );
2745          task_end();
2746  
2747          task_begin( 'Add canonical and tiny slug IDs to post table...' );
2748          // modify post_urltitle column -> Not allow NULL value
2749          db_add_col( 'T_items__item', 'post_urltitle', 'VARCHAR(210) NOT NULL' );
2750          db_add_col( 'T_items__item', 'post_canonical_slug_ID', 'int(10) unsigned NULL default NULL after post_urltitle' );
2751          db_add_col( 'T_items__item', 'post_tiny_slug_ID', 'int(10) unsigned NULL default NULL after post_canonical_slug_ID' );
2752          task_end();
2753  
2754          task_begin( 'Upgrading posts...' );
2755          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_items__item, T_slug
2756                            SET post_canonical_slug_ID = slug_ID
2757                          WHERE CONVERT( post_urltitle USING ASCII ) COLLATE ascii_bin = slug_title' );
2758          task_end();
2759  
2760          task_begin( 'Adding "help" slug...' );
2761          if( db_key_exists( 'T_slug', 'slug_title', '"help"' ) )
2762          {
2763              echo '<strong>Warning: "help" slug already exists!</strong><br /> ';
2764          }
2765          else
2766          {
2767              $DB->query( 'INSERT INTO T_slug( slug_title, slug_type )
2768                           VALUES( "help", "help" )', 'Add "help" slug' );
2769              task_end();
2770          }
2771  
2772          // fp> Next time we should use pluggable permissions instead.
2773          task_begin( 'Updgrading groups: Giving Administrators Group edit perms on slugs...' );
2774          db_add_col( 'T_groups', 'grp_perm_slugs', "enum('none','view','edit') NOT NULL default 'none'" );
2775          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_groups
2776                       SET grp_perm_slugs = "edit"
2777                       WHERE grp_ID = 1' );
2778          task_end();
2779  
2780          task_begin( 'Upgrading settings table... ');
2781          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_settings
2782                          SET set_value = 1
2783                        WHERE set_name = "fm_enable_roots_user"
2784                              AND set_value = 0' );
2785          task_end();
2786  
2787          // New perms for comment moderation depending on status:
2788          task_begin( 'Upgrading Blog-User permissions...' );
2789          db_add_col( 'T_coll_user_perms', 'bloguser_perm_draft_cmts', 'tinyint NOT NULL default 0 AFTER bloguser_perm_comments' );
2790          db_add_col( 'T_coll_user_perms', 'bloguser_perm_publ_cmts', 'tinyint NOT NULL default 0 AFTER bloguser_perm_comments' );
2791          db_add_col( 'T_coll_user_perms', 'bloguser_perm_depr_cmts', 'tinyint NOT NULL default 0 AFTER bloguser_perm_comments' );
2792  
2793          if( db_col_exists( 'T_coll_user_perms', 'bloguser_perm_comments' ) )
2794          { // if user had perm_comments he now gets all 3 new perms also:
2795              $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_coll_user_perms
2796                          SET bloguser_perm_draft_cmts = bloguser_perm_comments,
2797                              bloguser_perm_publ_cmts = bloguser_perm_comments,
2798                              bloguser_perm_depr_cmts = bloguser_perm_comments');
2799              db_drop_col( 'T_coll_user_perms', 'bloguser_perm_comments' );
2800          }
2801          task_end();
2802  
2803          task_begin( 'Upgrading Blog-Group permissions...' );
2804          db_add_col( 'T_coll_group_perms', 'bloggroup_perm_draft_cmts', 'tinyint NOT NULL default 0 AFTER bloggroup_perm_comments' );
2805          db_add_col( 'T_coll_group_perms', 'bloggroup_perm_publ_cmts', 'tinyint NOT NULL default 0 AFTER bloggroup_perm_comments' );
2806          db_add_col( 'T_coll_group_perms', 'bloggroup_perm_depr_cmts', 'tinyint NOT NULL default 0 AFTER bloggroup_perm_comments' );
2807  
2808          if( db_col_exists( 'T_coll_group_perms', 'bloggroup_perm_comments' ) )
2809          { // if group had perm_comments he now gets all 3 new perms also:
2810              $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_coll_group_perms
2811                          SET bloggroup_perm_draft_cmts = bloggroup_perm_comments,
2812                              bloggroup_perm_publ_cmts = bloggroup_perm_comments,
2813                              bloggroup_perm_depr_cmts = bloggroup_perm_comments');
2814              db_drop_col( 'T_coll_group_perms', 'bloggroup_perm_comments' );
2815          }
2816          task_end();
2817  
2818          task_begin( 'Upgrading messaging permissions...' );
2819          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_users ALTER COLUMN user_allow_msgform SET DEFAULT "2"' );
2820          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_users
2821                      SET user_allow_msgform = 3
2822                      WHERE user_allow_msgform = 1');
2823          task_end();
2824  
2825          task_begin( 'Upgrading currency table...' );
2826          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE '.$tableprefix.'currency ADD COLUMN curr_enabled tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 AFTER curr_name' );
2827          task_end();
2828  
2829          task_begin( 'Upgrading default blog access type for new blogs...' );
2830          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_blogs ALTER COLUMN blog_access_type SET DEFAULT "extrapath"' );
2831          task_end();
2832  
2833          task_begin( 'Upgrading tags table...' );
2834          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_items__tag CHANGE COLUMN tag_name tag_name varbinary(50) not null' );
2835          task_end();
2836  
2837          // fp> I don't understand why we need to carry this out "again" but I observed the installer barking on
2838          // this setting missing when upgrading from older 2.x versions. I figured it would be no big deal to do it twice...
2839          task_begin( 'Makin sure usersettings table is InnoDB...' );
2840          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_users__usersettings ENGINE=innodb' );
2841          task_end();
2842  
2843          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '10000' );
2844      }
2845  
2846      if( $old_db_version < 10100 )
2847      {    // 4.1
2848          task_begin( 'Convert group permissions to pluggable permissions...' );
2849          // asimo>This delete query needs just in case if this version of b2evo was used, before upgrade process call
2850          $DB->query( 'DELETE FROM T_groups__groupsettings
2851                          WHERE gset_name = "perm_files" OR gset_name = "perm_options" OR gset_name = "perm_templates"' );
2852          // Get current permission values from groups table
2853          $sql = 'SELECT grp_ID, grp_perm_spamblacklist, grp_perm_slugs, grp_perm_files, grp_perm_options, grp_perm_templates
2854                        FROM T_groups';
2855          $rows = $DB->get_results( $sql, OBJECT, 'Get groups converted permissions' );
2856          // Insert values into groupsettings table
2857          foreach( $rows as $row )
2858          {    // "IGNORE" is needed if we already created T_groups__groupsettings during upgrade to v0.8.9 at checkpoint 8050
2859              $DB->query( 'INSERT IGNORE INTO T_groups__groupsettings( gset_grp_ID, gset_name, gset_value )
2860                              VALUES( '.$row->grp_ID.', "perm_spamblacklist", "'.$row->grp_perm_spamblacklist.'" ),
2861                                  ( '.$row->grp_ID.', "perm_slugs", "'.$row->grp_perm_slugs.'" ),
2862                                  ( '.$row->grp_ID.', "perm_files", "'.$row->grp_perm_files.'" ),
2863                                  ( '.$row->grp_ID.', "perm_options", "'.$row->grp_perm_options.'" ),
2864                                  ( '.$row->grp_ID.', "perm_templates", "'.$row->grp_perm_templates.'" )' );
2865          }
2866  
2867          // Drop all converted permissin colums from groups table
2868          db_drop_col( 'T_groups', 'grp_perm_spamblacklist' );
2869          db_drop_col( 'T_groups', 'grp_perm_slugs' );
2870          db_drop_col( 'T_groups', 'grp_perm_files' );
2871          db_drop_col( 'T_groups', 'grp_perm_options' );
2872          db_drop_col( 'T_groups', 'grp_perm_templates' );
2873          task_end();
2874  
2875          task_begin( 'Upgrading users table, adding user gender...' );
2876          db_add_col( 'T_users', 'user_gender', 'char(1) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER user_showonline' );
2877          task_end();
2878  
2879          task_begin( 'Upgrading edit timpestamp blog-user permission...' );
2880          db_add_col( 'T_coll_user_perms', 'bloguser_perm_edit_ts', 'tinyint NOT NULL default 0 AFTER bloguser_perm_delpost' );
2881          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_coll_user_perms, T_users
2882                              SET bloguser_perm_edit_ts = 1
2883                              WHERE bloguser_user_ID = user_ID  AND user_level > 4' );
2884          task_end();
2885  
2886          task_begin( 'Upgrading edit timpestamp blog-group permission...' );
2887          db_add_col( 'T_coll_group_perms', 'bloggroup_perm_edit_ts', 'tinyint NOT NULL default 0 AFTER bloggroup_perm_delpost' );
2888          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_coll_group_perms
2889                              SET bloggroup_perm_edit_ts = 1
2890                              WHERE bloggroup_group_ID = 1' );
2891          task_end();
2892  
2893          task_begin( 'Upgrading comments table, add trash status...' );
2894          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_comments MODIFY COLUMN comment_status ENUM('published','deprecated','draft', 'trash') DEFAULT 'published' NOT NULL");
2895          task_end();
2896  
2897          task_begin( 'Upgrading groups admin access permission...' );
2898          $sql = 'SELECT grp_ID, grp_perm_admin
2899                      FROM T_groups';
2900          $rows = $DB->get_results( $sql, OBJECT, 'Get groups admin perms' );
2901          foreach( $rows as $row )
2902          {
2903              switch( $row->grp_perm_admin )
2904              {
2905                  case 'visible':
2906                      $value = 'normal';
2907                      break;
2908                  case 'hidden':
2909                      $value = 'restricted';
2910                      break;
2911                  default:
2912                      $value = 'none';
2913              }
2914              // "IGNORE" is needed if we already created T_groups__groupsettings during upgrade to v0.8.9 at checkpoint 8050
2915              $DB->query( 'INSERT IGNORE INTO T_groups__groupsettings( gset_grp_ID, gset_name, gset_value )
2916                              VALUES( '.$row->grp_ID.', "perm_admin", "'.$value.'" )' );
2917          }
2918          db_drop_col( 'T_groups', 'grp_perm_admin' );
2919          task_end();
2920  
2921          task_begin( 'Upgrading users table, add users source...' );
2922          db_add_col( 'T_users', 'user_source', 'varchar(30) NULL' );
2923          task_end();
2924  
2925          task_begin( 'Upgrading blogs table: more granularity for comment allowing...' );
2926          $DB->query( 'INSERT INTO T_coll_settings( cset_coll_ID, cset_name, cset_value )
2927                          SELECT blog_ID, "allow_comments", "never"
2928                              FROM T_blogs
2929                              WHERE blog_allowcomments = "never"' );
2930          db_drop_col( 'T_blogs', 'blog_allowcomments' );
2931          task_end();
2932  
2933          task_begin( 'Upgrading blogs table: allow_rating fields...' );
2934          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_coll_settings
2935                          SET cset_value = "any"
2936                          WHERE cset_value = "always" AND cset_name = "allow_rating"' );
2937          task_end();
2938  
2939          task_begin( 'Upgrading links table, add link_cmt_ID...' );
2940          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_links
2941                          MODIFY COLUMN link_itm_ID int(11) unsigned NULL,
2942                          MODIFY COLUMN link_creator_user_ID int(11) unsigned NULL,
2943                          MODIFY COLUMN link_lastedit_user_ID int(11) unsigned NULL,
2944                          ADD COLUMN link_cmt_ID int(11) unsigned NULL COMMENT "Used for linking files to comments (comment attachments)" AFTER link_itm_ID');
2945          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_links
2946                          ADD INDEX link_cmt_ID ( link_cmt_ID )' );
2947          task_end();
2948  
2949          task_begin( 'Upgrading filetypes table...' );
2950          // get allowed filetype ids
2951          $sql = 'SELECT ftyp_ID
2952                      FROM T_filetypes
2953                      WHERE ftyp_allowed != 0';
2954          $allowed_ids = implode( ',', $DB->get_col( $sql, 0, 'Get allowed filetypes' ) );
2955  
2956          // update table column  -- this column is about who can edit the filetype: any user, registered users or only admins.
2957          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_filetypes
2958                          MODIFY COLUMN ftyp_allowed enum("any","registered","admin") NOT NULL default "admin"' );
2959  
2960          // update ftyp_allowed column content
2961          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_filetypes
2962                          SET ftyp_allowed = "registered"
2963                          WHERE ftyp_ID IN ('.$allowed_ids.')' );
2964          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_filetypes
2965                          SET ftyp_allowed = "admin"
2966                          WHERE ftyp_ID NOT IN ('.$allowed_ids.')' );
2967          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_filetypes
2968                          SET ftyp_allowed = "any"
2969                          WHERE ftyp_extensions = "gif" OR ftyp_extensions = "png" OR ftyp_extensions LIKE "%jpg%"' );
2970  
2971          // Add m4v file type if not exists
2972          if( !db_key_exists( 'T_filetypes', 'ftyp_extensions', '"m4v"' ) )
2973          {
2974              $DB->query( 'INSERT INTO T_filetypes (ftyp_extensions, ftyp_name, ftyp_mimetype, ftyp_icon, ftyp_viewtype, ftyp_allowed)
2975                               VALUES ("m4v", "MPEG video file", "video/x-m4v", "", "browser", "registered")', 'Add "m4v" file type' );
2976          }
2977          task_end();
2978  
2979          // The AdSense plugin needs to store quite long strings of data...
2980          task_begin( 'Upgrading collection settings table, change cset_value type...' );
2981          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_coll_settings
2982                                   MODIFY COLUMN cset_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
2983                                   MODIFY COLUMN cset_value VARCHAR(10000) NULL' );
2984          task_end();
2985  
2986          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '10100' );
2987      }
2988  
2989      if( $old_db_version < 10200 )
2990      {    // 4.1b
2991          task_begin( 'Creating table for a specific blog post subscriptions...' );
2992          $DB->query( "CREATE TABLE T_items__subscriptions (
2993                          isub_item_ID  int(11) unsigned NOT NULL,
2994                          isub_user_ID  int(11) unsigned NOT NULL,
2995                          isub_comments tinyint(1) NOT NULL default 0 COMMENT 'The user wants to receive notifications for new comments on this post',
2996                          PRIMARY KEY (isub_item_ID, isub_user_ID )
2997                      ) ENGINE = innodb" );
2998          task_end();
2999  
3000          task_begin( 'Upgrading comments table, add subscription fields...' );
3001          db_add_col( 'T_comments', 'comment_notif_status', 'ENUM("noreq","todo","started","finished") NOT NULL DEFAULT "noreq" COMMENT "Have notifications been sent for this comment? How far are we in the process?" AFTER comment_secret' );
3002          db_add_col( 'T_comments', 'comment_notif_ctsk_ID', 'INT(10) unsigned NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT "When notifications for this comment are sent through a scheduled job, what is the job ID?" AFTER comment_notif_status' );
3003          task_end();
3004  
3005          task_begin( 'Upgrading users table...' );
3006          db_add_col( 'T_users', 'user_notify_moderation', 'tinyint(1) NOT NULL default 0 COMMENT "Notify me by email whenever a comment is awaiting moderation on one of my blogs" AFTER user_notify' );
3007          db_add_col( 'T_users', 'user_unsubscribe_key', 'varchar(32) NOT NULL default "" COMMENT "A specific key, it is used when a user wants to unsubscribe from a post comments without signing in" AFTER user_notify_moderation' );
3008          // Set unsubscribe keys for existing users with no unsubscribe key
3009          $sql = 'SELECT user_ID
3010                              FROM T_users
3011                           WHERE user_unsubscribe_key = ""';
3012          $rows = $DB->get_results( $sql, OBJECT, 'Get users with no unsubscribe key' );
3013          foreach( $rows as $row )
3014          {
3015              $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_users
3016                              SET user_unsubscribe_key = "'.generate_random_key().'"
3017                              WHERE user_ID = '.$row->user_ID );
3018          }
3019          task_end();
3020  
3021          task_begin( 'Upgrading settings table... ');
3022          // This query was removed later, to avoid performance issue because of the smart view counting
3023          /*$DB->query( 'INSERT INTO T_settings (set_name, set_value)
3024                          VALUES ( "smart_hit_count", 1 )' );*/
3025          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_coll_settings
3026                                      CHANGE COLUMN cset_value cset_value   VARCHAR( 10000 ) NULL COMMENT "The AdSense plugin wants to store very long snippets of HTML"' );
3027            task_end();
3028  
3029            // The following two upgrade task were created subsequently to "Make sure DB schema is up to date".
3030            // Note: These queries don't modify the correct databases
3031          task_begin( 'Upgrading users table, no notification by default...');
3032          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_users ALTER COLUMN user_notify SET DEFAULT 0' );
3033          task_end();
3034  
3035          task_begin( 'Upgrading items table...');
3036          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_items__item CHANGE COLUMN post_priority post_priority int(11) unsigned null COMMENT "Task priority in workflow"' );
3037          task_end();
3038  
3039          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '10200' );
3040      }
3041  
3042  
3043      if( $old_db_version < 10300 )
3044      {    // 4.2
3045          task_begin( 'Upgrading user fields...' );
3046          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_users__fielddefs
3047                                      ADD COLUMN ufdf_required enum("hidden","optional","recommended","require") NOT NULL default "optional"');
3048          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_users__fielddefs
3049                                          SET ufdf_required = "recommended"
3050                                      WHERE ufdf_name in ("Website", "Twitter", "Facebook") ' );
3051          $DB->query( "REPLACE INTO T_users__fielddefs (ufdf_ID, ufdf_type, ufdf_name, ufdf_required)
3052                                       VALUES (400000, 'text', 'About me', 'recommended');" );
3053          task_end();
3054  
3055          task_begin( 'Moving data to user fields...' );
3056          $DB->query( 'INSERT INTO T_users__fields( uf_user_ID, uf_ufdf_ID, uf_varchar )
3057                                   SELECT user_ID, 10300, user_icq
3058                                       FROM T_users
3059                                    WHERE user_icq IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(user_icq) <> ""' );
3060          $DB->query( 'INSERT INTO T_users__fields( uf_user_ID, uf_ufdf_ID, uf_varchar )
3061                                   SELECT user_ID, 10200, user_aim
3062                                       FROM T_users
3063                                    WHERE user_aim IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(user_aim) <> ""' );
3064          $DB->query( 'INSERT INTO T_users__fields( uf_user_ID, uf_ufdf_ID, uf_varchar )
3065                                   SELECT user_ID, 10000, user_msn
3066                                       FROM T_users
3067                                    WHERE user_msn IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(user_msn) <> ""' );
3068          $DB->query( 'INSERT INTO T_users__fields( uf_user_ID, uf_ufdf_ID, uf_varchar )
3069                                   SELECT user_ID, 10100, user_yim
3070                                       FROM T_users
3071                                    WHERE user_yim IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(user_yim) <> ""' );
3072          task_end();
3073  
3074          task_begin( 'Dropping obsolete user columns...' );
3075          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_users
3076                                      DROP COLUMN user_icq,
3077                                      DROP COLUMN user_aim,
3078                                      DROP COLUMN user_msn,
3079                                      DROP COLUMN user_yim' );
3080          task_end();
3081  
3082          // ---
3083  
3084          task_begin( 'Adding new user columns...' );
3085          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_users
3086                                      ADD COLUMN user_postcode varchar(12) NULL AFTER user_ID,
3087                                      ADD COLUMN user_age_min int unsigned NULL AFTER user_postcode,
