4390          $result = $DB->get_results( 'SELECT cset_coll_ID as coll_ID, cset_name as name, cset_value as value
4391                                          FROM T_coll_settings
4392                                          WHERE cset_name LIKE "custom\_double\_%"
4393                                             OR cset_name LIKE "custom\_varchar\_%"
4394                                          ORDER BY cset_coll_ID, cset_name' );
4395          if( !empty( $result ) )
4396          { // There are custom fields in blog settings
4397              $insert_field_names = '';
4398              foreach( $result as $row )
4399              { // process each custom field
4400                  $field_guid = preg_replace( '/^custom_(double|varchar)_([a-f0-9\-]+)$/', '$2', $row->name );
4401                  // Replace special chars/umlauts, if we can convert charsets:
4402                  load_funcs('locales/_charset.funcs.php');
4403                  $field_name = strtolower( preg_replace( '/[^a-z0-9\-_]+/i', '_', $row->value ) );
4404                  $field_name = replace_special_chars( $field_name );
4405  
4406                  $insert_field_names .= '( '.$row->coll_ID.', "custom_fname_'.$field_guid.'", "'.$field_name.'" ), ';
4407              }
4408              // Insert names for custom fields in collection settings
4409              $DB->query( 'INSERT INTO T_coll_settings( cset_coll_ID, cset_name, cset_value )
4410                              VALUES '.substr( $insert_field_names, 0, -2 ) );
4411          }
4412          $DB->commit(); // End adding of names for custom fields
4413          task_end();
4414  
4415          task_begin( 'Upgrading comments table...' );
4416          db_add_index( 'T_comments', 'comment_status', 'comment_status' );
4417          task_end();
4418  
4419          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11100' );
4420      }
4421  
4422      if( $old_db_version < 11110 )
4423      { // part 13 trunk aka second part of "i5"
4424  
4425          // Add new settings for antispam groups
4426          $antispam_group_settings = $DB->get_assoc( 'SELECT set_name, set_value
4427               FROM T_settings
4428              WHERE set_name IN ( '.$DB->quote( array( 'antispam_suspicious_group', 'antispam_trust_groups' ) ).')' );
4429          if( count( $antispam_group_settings ) < 2 )
4430          { // Insert new settings only if don't exist in DB
4431              task_begin( 'Updating general settings...' );
4432              // Set antispam suspicious group
4433              if( !isset( $antispam_group_settings['antispam_suspicious_group'] ) )
4434              { // Insert new value, Don't rewrite value if it already defined before
4435                  $suspect_group_SQL = new SQL();
4436                  $suspect_group_SQL->SELECT( 'grp_ID' );
4437                  $suspect_group_SQL->FROM( 'T_groups' );
4438                  $suspect_group_SQL->WHERE( 'grp_name = '.$DB->quote( 'Misbehaving/Suspect Users' ) );
4439                  $suspect_group_ID = $DB->get_var( $suspect_group_SQL->get() );
4440                  if( !empty( $suspect_group_ID ) )
4441                  { // Save setting value
4442                      $DB->query( 'INSERT INTO T_settings ( set_name, set_value ) VALUES
4443                              ( '.$DB->quote( 'antispam_suspicious_group' ).', '.$DB->quote( $suspect_group_ID ).' )' );
4444                  }
4445              }
4446              // Set antispam trust groups
4447              if( !isset( $antispam_group_settings['antispam_trust_groups'] ) )
4448              { // Insert new value, Don't rewrite value if it already defined before
4449                  $trust_groups = array( 'Administrators', 'Moderators', 'Trusted Users', 'Spammers/Restricted Users' );
4450                  $trust_groups_SQL = new SQL();
4451                  $trust_groups_SQL->SELECT( 'grp_ID' );
4452                  $trust_groups_SQL->FROM( 'T_groups' );
4453                  $trust_groups_SQL->WHERE( 'grp_name IN ( '.$DB->quote( $trust_groups ).')' );
4454                  $trust_groups_IDs = $DB->get_col( $trust_groups_SQL->get() );
4455                  if( !empty( $trust_groups_IDs ) )
4456                  { // Save setting value
4457                      $DB->query( 'INSERT INTO T_settings ( set_name, set_value ) VALUES
4458                              ( '.$DB->quote( 'antispam_trust_groups' ).', '.$DB->quote( implode( ',', $trust_groups_IDs ) ).' )' );
4459                  }
4460              }
4461              task_end();
4462          }
4463  
4464          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11110' );
4465      }
4466  
4467      if( $old_db_version < 11200 )
4468      { // part 14 trunk aka "i6"
4469  
4470          task_begin( 'Upgrading comments table...' );
4471          db_add_col( 'T_comments', 'comment_last_touched_ts', "TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT '2000-01-01 00:00:00' AFTER comment_date" );
4472          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_comments
4473                          SET comment_last_touched_ts = comment_date' );
4474          task_end();
4475  
4476          task_begin( 'Convert email addresses to lowercase... ' );
4477          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_users SET user_email = LOWER( user_email )' );
4478          $DB->query( 'UPDATE '.$tableprefix.'email__blocked SET emblk_address = LOWER( emblk_address )' );
4479          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_email__returns SET emret_address = LOWER( emret_address )' );
4480          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_email__log SET emlog_to = LOWER( emlog_to )' );
4481          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_comments
4482                SET comment_author_email = LOWER( comment_author_email )
4483              WHERE comment_author_email IS NOT NULL' );
4484          task_end();
4485  
4486          task_begin( 'Upgrading blogs table...' );
4487          db_add_col( 'T_blogs', 'blog_order', 'int(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL' );
4488          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_blogs
4489                          SET blog_order = blog_ID' );
4490          task_end();
4491  
4492          task_begin( 'Updating general settings...' );
4493          $site_skins_enabled = $DB->get_var( 'SELECT set_value
4494               FROM T_settings
4495              WHERE set_name = '.$DB->quote( 'site_skins_enabled' ) );
4496          if( is_null( $site_skins_enabled ) )
4497          { // Insert new setting to disable site skins
4498              $DB->query( 'INSERT INTO T_settings ( set_name, set_value )
4499                  VALUES ( '.$DB->quote( 'site_skins_enabled' ).', '.$DB->quote( '0' ).' )' );
4500          }
4501          elseif( $site_skins_enabled == '1' )
4502          { // Disable site skins if it is enabled
4503              $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_settings
4504                    SET set_value = '.$DB->quote( '0' ).'
4505                  WHERE set_name = '.$DB->quote( 'site_skins_enabled' ) );
4506          }
4507          task_end();
4508  
4509          task_begin( 'Upgrading blogs table...' );
4510          db_add_col( 'T_blogs', 'blog_favorite', 'TINYINT(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1' );
4511          task_end();
4512  
4513          task_begin( 'Upgrade table of base domains... ' );
4514          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_basedomains CHANGE COLUMN dom_status dom_status ENUM('unknown','trusted','suspect','blocked') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'unknown'" );
4515          task_end();
4516  
4517          task_begin( 'Create table for file links voting... ' );
4518          $DB->query( 'CREATE TABLE '.$tableprefix.'links__vote (
4519                  lvot_link_ID       int(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
4520                  lvot_user_ID       int(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
4521                  lvot_like          tinyint(1),
4522                  lvot_inappropriate tinyint(1),
4523                  lvot_spam          tinyint(1),
4524                  primary key (lvot_link_ID, lvot_user_ID)
4525              ) ENGINE = innodb' );
4526  
4527          // Convert all file votes to link votes
4528          $DB->query( 'INSERT INTO '.$tableprefix.'links__vote ( lvot_link_ID, lvot_user_ID, lvot_like, lvot_inappropriate, lvot_spam )
4529                          SELECT link_ID, fvot_user_ID, fvot_like, fvot_inappropriate, fvot_spam
4530                          FROM '.$tableprefix.'files__vote
4531                          LEFT JOIN T_links ON link_file_ID = fvot_file_ID
4532                          WHERE link_ID IS NOT NULL' );
4533  
4534          // Delete old file voting table
4535          $DB->query( 'DROP TABLE IF EXISTS '.$tableprefix.'files__vote' );
4536          task_end();
4537  
4538          task_begin( 'Create table for goal categories... ' );
4539          $DB->query( 'CREATE TABLE T_track__goalcat (
4540                  gcat_ID     int(10) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment,
4541                  gcat_name   varchar(50) default NULL,
4542                  gcat_color  char(7) default NULL,
4543                  PRIMARY KEY (gcat_ID)
4544              ) ENGINE = myisam' );
4545          // Insert default goal category
4546          $DB->query( 'INSERT INTO T_track__goalcat ( gcat_name, gcat_color )
4547              VALUES ( '.$DB->quote( 'Default' ).', '.$DB->quote( '#999999' ).' )' );
4548          $default_goalcat_ID = $DB->insert_id;
4549  
4550          db_add_col( 'T_track__goal', 'goal_gcat_ID', 'int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT "'.$default_goalcat_ID.'" AFTER goal_ID' );
4551          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_track__goal
4552              CHANGE goal_gcat_ID goal_gcat_ID int(10) unsigned NOT NULL' );
4553          task_end();
4554  
4555          // This task was not required, but we would like to make sure that we have future proof link_datecreated and link_datemodified fields.
4556          // There were previous versions, when these fields were set to '1970-01-01' because the $localtimenow was not initialized during the install script
4557          task_begin( 'Update links table...' );
4558          $DB->query( "UPDATE T_links SET link_datecreated = concat( '2000-01-01 ', time( link_datecreated ) )
4559                          WHERE date( link_datecreated ) = '1970-01-01'" );
4560          $DB->query( "UPDATE T_links SET link_datemodified = concat( '2000-01-01 ', time( link_datemodified ) )
4561                          WHERE date( link_datemodified ) = '1970-01-01'" );
4562          task_end();
4563  
4564          task_begin( 'Upgrading Blogs table...' );
4565          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_blogs CHANGE blog_description blog_shortdesc varchar(250) NULL default ""' );
4566          task_end();
4567  
4568          task_begin( 'Upgrading Comments table...' );
4569          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_comments
4570              CHANGE comment_post_ID   comment_item_ID        int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default 0,
4571              CHANGE comment_author_ID comment_author_user_ID int unsigned NULL default NULL');
4572          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_comments
4573              DROP INDEX comment_post_ID');
4574          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_comments
4575              ADD KEY comment_item_ID ( comment_item_ID )' );
4576          task_end();
4577  
4578          task_begin( 'Upgrading Files table...' );
4579          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_files
4580              DROP INDEX file,
4581              ADD COLUMN file_path_hash char(32) default NULL' );
4582          // Change file path length to the max allowed value
4583          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_files CHANGE COLUMN file_path file_path VARCHAR(767) NOT NULL DEFAULT ''" );
4584          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_files SET file_path_hash = MD5( CONCAT( file_root_type, file_root_ID, file_path ) )');
4585          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_files ADD UNIQUE file_path (file_path_hash)' );
4586          task_end();
4587  
4588          task_begin( 'Create table for email campaigns... ' );
4589          $DB->query( 'CREATE TABLE T_email__campaign (
4590              ecmp_ID          INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
4591              ecmp_date_ts     TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\',
4592              ecmp_name        VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
4593              ecmp_email_title VARCHAR(255) NULL,
4594              ecmp_email_html  TEXT NULL,
4595              ecmp_email_text  TEXT NULL,
4596              ecmp_sent_ts     TIMESTAMP NULL,
4597              PRIMARY KEY      (ecmp_ID)
4598              ) ENGINE = myisam' );
4599          task_end();
4600  
4601          task_begin( 'Create table for email campaign send data... ' );
4602          $DB->query( 'CREATE TABLE T_email__campaign_send (
4603              csnd_camp_ID  INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
4604              csnd_user_ID  INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
4605              csnd_emlog_ID INT(11) UNSIGNED NULL,
4606              PRIMARY KEY   csnd_PK ( csnd_camp_ID, csnd_user_ID )
4607              ) ENGINE = myisam' );
4608          task_end();
4609  
4610          task_begin( 'Rename table "email blocked" to "email address"... ' );
4611          $DB->query( 'RENAME TABLE '.$tableprefix.'email__blocked TO T_email__address' );
4612          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_email__address
4613              CHANGE emblk_ID                    emadr_ID                    INT(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL auto_increment,
4614              CHANGE emblk_address               emadr_address               VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT NULL,
4615              CHANGE emblk_status                emadr_status                ENUM ( 'unknown', 'warning', 'suspicious1', 'suspicious2', 'suspicious3', 'prmerror', 'spammer' ) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'unknown',
4616              CHANGE emblk_sent_count            emadr_sent_count            INT(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
4617              CHANGE emblk_sent_last_returnerror emadr_sent_last_returnerror INT(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
4618              CHANGE emblk_prmerror_count        emadr_prmerror_count        INT(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
4619              CHANGE emblk_tmperror_count        emadr_tmperror_count        INT(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
4620              CHANGE emblk_spamerror_count       emadr_spamerror_count       INT(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
4621              CHANGE emblk_othererror_count      emadr_othererror_count      INT(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
4622              CHANGE emblk_last_sent_ts          emadr_last_sent_ts          TIMESTAMP NULL,
4623              CHANGE emblk_last_error_ts         emadr_last_error_ts         TIMESTAMP NULL");
4624          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_email__address
4625              ADD UNIQUE emadr_address ( emadr_address )" );
4626          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_email__address
4627              DROP INDEX emblk_address");
4628          task_end();
4629  
4630          // Add new email status 'redemption'
4631          task_begin( 'Upgrading table of email addresses...' );
4632          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_email__address
4633              CHANGE emadr_status   emadr_status ENUM ( 'unknown', 'redemption', 'warning', 'suspicious1', 'suspicious2', 'suspicious3', 'prmerror', 'spammer' ) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'unknown'" );
4634          task_end();
4635  
4636          task_begin( 'Upgrading blog-group permissions table...' );
4637          db_add_col( 'T_coll_group_perms', 'bloggroup_can_be_assignee', 'tinyint NOT NULL default 0 AFTER bloggroup_ismember' );
4638          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_coll_group_perms
4639                SET bloggroup_can_be_assignee = 1
4640              WHERE bloggroup_group_ID IN ( 1, 2 )' );
4641          task_end();
4642  
4643          task_begin( 'Upgrading blog-user permissions table...' );
4644          db_add_col( 'T_coll_user_perms', 'bloguser_can_be_assignee', 'tinyint NOT NULL default 0 AFTER bloguser_ismember' );
4645          task_end();
4646  
4647          task_begin( 'Dropping obsolete columns from table Links...' );
4648          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_links
4649                                      DROP COLUMN link_external_url,
4650                                      DROP COLUMN link_title,
4651                                      DROP COLUMN link_dest_itm_ID' );
4652          task_end();
4653  
4654          // This task was added later to turn OFF smart view counting on upgrade from v5.0 to v5.1 for better performance
4655          task_begin( 'Turn off smart view counting...' );
4656          $DB->query( 'DELETE FROM T_settings WHERE set_name = '.$DB->quote( 'smart_view_count' ) );
4657          task_end();
4658  
4659          task_begin( 'Upgrading Posts table...' );
4660          db_drop_col( 'T_items__item', 'post_views' );
4661          task_end();
4662  
4663          task_begin( 'Upgrading Files table... ' );
4664          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_files
4665              CHANGE COLUMN file_root_type file_root_type enum('absolute','user','collection','shared','skins','import') not null default 'absolute'" );
4666          task_end();
4667  
4668          // Set flag to recreate autogenerated excerpts due to modifications on the excerpt generation
4669          // Note: We need to generate this in the end of the upgrade script, because the database must be up to date
4670          $recreate_autogenerated_excerpts = true;
4671  
4672          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11200' );
4673      }
4674  
4675      if( $old_db_version < 11208 )
4676      { // part 15.a trunk aka second part of "i6"
4677  
4678          // Note create a separate block for the hitlog upgrade because it may require very long time
4679          task_begin( 'Upgrade hitlog table...' );
4680          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_hitlog
4681              CHANGE COLUMN hit_ID            hit_ID            INT(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
4682              CHANGE COLUMN hit_datetime      hit_datetime      TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\',
4683              CHANGE COLUMN hit_serprank      hit_serprank      SMALLINT UNSIGNED DEFAULT NULL,
4684              CHANGE COLUMN hit_blog_ID       hit_coll_ID       INT(10) UNSIGNED NULL DEFAULT NULL,
4685              CHANGE COLUMN hit_response_code hit_response_code SMALLINT DEFAULT NULL,
4686              ADD COLUMN hit_agent_ID SMALLINT UNSIGNED NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER hit_agent_type' );
4687          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_hitlog
4688              DROP INDEX hit_blog_ID');
4689          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_hitlog
4690              ADD KEY hit_coll_ID ( hit_coll_ID )' );
4691  
4692          task_end();
4693  
4694          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11208' );
4695      }
4696  
4697      if( $old_db_version < 11210 )
4698      { // part 15.b trunk aka third part of "i6"
4699  
4700          task_begin( 'Updating widgets setting...' );
4701          // Unset those widgets allow blockcache value which current settings allow blockcache but the caching is always forbidden on runtime;
4702          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_widget
4703                  SET wi_params = REPLACE( wi_params, \'s:16:"allow_blockcache";i:1\', \'s:16:"allow_blockcache";i:0\' )
4704                  WHERE wi_params LIKE \'%s:16:"allow_blockcache";i:1%\' AND (
4705                      wi_code = "user_tools" OR wi_code = "user_login" OR ( wi_code = "msg_menu_link" AND wi_params LIKE \'%s:9:"link_type";s:8:"messages"%\' )
4706                      OR ( wi_code = "menu_link" AND ( wi_params LIKE \'%s:9:"link_type";s:5:"login"%\' OR wi_params LIKE \'%s:9:"link_type";s:8:"register"%\' ) )
4707                      )' );
4708          // Unset 'show_badge' setting in case of msg_menu_link widgets where the link_type is contacts
4709          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_widget
4710                  SET wi_params = REPLACE( wi_params, \'s:10:"show_badge";i:1\', \'s:10:"show_badge";i:0\' )
4711                  WHERE wi_code = "msg_menu_link" AND wi_params LIKE \'%s:9:"link_type";s:8:"contacts"%\' AND wi_params LIKE \'%s:10:"show_badge";i:1%\'' );
4712          task_end();
4713  
4714          task_begin( 'Updating files hash values...' );
4715          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_files MODIFY COLUMN file_hash VARBINARY(32), MODIFY COLUMN file_path_hash VARBINARY(32)' );
4716          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_files SET file_hash = UNHEX( file_hash ), file_path_hash = UNHEX( file_path_hash )' );
4717          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_files MODIFY COLUMN file_hash BINARY(16) default NULL, MODIFY COLUMN file_path_hash BINARY(16) default NULL' );
4718          task_end();
4719  
4720          task_begin( 'Upgrading goals table...' );
4721          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_track__goal
4722              ADD COLUMN goal_temp_redir_url varchar(255) default NULL AFTER goal_redir_url,
4723              ADD COLUMN goal_temp_start_ts  TIMESTAMP NULL            AFTER goal_temp_redir_url,
4724              ADD COLUMN goal_temp_end_ts    TIMESTAMP NULL            AFTER goal_temp_start_ts,
4725              ADD COLUMN goal_notes          TEXT DEFAULT NULL' );
4726          task_end();
4727  
4728          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11210' );
4729      }
4730  
4731      if( $old_db_version < 11220 )
4732      { // part 16.a trunk aka fourth part of "i6"
4733          task_begin( 'Upgrading countries table...' );
4734          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_regional__country
4735              ADD COLUMN ctry_status      enum( \'trusted\', \'suspect\', \'blocked\' ) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
4736              ADD COLUMN ctry_block_count int(10) unsigned DEFAULT 0' );
4737          task_end();
4738  
4739          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11220' );
4740      }
4741  
4742      if( $old_db_version < 11240 )
4743      { // part 16.d trunk aka seventh part of "i6"
4744  
4745          task_begin( 'Updating general settings...' );
4746          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_settings SET
4747              set_name = CASE
4748                  WHEN set_name = "user_closing_allow" THEN "account_close_enabled"
4749                  WHEN set_name = "user_closing_intro" THEN "account_close_intro"
4750                  WHEN set_name = "user_closing_reasons" THEN "account_close_reasons"
4751                  WHEN set_name = "user_closing_byemsg" THEN "account_close_byemsg"
4752                  ELSE set_name
4753              END' );
4754          task_end();
4755  
4756          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11240' );
4757      }
4758  
4759      if( $old_db_version < 11245 )
4760      { // part 16.e trunk aka eighth part of "i6"
4761  
4762          task_begin( 'Updating Antispam IP Ranges table...' );
4763          db_add_col( 'T_antispam__iprange', 'aipr_contact_email_count', 'int(10) unsigned DEFAULT 0 AFTER aipr_user_count' );
4764          task_end();
4765  
4766          task_begin( 'Updating invalid locale settings...' );
4767          $current_default_locale = $DB->get_var( 'SELECT set_value FROM T_settings WHERE set_name = "default_locale"' );
4768          if( empty( $current_default_locale ) )
4769          { // The default locale is not set in the database, use the one from the config file
4770              global $default_locale;
4771              $current_default_locale = $default_locale;
4772          }
4773          if( $DB->get_var( 'SELECT loc_enabled FROM T_locales WHERE loc_locale = '.$DB->quote( $current_default_locale ) ) )
4774          { // Update invalid user and collection locales to the default, but only if the default exists and it is enabled
4775              $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_users
4776                  SET user_locale = '.$DB->quote( $current_default_locale ).'
4777                  WHERE  user_locale NOT IN ( SELECT loc_locale FROM T_locales WHERE loc_enabled = 1 )'
4778              );
4779              $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_blogs
4780                  SET blog_locale = '.$DB->quote( $current_default_locale ).'
4781                  WHERE  blog_locale NOT IN ( SELECT loc_locale FROM T_locales WHERE loc_enabled = 1 )'
4782              );
4783          }
4784          task_end();
4785  
4786          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11245' );
4787      }
4788  
4789      if( $old_db_version < 11250 )
4790      { // part 16.f trunk aka ninth part of "i6"
4791  
4792          // Convert item content separators to new format
4793          load_funcs('tools/model/_dbmaintenance.funcs.php');
4794          dbm_convert_item_content_separators();
4795          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11250' );
4796      }
4797  
4798      if( $old_db_version < 11255 )
4799      { // part 16.g trunk aka tenth part of "i6"
4800  
4801          task_begin( 'Updating post types...' );
4802          $DB->query( "INSERT INTO T_items__type ( ptyp_ID, ptyp_name )
4803              VALUES ( 1400, 'Intro-Front' )" );
4804          task_end();
4805  
4806          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11255' );
4807      }
4808  
4809      if( $old_db_version < 11260 )
4810      { // part 16.h trunk aka eleventh part of "i6"
4811  
4812          // This upgrade block updates all field collations from 'ascii_bin' to 'ascii_general_ci' except of slugs table.
4813  
4814          task_begin( 'Clean up comment emails...' );
4815          $DB->query( "UPDATE T_comments
4816                          SET comment_author_email = CONVERT(comment_author_email USING ascii)" );
4817          $DB->commit();
4818          task_end();
4819  
4820  
4821          task_begin( 'Convert the field collations from ascii_bin to ascii_general_ci... <br />' );
4822          // fp> why would we need a transaction here?    $DB->begin();
4823          task_begin( '- Converting skins table...' );
4824          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_skins__skin
4825              MODIFY skin_type enum('normal','feed','sitemap','mobile','tablet') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'normal'" );
4826          task_end();
4827          task_begin( '- Converting blogs table...' );
4828          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_blogs
4829              MODIFY blog_access_type    VARCHAR(10) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'extrapath',
4830              MODIFY blog_urlname        VARCHAR(255) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'urlname',
4831              MODIFY blog_media_location ENUM( 'default', 'subdir', 'custom', 'none' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT 'default' NOT NULL,
4832              MODIFY blog_type           ENUM( 'std', 'photo', 'group', 'forum', 'manual' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT 'std' NOT NULL" );
4833          task_end();
4834          task_begin( '- Converting blog settings table...' );
4835          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_coll_settings
4836              MODIFY cset_name VARCHAR( 50 ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL' );
4837          task_end();
4838          task_begin( '- Converting widgets table...' );
4839          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE {$tableprefix}widget
4840              MODIFY wi_type ENUM( 'core', 'plugin' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'core',
4841              MODIFY wi_code VARCHAR(32) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
4842          task_end();
4843          task_begin( '- Converting categories table...' );
4844          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_categories
4845              MODIFY cat_urlname varchar(255) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
4846          task_end();
4847          task_begin( '- Converting posts table...' );
4848          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_items__item
4849              MODIFY post_status               enum('published','community','deprecated','protected','private','review','draft','redirected') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'published',
4850              MODIFY post_urltitle             VARCHAR(210) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL,
4851              MODIFY post_notifications_status ENUM('noreq','todo','started','finished') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'noreq',
4852              MODIFY post_comment_status       ENUM('disabled', 'open', 'closed') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'open',
4853              MODIFY post_renderers            TEXT COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
4854          task_end();
4855          task_begin( '- Converting comments table...' );
4856          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_comments
4857              MODIFY comment_type         enum('comment','linkback','trackback','pingback') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'comment',
4858              MODIFY comment_status       ENUM('published','community','deprecated','protected','private','review','draft','trash') COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT 'published' NOT NULL,
4859              MODIFY comment_author_email varchar(255) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NULL,
4860              MODIFY comment_author_IP    varchar(23) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default '',
4861              MODIFY comment_renderers    TEXT COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL,
4862              MODIFY comment_secret       CHAR(32) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NULL default NULL,
4863              MODIFY comment_notif_status ENUM('noreq','todo','started','finished') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'noreq' COMMENT 'Have notifications been sent for this comment? How far are we in the process?'" );
4864          task_end();
4865          task_begin( '- Converting post prerendered contents table...' );
4866          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_items__prerendering
4867              MODIFY itpr_format    ENUM('htmlbody','entityencoded','xml','text') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL,
4868              MODIFY itpr_renderers TEXT COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
4869          task_end();
4870          task_begin( '- Converting comment prerendered contents table...' );
4871          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_comments__prerendering
4872              MODIFY cmpr_format    ENUM('htmlbody','entityencoded','xml','text') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL,
4873              MODIFY cmpr_renderers TEXT COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
4874          task_end();
4875          task_begin( '- Converting post versions table...' );
4876          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_items__version
4877              MODIFY iver_status ENUM('published','community','deprecated','protected','private','review','draft','redirected') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NULL" );
4878          task_end();
4879          task_begin( '- Converting post settings table...' );
4880          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_items__item_settings
4881              MODIFY iset_name varchar( 50 ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
4882          task_end();
4883          task_begin( '- Converting user permissions table...' );
4884          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_coll_user_perms
4885              MODIFY bloguser_perm_poststatuses set('review','draft','private','protected','deprecated','community','published','redirected') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default '',
4886              MODIFY bloguser_perm_edit         ENUM('no','own','lt','le','all','redirected') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'no',
4887              MODIFY bloguser_perm_cmtstatuses  set('review','draft','private','protected','deprecated','community','published') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default '',
4888              MODIFY bloguser_perm_edit_cmt     ENUM('no','own','anon','lt','le','all') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'no'" );
4889          task_end();
4890          task_begin( '- Converting group permissions table...' );
4891          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_coll_group_perms
4892              MODIFY bloggroup_perm_poststatuses set('review','draft','private','protected','deprecated','community','published','redirected') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default '',
4893              MODIFY bloggroup_perm_edit         ENUM('no','own','lt','le','all','redirected') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'no',
4894              MODIFY bloggroup_perm_cmtstatuses  set('review','draft','private','protected','deprecated','community','published') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default '',
4895              MODIFY bloggroup_perm_edit_cmt     ENUM('no','own','anon','lt','le','all') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'no'" );
4896          task_end();
4897          task_begin( '- Converting links table...' );
4898          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_links
4899              MODIFY link_position varchar(10) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
4900          task_end();
4901          task_begin( '- Converting files table...' );
4902          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_files
4903              MODIFY file_root_type enum('absolute','user','collection','shared','skins','import') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'absolute'" );
4904          task_end();
4905          task_begin( '- Converting file types table...' );
4906          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_filetypes
4907              MODIFY ftyp_extensions varchar(30) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL,
4908              MODIFY ftyp_viewtype   varchar(10) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL,
4909              MODIFY ftyp_allowed    enum('any','registered','admin') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'admin'" );
4910          task_end();
4911          task_begin( '- Converting sessions table...' );
4912          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_sessions
4913              MODIFY sess_key       CHAR(32) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NULL,
4914              MODIFY sess_ipaddress VARCHAR(39) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
4915              MODIFY sess_device    VARCHAR(8) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT ''" );
4916          task_end();
4917          task_begin( '- Converting domains table...' );
4918          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_basedomains
4919              MODIFY dom_status ENUM('unknown','trusted','suspect','blocked') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'unknown',
4920              MODIFY dom_type   ENUM('unknown','normal','searcheng','aggregator','email') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'unknown'" );
4921          task_end();
4922          task_begin( '- Converting logs table...' );
4923          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_hitlog
4924              MODIFY hit_ctrl         VARCHAR(30) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT NULL,
4925              MODIFY hit_type         ENUM('standard','rss','admin','ajax', 'service') COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT 'standard' NOT NULL,
4926              MODIFY hit_referer_type ENUM('search','special','spam','referer','direct','self') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL,
4927              MODIFY hit_remote_addr  VARCHAR(40) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT NULL,
4928              MODIFY hit_agent_type   ENUM('robot','browser','unknown') COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT 'unknown' NOT NULL" );
4929          task_end();
4930          task_begin( '- Converting goal categories table...' );
4931          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_track__goalcat
4932              MODIFY gcat_color  char(7) COLLATE ascii_general_ci default NULL" );
4933          task_end();
4934          task_begin( '- Converting groups table...' );
4935          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_groups
4936              MODIFY grp_perm_blogs                  enum('user','viewall','editall') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'user',
4937              MODIFY grp_perm_xhtmlvalidation        VARCHAR(10) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'always',
4938              MODIFY grp_perm_xhtmlvalidation_xmlrpc VARCHAR(10) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'always',
4939              MODIFY grp_perm_stats                  enum('none','user','view','edit') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'none'" );
4940          task_end();
4941          task_begin( '- Converting group settings table...' );
4942          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_groups__groupsettings
4943              MODIFY gset_name VARCHAR(30) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
4944          task_end();
4945          task_begin( '- Converting settings table...' );
4946          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_settings
4947              MODIFY set_name VARCHAR(30) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
4948          task_end();
4949          task_begin( '- Converting cache table...' );
4950          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_global__cache
4951              MODIFY cach_name VARCHAR(30) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
4952          task_end();
4953          task_begin( '- Converting users table...' );
4954          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_users
4955              MODIFY user_email           varchar(255) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL,
4956              MODIFY user_status          enum( 'activated', 'autoactivated', 'closed', 'deactivated', 'emailchanged', 'failedactivation', 'new' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'new',
4957              MODIFY user_unsubscribe_key CHAR(32) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default '' COMMENT 'A specific key, it is used when a user wants to unsubscribe from a post comments without signing in',
4958              MODIFY user_gender          char(1) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NULL" );
4959          task_end();
4960          task_begin( '- Converting user fields table...' );
4961          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_users__fielddefs
4962              MODIFY ufdf_type       char(8) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL,
4963              MODIFY ufdf_required   enum('hidden','optional','recommended','require') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'optional',
4964              MODIFY ufdf_duplicated enum('forbidden','allowed','list') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'allowed'" );
4965          task_end();
4966          task_begin( '- Converting user reports table...' );
4967          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_users__reports
4968              MODIFY urep_status enum( 'fake', 'guidelines', 'harass', 'spam', 'other' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci" );
4969          task_end();
4970          task_begin( '- Converting locales table...' );
4971          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_locales
4972              MODIFY loc_charset varchar(15) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'iso-8859-1',
4973              MODIFY loc_datefmt varchar(20) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'y-m-d',
4974              MODIFY loc_timefmt varchar(20) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'H:i:s'" );
4975          task_end();
4976          task_begin( '- Converting antispam table...' );
4977          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE {$tableprefix}antispam
4978              MODIFY aspm_source enum( 'local','reported','central' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'reported'" );
4979          task_end();
4980          task_begin( '- Converting IP ranges table...' );
4981          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_antispam__iprange
4982              MODIFY aipr_status enum( 'trusted', 'suspect', 'blocked' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL" );
4983          task_end();
4984          task_begin( '- Converting user settings table...' );
4985          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_users__usersettings
4986              MODIFY uset_name VARCHAR( 30 ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
4987          task_end();
4988          task_begin( '- Converting plugins table...' );
4989          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_plugins
4990              MODIFY plug_classname VARCHAR(40) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default '',
4991              MODIFY plug_code      VARCHAR(32) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NULL,
4992              MODIFY plug_version   VARCHAR(42) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default '0',
4993              MODIFY plug_status    ENUM( 'enabled', 'disabled', 'needs_config', 'broken' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
4994          task_end();
4995          task_begin( '- Converting plugin settings table...' );
4996          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_pluginsettings
4997              MODIFY pset_name VARCHAR( 30 ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
4998          task_end();
4999          task_begin( '- Converting plugin user settings table...' );
5000          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_pluginusersettings
5001              MODIFY puset_name VARCHAR( 30 ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
5002          task_end();
5003          task_begin( '- Converting plugin events table...' );
5004          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_pluginevents
5005              MODIFY pevt_event VARCHAR(40) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
5006          task_end();
5007          task_begin( '- Converting cron logs table...' );
5008          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_cron__log
5009              MODIFY clog_status enum('started','finished','error','timeout') COLLATE ascii_general_ci not null default 'started'" );
5010          task_end();
5011          task_begin( '- Converting countries table...' );
5012          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_regional__country
5013              MODIFY ctry_code   char(2) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL,
5014              MODIFY ctry_status enum( 'trusted', 'suspect', 'blocked' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL" );
5015          task_end();
5016          task_begin( '- Converting regions table...' );
5017          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_regional__region
5018              MODIFY rgn_code char(6) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
5019          task_end();
5020          task_begin( '- Converting subregions table...' );
5021          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_regional__subregion
5022              MODIFY subrg_code char(6) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
5023          task_end();
5024          task_begin( '- Converting cities table...' );
5025          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_regional__city
5026              MODIFY city_postcode char(12) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
5027          task_end();
5028          task_begin( '- Converting currencies table...' );
5029          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_regional__currency
5030              MODIFY curr_code char(3) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
5031          task_end();
5032          task_begin( '- Converting email logs table...' );
5033          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_email__log
5034              MODIFY emlog_to     VARCHAR(255) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT NULL,
5035              MODIFY emlog_result ENUM( 'ok', 'error', 'blocked' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'ok'" );
5036          task_end();
5037          task_begin( '- Converting email returns table...' );
5038          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_email__returns
5039              MODIFY emret_address   VARCHAR(255) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT NULL,
5040              MODIFY emret_errtype   CHAR(1) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'U'" );
5041          task_end();
5042          task_begin( '- Converting email addresses table...' );
5043          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_email__address
5044              MODIFY emadr_address VARCHAR(255) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT NULL,
5045              MODIFY emadr_status  ENUM( 'unknown', 'redemption', 'warning', 'suspicious1', 'suspicious2', 'suspicious3', 'prmerror', 'spammer' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'unknown'" );
5046          task_end();
5047          //    $DB->commit();
5048          task_end();
5049  
5050          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11260' );
5051      }
5052  
5053      if( $old_db_version < 11270 )
5054      { // part 16.i trunk aka 12th part of "i6"
5055  
5056          // IPv4 mapped IPv6 addresses maximum length is 45 chars: ex. ABCD:ABCD:ABCD:ABCD:ABCD:ABCD:192.168.158.190
5057          task_begin( 'Upgrading comments table...' );
5058          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_comments
5059              MODIFY comment_author_IP varchar(45) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default ''" );
5060          task_end();
5061          task_begin( 'Upgrading sessions table...' );
5062          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_sessions
5063              MODIFY sess_ipaddress VARCHAR(45) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT ''" );
5064          task_end();
5065  
5066          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11270' );
5067      }
5068  
5069      if( $old_db_version < 11280 )
5070      { // part 16.j trunk aka 12th part of "i6"
5071  
5072          task_begin( 'Upgrading hit logs table...' );
5073          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_hitlog
5074              MODIFY hit_remote_addr VARCHAR(45) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT NULL" );
5075          task_end();
5076  
5077          task_begin( 'Upgrading blogs table...' );
5078          db_drop_col( 'T_blogs', 'blog_UID' );
5079          task_end();
5080  
5081          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11280' );
5082      }
5083  
5084      if( $old_db_version < 11285 )
5085      { // part 16.k trunk aka 13th part of "i6"
5086  
5087          task_begin( 'Updating plugins table...' );
5088          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_plugins SET
5089              plug_code = CASE
5090                  WHEN plug_classname = "generic_ping_plugin"         THEN "b2evGPing"
5091                  WHEN plug_classname = "basic_antispam_plugin"       THEN "b2evBAspm"
5092                  WHEN plug_classname = "flowplayer_plugin"           THEN "b2evFlwP"
5093                  WHEN plug_classname = "html5_mediaelementjs_plugin" THEN "b2evH5MP"
5094                  WHEN plug_classname = "html5_videojs_plugin"        THEN "b2evH5VJSP"
5095                  ELSE plug_code
5096              END' );
5097          task_end();
5098  
5099          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11285' );
5100      }
5101  
5102      if( $old_db_version < 11286 )
5103      {    // part 16.l trunk aka 14th part of "i6"
5104  
5105          task_begin( 'Upgrade timestamp fields... ' );
5106          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_email__log
5107              MODIFY emlog_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\'' );
5108          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_email__returns
5109              MODIFY emret_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\'' );
5110          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_items__prerendering
5111              MODIFY itpr_datemodified TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\'' );
5112          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_comments__prerendering
5113              MODIFY cmpr_datemodified TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\'' );
5114          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_users__reports
5115              MODIFY urep_datetime datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\'' );
5116          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_items__version
5117              MODIFY iver_edit_datetime datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\'' );
5118          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_messaging__thread
5119              MODIFY thrd_datemodified datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\'' );
5120          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_messaging__message
5121              MODIFY msg_datetime datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\'' );
5122          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_messaging__contact
5123              MODIFY mct_last_contact_datetime datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\'' );
5124          task_end();
5125  
5126          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11286' );
5127      }
5128  
5129      if( $old_db_version < 11300 )
5130      { // part 17 trunk aka "i7"
5131  
5132          task_begin( 'Upgrading locales table...' );
5133          db_add_col( 'T_locales', 'loc_shorttimefmt', 'varchar(20) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default "H:i" AFTER loc_timefmt' );
5134          task_end();
5135          task_begin( 'Creating message prerendering cache table... ' );
5136          $DB->query( 'CREATE TABLE T_messaging__prerendering(
5137                  mspr_msg_ID              INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
5138                  mspr_format              ENUM("htmlbody","entityencoded","xml","text") COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL,
5139                  mspr_renderers           TEXT NOT NULL,
5140                  mspr_content_prerendered MEDIUMTEXT NULL,
5141                  mspr_datemodified        TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
5142                  PRIMARY KEY (mspr_msg_ID, mspr_format)
5143              ) ENGINE = innodb' );
5144          db_add_col( 'T_messaging__message', 'msg_renderers', 'TEXT NOT NULL' );
5145          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_messaging__message SET msg_renderers = "default"' );
5146          task_end();
5147  
5148          task_begin( 'Upgrading categories table...' );
5149          db_add_col( 'T_categories', 'cat_last_touched_ts', "TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT '2000-01-01 00:00:00'" );
5150          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_categories SET cat_last_touched_ts = (
5151              SELECT post_last_touched_ts
5152                FROM T_items__item
5153                     INNER JOIN T_postcats ON postcat_post_ID = post_ID
5154               WHERE postcat_cat_ID = cat_ID
5155               ORDER BY post_last_touched_ts DESC
5156               LIMIT 1 )' );
5157          task_end();
5158  
5159          task_begin( 'Create table for User post read status... ' );
5160          $DB->query( 'CREATE TABLE T_users__postreadstatus (
5161              uprs_user_ID int(11) unsigned NOT NULL,
5162              uprs_post_ID int(11) unsigned NOT NULL,
5163              uprs_read_post_ts TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\',
5164              uprs_read_comment_ts TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\',
5165              PRIMARY KEY ( uprs_user_ID, uprs_post_ID )
5166              ) ENGINE = innodb' );
5167          task_end();
5168  
5169          task_begin( 'Create table for System log... ' );
5170          $DB->query( "CREATE TABLE T_syslog (
5171              slg_ID        INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
5172              slg_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
5173              slg_origin    ENUM('core', 'plugin') COLLATE ascii_general_ci,
5174              slg_origin_ID INT UNSIGNED NULL,
5175              slg_object    ENUM('comment', 'item', 'user') COLLATE ascii_general_ci,
5176              slg_object_ID INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
5177              slg_message   VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
5178              PRIMARY KEY   (slg_ID),
5179              INDEX         slg_object (slg_object, slg_object_ID)
5180              ) ENGINE = myisam" );
5181          task_end();
5182  
5183          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11300' );
5184      }
5185  
5186      if( $old_db_version < 11310 )
5187      { // part 18 trunk aka second part of "i7"
5188  
5189          task_begin( 'Upgrading cron tasks table...' );
5190          load_funcs( 'cron/_cron.funcs.php' );
5191          $DB->begin();
5192          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_cron__task
5193              CHANGE COLUMN ctsk_controller ctsk_key varchar(50) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL AFTER ctsk_repeat_after,
5194              CHANGE COLUMN ctsk_name ctsk_name varchar(255) null COMMENT "Specific name of this task. This value is set only if this job name was modified by an admin user"' );
5195          // Update keys from controllers
5196          // Important: Cron job sql query result must be converted to ascii charset since the ctsk_key is already ascii( ascii_bin collation )
5197          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_cron__task
5198              INNER JOIN ( '.cron_job_sql_query( 'key,ctrl' ).' ) AS temp
5199                     ON ctsk_key = CONVERT( temp.task_ctrl USING ascii )
5200              SET ctsk_key = temp.task_key' );
5201          // Reset names to NULL if its are default
5202          $DB->query( $sql = 'UPDATE T_cron__task
5203              INNER JOIN ( '.cron_job_sql_query().' ) AS temp
5204                      ON ctsk_key = CONVERT( temp.task_key USING ascii ) AND ctsk_name = CONVERT( temp.task_name USING '.$DB->connection_charset.' )
5205              SET ctsk_name = NULL' );
5206          $DB->commit();
5207          task_end();
5208  
5209          task_begin( 'Upgrade table system log... ' );
5210          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_syslog
5211              CHANGE COLUMN slg_object slg_object ENUM(\'comment\', \'item\', \'user\', \'file\') COLLATE ascii_general_ci,
5212              CHANGE COLUMN slg_object_ID slg_object_ID INT UNSIGNED NULL,
5213              ADD    COLUMN slg_user_ID INT UNSIGNED NULL AFTER slg_timestamp,
5214              ADD    COLUMN slg_type ENUM(\'info\', \'warning\', \'error\', \'critical_error\') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT \'info\' AFTER slg_user_ID' );
5215          task_end();
5216  
5217          task_begin( 'Upgrade groups table... ' );
5218          db_add_col( 'T_groups', 'grp_level', 'int unsigned DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL AFTER grp_name' );
5219          $default_groups_levels = array(
5220                  'Administrators' => 10,
5221                  'Moderators' => 8,
5222                  'Trusted Users' => 6,
5223                  'Normal Users' => 4,
5224                  'Misbehaving/Suspect Users' => 2,
5225                  'Spammers/Restricted Users' => 1
5226              );
5227          // Build sql query to update group level depending on name
5228          $group_level_query = 'SELECT group_name, group_level FROM (';
5229          $first_task = true;
5230          foreach( $default_groups_levels as $def_group_name => $def_group_level )
5231          {
5232              if( $first_task )
5233              {
5234                  $group_level_query .= 'SELECT '.$DB->quote( $def_group_name ).' AS group_name, '.$DB->quote( $def_group_level ).' AS group_level';
5235                  $first_task = false;
5236              }
5237              else
5238              {
5239                  $group_level_query .= ' UNION SELECT '.$DB->quote( $def_group_name ).', '.$DB->quote( $def_group_level );
5240              }
5241          }
5242          $group_level_query .= ') AS inner_temp';
5243          // Set default levels depending on name
5244          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_groups
5245              INNER JOIN ( '.$group_level_query.' ) AS temp
5246                     ON grp_name = CONVERT( temp.group_name USING '.$DB->connection_charset.' )
5247                SET grp_level = temp.group_level' );
5248          // Set default '4' level for all other groups
5249          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_groups
5250                SET grp_level = 4
5251              WHERE grp_level = 0' );
5252          // Set default user permissions for Moderators group
5253          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_groups__groupsettings
5254                SET gset_value = "moderate"
5255              WHERE gset_name = "perm_users"
5256                AND gset_grp_ID = (SELECT grp_ID FROM T_groups WHERE grp_name = "Moderators")' );
5257          task_end();
5258  
5259          task_begin( 'Updating general settings...' );
5260          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_settings
5261                  SET set_value = '.$DB->quote( 'yes' ).'
5262              WHERE set_name = '.$DB->quote( 'newusers_canregister' ).'
5263                  AND set_value = '.$DB->quote( '1' ) );
5264          task_end();
5265  
5266          task_begin( 'Creating table for User invitation codes... ' );
5267          $DB->query( 'CREATE TABLE T_users__invitation_code (
5268              ivc_ID        int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment,
5269              ivc_code      varchar(32) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL,
5270              ivc_expire_ts TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\',
5271              ivc_source    varchar(30) NULL,
5272              ivc_grp_ID    int(4) NOT NULL,
5273              PRIMARY KEY ( ivc_ID ),
5274              UNIQUE ivc_code ( ivc_code )
5275          ) ENGINE = innodb' );
5276          task_end();
5277  
5278          task_begin( 'Creating table for User organizations... ' );
5279          $DB->query( 'CREATE TABLE T_users__organization (
5280              org_ID   INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
5281              org_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
5282              org_url  VARCHAR(2000) NULL,
5283              PRIMARY KEY ( org_ID ),
5284              UNIQUE org_name ( org_name )
5285          ) ENGINE = innodb' );
5286          task_end();
5287  
5288          task_begin( 'Creating table for relations users with organizations... ' );
5289          $DB->query( 'CREATE TABLE T_users__user_org (
5290              uorg_user_ID  INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
5291              uorg_org_ID   INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
5292              uorg_accepted TINYINT(1) DEFAULT 0,
5293              PRIMARY KEY ( uorg_user_ID, uorg_org_ID )
5294          ) ENGINE = innodb' );
5295          task_end();
5296  
5297          // Rename item settings:
5298          //   "post_custom_headers" to "metakeywords"
5299          //   "post_metadesc" to "metadesc"
5300          //   "post_expiry_delay" to "comment_expiry_delay"
5301          task_begin( 'Upgrading Item Settings...' );
5302          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_items__item_settings
5303                    SET iset_name = "metakeywords"
5304                  WHERE iset_name = "post_custom_headers"' );
5305          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_items__item_settings
5306                    SET iset_name = "metadesc"
5307                  WHERE iset_name = "post_metadesc"' );
5308          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_items__item_settings
5309                    SET iset_name = "comment_expiry_delay"
5310                  WHERE iset_name = "post_expiry_delay"' );
5311          task_end();
5312  
5313          task_begin( 'Upgrade table files... ' );
5314          db_add_col( 'T_files', 'file_type', "enum('image', 'audio', 'other') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER file_ID" );
5315          task_end();
5316  
5317          task_begin( 'Upgrade table posts... ' );
5318          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_items__item
5319              CHANGE post_title     post_title     VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
5320              CHANGE post_renderers post_renderers VARCHAR(255) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL' );
5321          task_end();
5322  
5323          task_begin( 'Upgrade table post prerendering cache... ' );
5324          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_items__prerendering
5325              CHANGE itpr_renderers itpr_renderers VARCHAR(255) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL' );
5326          task_end();
5327  
5328          task_begin( 'Upgrade table post versions... ' );
5329          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_items__version
5330              CHANGE iver_title iver_title VARCHAR(255) NULL' );
5331          task_end();
5332  
5333          task_begin( 'Upgrade table comments... ' );
5334          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_comments
5335              CHANGE comment_renderers comment_renderers VARCHAR(255) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL' );
5336          task_end();
5337  
5338          task_begin( 'Upgrade table comment prerendering cache... ' );
5339          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_comments__prerendering
5340              CHANGE cmpr_renderers cmpr_renderers VARCHAR(255) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL' );
5341          task_end();
5342  
5343          task_begin( 'Upgrade table messages... ' );
5344          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_messaging__message
5345              CHANGE msg_renderers msg_renderers VARCHAR(255) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL' );
5346          task_end();
5347  
5348          task_begin( 'Upgrade table message prerendering cache... ' );
5349          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_messaging__prerendering
5350              CHANGE mspr_renderers mspr_renderers VARCHAR(255) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL' );
5351          task_end();
5352  
5353          task_begin( 'Upgrade table user field definitions... ' );
5354          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_users__fielddefs
5355              CHANGE ufdf_options ufdf_options VARCHAR(255) NULL DEFAULT NULL' );
5356          // Change emtpy ufdf_options to NULL, since it must/may be defined only in case of the list ufdf_type
5357          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_users__fielddefs
5358              SET ufdf_options = NULL
5359              WHERE ufdf_options = "" AND ufdf_type != "list"');
5360          task_end();
5361  
5362          task_begin( 'Upgrade table cron tasks... ' );
5363          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_cron__task
5364              CHANGE ctsk_params ctsk_params varchar(255)' );
5365          task_end();
5366  
5367          task_begin( 'Upgrading users table...' );
5368          db_add_col( 'T_users', 'user_salt', 'CHAR(8) NOT NULL default "" AFTER user_pass' );
5369          task_end();
5370  
5371          task_begin( 'Updating users pass storage...' );
5372          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_users MODIFY COLUMN user_pass VARBINARY(32)' );
5373          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_users SET user_pass = UNHEX( user_pass )' );
5374          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_users MODIFY COLUMN user_pass BINARY(16) NOT NULL' );
5375          task_end();
5376  
5377          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11310' );
5378      }
5379  
5380      if( $old_db_version < 11320 )
5381      { // part 18.a trunk aka third part of "i7"
5382  
5383          task_begin( 'Update locales to utf-8 charset...' );
5384          db_drop_col( 'T_locales', 'loc_charset' );
5385          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_locales
5386              SET loc_name = REPLACE( loc_name, "latin1", "utf8" )
5387              WHERE loc_locale IN ( "en-US", "en-AU", "en-CA", "en-GB", "en-IL", "en-NZ", "en-SG" )' );
5388          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_users SET user_locale = "en-US" WHERE user_locale = "en-US-utf8"' );
5389          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_blogs SET blog_locale = "en-US" WHERE blog_locale = "en-US-utf8"' );
5390          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_items__item SET post_locale = "en-US" WHERE post_locale = "en-US-utf8"' );
5391          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_settings SET set_value = "en-US" WHERE set_name = "default_locale" AND set_value = "en-US-utf8"' );
5392          // Check if the 'en-US-utf8' locale is enabled
5393          $en_us_utf8_enabled = $DB->get_var( 'SELECT loc_enabled FROM T_locales WHERE loc_locale = "en-US-utf8"' );
5394          if( $en_us_utf8_enabled !== NULL )
5395          { // The 'en-US-utf8' was enabled we must enable the 'en-US' even if it was not enabled before because we merged the two locales into one
5396              $en_us_enabled = $DB->get_var( 'SELECT loc_enabled FROM T_locales WHERE loc_locale = "en-US"' );
5397              if( $en_us_enabled === NULL )
5398              { // Update "en-US-utf8" to "en-US"
5399                  $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_locales SET loc_locale = "en-US" WHERE loc_locale = "en-US-utf8"' );
5400              }
5401              elseif( $en_us_utf8_enabled && ( ! $en_us_enabled ) )
5402              { // Enable the "en-US" locale because it was not enabled but the "en-US-utf8" was
5403                  $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_locales SET loc_enabled = 1 WHERE loc_locale = "en-US"' );
5404              }
5405  
5406              if( $en_us_enabled !== NULL )
5407              { // Remove the "en-US-utf8" locale if the "en_US" locale is already in the database
5408                  $DB->query( 'DELETE FROM T_locales WHERE loc_locale = "en-US-utf8"' );
5409              }
5410          }
5411          task_end();
5412  
5413          task_begin( 'Upgrade table files... ' );
5414          db_add_col( 'T_files', 'file_can_be_main_profile', 'TINYINT(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1' );
5415          task_end();
5416  
5417          task_begin( 'Add new video file types... ' );
5418          $video_types = array(
5419                  'webm' => "( 'webm', 'WebM video file', 'video/webm', 'file_video', 'browser', 'registered' )",
5420                  'ogv'  => "( 'ogv', 'Ogg video file', 'video/ogg', 'file_video', 'browser', 'registered' )",
5421                  'm3u8' => "( 'm3u8', 'M3U8 video file', 'application/x-mpegurl', 'file_video', 'browser', 'registered' )"
5422              );
5423          $SQL = new SQL();
5424          $SQL->SELECT( 'ftyp_extensions' );
5425          $SQL->FROM( 'T_filetypes' );
5426          $SQL->WHERE( 'ftyp_extensions LIKE "%'.implode( '%" OR ftyp_extensions LIKE "%', array_keys( $video_types ) ).'%"' );
5427          $existing_video_types = $DB->get_col( $SQL->get() );
5428          if( ! empty( $existing_video_types ) )
5429          { // Some video types arleady exist in DB, Exclude them from inserting
5430              foreach( $existing_video_types as $vtype )
5431              {
5432                  unset( $video_types[ $vtype ] );
5433              }
5434          }
5435          if( count( $video_types ) )
5436          { // Insert new video file types
5437              $DB->query( "INSERT INTO T_filetypes
5438                  ( ftyp_extensions, ftyp_name, ftyp_mimetype, ftyp_icon, ftyp_viewtype, ftyp_allowed )
5439                  VALUES ".implode( ', ', $video_types ) );
5440          }
5441          task_end();
5442  
5443          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11320' );
5444      }
5445  
5446      if( $old_db_version < 11330 )
5447      { // part 18.b trunk aka 4th part of "i7"
5448  
5449          task_begin( 'Upgrade table blogs... ' );
5450          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_blogs
5451                SET blog_in_bloglist = "1"
5452              WHERE blog_in_bloglist > 0' );
5453          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_blogs
5454              CHANGE blog_in_bloglist blog_in_bloglist ENUM( "public", "logged", "member", "never" ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT "public" NOT NULL' );
5455          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_blogs
5456                SET blog_in_bloglist = "never"
5457              WHERE blog_in_bloglist = ""' );
5458          task_end();
5459  
5460          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11330' );
5461      }
5462  
5463      if( $old_db_version < 11340 )
5464      { // part 18.c trunk aka 5th part of "i7"
5465  
5466          task_begin( 'Upgrading blogs table...' );
5467          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_blogs
5468              MODIFY blog_type ENUM( 'main', 'std', 'photo', 'group', 'forum', 'manual' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT 'std' NOT NULL" );
5469          task_end();
5470  
5471          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11340' );
5472      }
5473  
5474      if( $old_db_version < 11350 )
5475      { // part 18.d trunk aka 6th part of "i7"
5476  
5477          task_begin( 'Update category ordering...' );
5478          $DB->query( 'REPLACE INTO T_coll_settings( cset_coll_ID, cset_name, cset_value )
5479                  SELECT blog_ID, "category_ordering", IFNULL( set_value, "alpha" )
5480                  FROM T_blogs LEFT JOIN T_settings ON set_name = "chapter_ordering"' );
5481          $DB->query( 'DELETE FROM T_settings WHERE set_name = "chapter_ordering"');
5482          db_add_col( 'T_categories', 'cat_subcat_ordering', "enum('parent', 'alpha', 'manual') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER cat_order" );
5483          task_end();
5484  
5485          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11350' );
5486      }
5487  
5488      if( $old_db_version < 11360 )
5489      { // part 18.e trunk aka 7th part of "i7"
5490  
5491          task_begin( 'Upgrade table posts... ' );
5492          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_items__item
5493              CHANGE post_ptyp_ID post_ityp_ID int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT 1');
5494          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_items__item
5495              DROP INDEX post_ptyp_ID');
5496          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_items__item
5497              ADD INDEX post_ityp_ID ( post_ityp_ID )');
5498          task_end();
5499  
5500          task_begin( 'Upgrade table post types... ' );
5501          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_items__type
5502              CHANGE ptyp_ID   ityp_ID   INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
5503              CHANGE ptyp_name ityp_name VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,
5504              ADD ityp_description       TEXT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
5505              ADD ityp_backoffice_tab    VARCHAR(30) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
5506              ADD ityp_template_name     VARCHAR(40) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
5507              ADD ityp_use_title         ENUM( 'required', 'optional', 'never' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT 'required',
5508              ADD ityp_use_url           ENUM( 'required', 'optional', 'never' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT 'optional',
5509              ADD ityp_use_text          ENUM( 'required', 'optional', 'never' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT 'optional',
5510              ADD ityp_allow_html        TINYINT DEFAULT 1,
5511              ADD ityp_allow_attachments TINYINT DEFAULT 1,
5512              ADD ityp_use_excerpt       ENUM( 'required', 'optional', 'never' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT 'optional',
5513              ADD ityp_use_title_tag     ENUM( 'required', 'optional', 'never' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT 'optional',
5514              ADD ityp_use_meta_desc     ENUM( 'required', 'optional', 'never' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT 'optional',
5515              ADD ityp_use_meta_keywds   ENUM( 'required', 'optional', 'never' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT 'optional',
5516              ADD ityp_use_tags          ENUM( 'required', 'optional', 'never' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT 'optional',
5517              ADD ityp_allow_featured    TINYINT DEFAULT 1,
5518              ADD ityp_use_country       ENUM( 'required', 'optional', 'never' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT 'never',
5519              ADD ityp_use_region        ENUM( 'required', 'optional', 'never' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT 'never',
5520              ADD ityp_use_sub_region    ENUM( 'required', 'optional', 'never' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT 'never',
5521              ADD ityp_use_city          ENUM( 'required', 'optional', 'never' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT 'never',
5522              ADD ityp_use_coordinates   ENUM( 'required', 'optional', 'never' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT 'never',
5523              ADD ityp_use_custom_fields TINYINT DEFAULT 1,
5524              ADD ityp_use_comments      TINYINT DEFAULT 1,
5525              ADD ityp_allow_closing_comments   TINYINT DEFAULT 1,
5526              ADD ityp_allow_disabling_comments TINYINT DEFAULT 0,
5527              ADD ityp_use_comment_expiration   ENUM( 'required', 'optional', 'never' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT 'optional'" );
5528          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_items__type SET
5529              ityp_backoffice_tab = CASE
5530                  WHEN ityp_ID = 1    THEN "Posts"
5531                  WHEN ityp_ID = 1000 THEN "Pages"
5532                  WHEN ityp_ID >= 1400 AND ityp_ID <= 1600 THEN "Intros"
5533                  WHEN ityp_ID = 2000 THEN "Podcasts"
5534                  WHEN ityp_ID = 3000 THEN "Sidebar links"
5535                  WHEN ityp_ID = 4000 THEN "Advertisement"
5536                  WHEN ityp_ID = 5000 THEN NULL
5537                  ELSE "Posts"
5538              END,
5539              ityp_template_name = CASE
5540                  WHEN ityp_ID = 1 OR ityp_ID = 2000 THEN "single"
5541                  WHEN ityp_ID = 1000 THEN "page"
5542                  ELSE NULL
5543              END' );
5544          task_end();
5545  
5546          task_begin( 'Adding new post types...' );
5547          $DB->begin();
5548          $new_item_types = array(
5549                  /* 'blog type' => array( 'min post type ID', 'title for new type' ) */
5550                  'manual' => array( 'type_ID' => 100, 'title' => 'Manual Page' ),
5551                  'forum'  => array( 'type_ID' => 200, 'title' => 'Forum Topic' ),
5552              );
5553          $item_types_insert_data = array();
5554          foreach( $new_item_types as $blog_type => $item_type_data )
5555          {
5556              $item_type_ID = $new_item_types[ $blog_type ]['type_ID'];
5557              while( $item_type_ID !== NULL )
5558              { // Find first free post type ID starting with 100
5559                  $free_item_type_ID = $item_type_ID;
5560                  $item_type_ID = $DB->get_var( 'SELECT ityp_ID FROM T_items__type WHERE ityp_ID = '.$DB->quote( $item_type_ID ) );
5561                  if( $item_type_ID === NULL )
5562                  { // Use this free ID for new type
5563                      $item_types_insert_data[] = '( '.$free_item_type_ID.', '.$DB->quote( $new_item_types[ $blog_type ]['title'] ).', "Posts", "single", 0 )';
5564                      $new_item_types[ $blog_type ]['new_type_ID'] = $free_item_type_ID;
5565                      break;
5566                  }
5567                  $item_type_ID++;
5568              }
5569          }
5570          if( count( $item_types_insert_data ) )
5571          {
5572              // Insert new post types
5573              $DB->query( 'INSERT INTO T_items__type ( ityp_ID, ityp_name, ityp_backoffice_tab, ityp_template_name, ityp_allow_html )
5574                          VALUES '.implode( ', ', $item_types_insert_data ) );
5575              // Update types of all post with "Post" type to new created (only for blogs with type 'forum' and 'manual')
5576              foreach( $new_item_types as $blog_type => $item_type_data )
5577              {
5578                  $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_items__item
5579                      INNER JOIN T_categories
5580                         ON post_main_cat_ID = cat_ID
5581                        AND post_ityp_ID = 1
5582                      INNER JOIN T_blogs
5583                         ON cat_blog_ID = blog_ID
5584                        AND blog_type = '.$DB->quote( $blog_type ).'
5585                        SET post_ityp_ID = '.$DB->quote( $item_type_data['new_type_ID'] ) );
5586              }
5587          }
5588          $DB->commit();
5589          task_end();
5590  
5591          task_begin( 'Upgrade table comments... ' );
5592          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_comments
5593              CHANGE comment_type comment_type enum('comment','linkback','trackback','pingback','meta') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'comment'" );
5594          task_end();
5595  
5596          task_begin( 'Creating table for custom fields of Post Types... ' );
5597          $DB->query( 'CREATE TABLE T_items__type_custom_field (
5598              itcf_ID      INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
5599              itcf_ityp_ID INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL,
5600              itcf_label   VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
5601              itcf_name    VARCHAR(255) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL,
5602              itcf_type    ENUM( \'double\', \'varchar\' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL,
5603              itcf_order   INT NULL,
5604              PRIMARY KEY ( itcf_ID ),
5605              UNIQUE itcf_ityp_ID_name( itcf_ityp_ID, itcf_name )
5606          ) ENGINE = innodb' );
5607  
5608          global $posttypes_perms;
5609          // Create post types for each blog that has at aleast one custom field
5610          $SQL = new SQL();
5611          $SQL->SELECT( '*' );
5612          $SQL->FROM( 'T_coll_settings' );
5613          $SQL->WHERE( 'cset_name LIKE '.$DB->quote( 'custom_%' ) );
5614          $SQL->ORDER_BY( 'cset_coll_ID' );
5615          $setting_rows = $DB->get_results( $SQL->get() );
5616          $custom_fields = array();
5617          $blog_setting_delete_data = array();
5618          $blog_setting_item_types = array();
5619          if( count( $setting_rows ) )
5620          { // Initialize an array of custom fields from blog settings
5621              foreach( $setting_rows as $setting_row )
5622              {
5623                  if( preg_match( '/custom_(double|varchar)\d+/', $setting_row->cset_name, $matches ) )
5624                  { // It is a custom field
5625                      if( ! isset( $custom_fields[ $setting_row->cset_coll_ID ] ) )
5626                      {
5627                          $custom_fields[ $setting_row->cset_coll_ID ] = array();
5628                      }
5629                      // Delete this blog setting
5630                      $blog_setting_delete_data[] = 'cset_coll_ID = '.$DB->quote( $setting_row->cset_coll_ID ).' AND cset_name = '.$DB->quote( $setting_row->cset_name );
5631  
5632                      $cf_type = $matches[1];
5633                      $cf_key = $setting_row->cset_value;
5634                      $cf_label = '';
5635                      $cf_name = '';
5636                      foreach( $setting_rows as $s_row )
5637                      {
5638                          if( $s_row->cset_name == 'custom_'.$cf_type.'_'.$cf_key )
5639                          { // Label
5640                              $cf_label = $s_row->cset_value;
5641                              // Delete this blog setting
5642                              $blog_setting_delete_data[] = 'cset_coll_ID = '.$DB->quote( $s_row->cset_coll_ID ).' AND cset_name = '.$DB->quote( $s_row->cset_name );
5643                          }
5644                          if( $s_row->cset_name == 'custom_fname_'.$cf_key )
5645                          { // Name
5646                              $cf_name = $s_row->cset_value;
5647                              // Delete this blog setting
5648                              $blog_setting_delete_data[] = 'cset_coll_ID = '.$DB->quote( $s_row->cset_coll_ID ).' AND cset_name = '.$DB->quote( $s_row->cset_name );
5649                          }
5650                      }
5651                      $custom_fields[ $setting_row->cset_coll_ID ][] = array(
5652                              'type'  => $cf_type,
5653                              'key'   => $cf_key,
5654                              'label' => $cf_label,
5655                              'name'  => $cf_name
5656                          );
5657                  }
5658              }
5659              if( count( $custom_fields ) )
5660              { // Create post type for each blog with custom fields
5661                  $BlogCache = & get_BlogCache();
5662                  $itypes_insert_data = array();
5663                  $item_type_max_ID = $DB->get_var( 'SELECT MAX( ityp_ID ) FROM T_items__type' ) + 1;
5664                  foreach( $custom_fields as $blog_ID => $c_fields )
5665                  {
5666                      if( ! ( $cf_Blog = $BlogCache->get_by_ID( $blog_ID, false, false ) ) )
5667                      { // Skip incorrect blog ID
5668                          continue;
5669                      }
5670                      $itypes_insert_data[] = '( '.$item_type_max_ID.', '
5671                          .$DB->quote( 'custom_'.$cf_Blog->get( 'shortname' ) ).', '
5672                          .'"Posts", '
5673                          .'"single", '
5674                          .$DB->quote( $cf_Blog->get_setting( 'require_title' ) == 'none' ? 'never' : $cf_Blog->get_setting( 'require_title' ) ).', '
5675                          .$DB->quote( intval( $cf_Blog->get_setting( 'allow_html_post' ) ) ).', '
5676                          .$DB->quote( $cf_Blog->get_setting( 'location_country' ) == 'hidden' ? 'never' : $cf_Blog->get_setting( 'location_country' ) ).', '
5677                          .$DB->quote( $cf_Blog->get_setting( 'location_region' ) == 'hidden' ? 'never' : $cf_Blog->get_setting( 'location_region' ) ).', '
5678                          .$DB->quote( $cf_Blog->get_setting( 'location_subregion' ) == 'hidden' ? 'never' : $cf_Blog->get_setting( 'location_subregion' ) ).', '
5679                          .$DB->quote( $cf_Blog->get_setting( 'location_city' ) == 'hidden' ? 'never' : $cf_Blog->get_setting( 'location_city' ) ).', '
5680                          .$DB->quote( $cf_Blog->get_setting( 'show_location_coordinates' ) ? 'optional' : 'never' ).', '
5681                          .$DB->quote( intval( $cf_Blog->get_setting( 'disable_comments_bypost' ) ) ).' )';
5682                      // Update default post type
5683                      $blog_setting_item_types[ $cf_Blog->ID ] = $item_type_max_ID;
5684                      $blog_categories = $DB->get_col( 'SELECT cat_ID FROM T_categories WHERE cat_blog_ID = '.$cf_Blog->ID );
5685                      if( count( $blog_categories ) )
5686                      { // Set new post type for each post
5687                          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_items__item SET post_ityp_ID = '.$item_type_max_ID.'
5688                              WHERE post_ityp_ID = 1
5689                                AND post_main_cat_ID IN ( '.implode( ', ', $blog_categories ).' )' );
5690  
5691                          if( ! empty( $posttypes_perms['page'] ) )
5692                          { // Find the Pages that have at least one defined custom field:
5693                              $pages_SQL = new SQL();
5694                              $pages_SQL->SELECT( 'post_ID' );
