5695                              $pages_SQL->FROM( 'T_items__item' );
5696                              $pages_SQL->FROM_add( 'INNER JOIN T_items__item_settings ON post_ID = iset_item_ID' );
5697                              $pages_SQL->WHERE( 'post_main_cat_ID IN ( '.implode( ', ', $blog_categories ).' )' );
5698                              $pages_SQL->WHERE_and( 'post_ityp_ID IN ( '.implode( ', ', $posttypes_perms['page'] ).' )' );
5699                              $pages_SQL->WHERE_and( 'iset_name LIKE '.$DB->quote( 'custom_double_%' )
5700                                                .' OR iset_name LIKE '.$DB->quote( 'custom_varchar_%' ) );
5701                              $pages_SQL->WHERE_and( 'iset_value != ""' );
5702                              $pages_SQL->GROUP_BY( 'post_ID' );
5703                              $pages_IDs = $DB->get_col( $pages_SQL->get() );
5704                              $page_type_max_ID = 0;
5705                              if( count( $pages_IDs ) > 0 )
5706                              { // We have the Pages that have the defined custom fields
5707                                  // Increase post type ID for new special post type for pages
5708                                  $page_type_max_ID = $item_type_max_ID + 1;
5709                                  $itypes_insert_data[] = '( '.$page_type_max_ID.', '
5710                                      .$DB->quote( 'page_'.$cf_Blog->get( 'shortname' ) ).', '
5711                                      .'"Pages", '
5712                                      .'"page", '
5713                                      .$DB->quote( $cf_Blog->get_setting( 'require_title' ) == 'none' ? 'never' : $cf_Blog->get_setting( 'require_title' ) ).', '
5714                                      .$DB->quote( intval( $cf_Blog->get_setting( 'allow_html_post' ) ) ).', '
5715                                      .$DB->quote( $cf_Blog->get_setting( 'location_country' ) == 'hidden' ? 'never' : $cf_Blog->get_setting( 'location_country' ) ).', '
5716                                      .$DB->quote( $cf_Blog->get_setting( 'location_region' ) == 'hidden' ? 'never' : $cf_Blog->get_setting( 'location_region' ) ).', '
5717                                      .$DB->quote( $cf_Blog->get_setting( 'location_subregion' ) == 'hidden' ? 'never' : $cf_Blog->get_setting( 'location_subregion' ) ).', '
5718                                      .$DB->quote( $cf_Blog->get_setting( 'location_city' ) == 'hidden' ? 'never' : $cf_Blog->get_setting( 'location_city' ) ).', '
5719                                      .$DB->quote( $cf_Blog->get_setting( 'show_location_coordinates' ) ? 'optional' : 'never' ).', '
5720                                      .$DB->quote( intval( $cf_Blog->get_setting( 'disable_comments_bypost' ) ) ).' )';
5721                                  foreach( $c_fields as $c_field )
5722                                  {
5723                                      // Insert custom field to get new ID
5724                                      $DB->query( 'INSERT INTO T_items__type_custom_field ( itcf_ityp_ID, itcf_label, itcf_name, itcf_type )
5725                                          VALUES ( '.$page_type_max_ID.', '
5726                                          .$DB->quote( $c_field['label'] ).', '
5727                                          .$DB->quote( $c_field['name'] ).', '
5728                                          .$DB->quote( $c_field['type'] ).' )' );
5729                                      $itcf_ID = $DB->insert_id;
5730                                      // Change the UID of the item settings to the new inserted itcf_ID (ID of the custom field)
5731                                      $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_items__item_settings
5732                                              SET iset_name = '.$DB->quote( 'custom_'.$c_field['type'].'_'.$itcf_ID ).'
5733                                          WHERE iset_item_ID IN ( '.implode( ', ', $pages_IDs ).' )
5734                                              AND iset_name = '.$DB->quote( 'custom_'.$c_field['type'].'_'.$c_field['key'] ) );
5735                                  }
5736                                  // Set new post type for each page
5737                                  $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_items__item SET post_ityp_ID = '.$page_type_max_ID.'
5738                                      WHERE post_ID IN ( '.implode( ', ', $pages_IDs ).' )' );
5739                              }
5740                          }
5741                      }
5742                      // Insert custom fields for standard posts (not pages)
5743                      foreach( $c_fields as $c_field )
5744                      {
5745                          // Insert custom field to get new ID
5746                          $DB->query( 'INSERT INTO T_items__type_custom_field ( itcf_ityp_ID, itcf_label, itcf_name, itcf_type )
5747                              VALUES ( '.$item_type_max_ID.', '
5748                              .$DB->quote( $c_field['label'] ).', '
5749                              .$DB->quote( $c_field['name'] ).', '
5750                              .$DB->quote( $c_field['type'] ).' )' );
5751                          $itcf_ID = $DB->insert_id;
5752                          // Change the UID of the item settings to the new inserted itcf_ID (ID of the custom field)
5753                          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_items__item_settings
5754                                  SET iset_name = '.$DB->quote( 'custom_'.$c_field['type'].'_'.$itcf_ID ).'
5755                              WHERE iset_name = '.$DB->quote( 'custom_'.$c_field['type'].'_'.$c_field['key'] ) );
5756                      }
5757                      // Increase post type ID for next
5758                      $item_type_max_ID += $page_type_max_ID > 0 ? 2 : 1;
5759                  }
5760                  // Insert post types
5761                  $DB->query( 'INSERT INTO T_items__type ( ityp_ID, ityp_name, ityp_backoffice_tab, ityp_template_name, ityp_use_title, ityp_allow_html, ityp_use_country, ityp_use_region, ityp_use_sub_region, ityp_use_city, ityp_use_coordinates, ityp_allow_disabling_comments )
5762                      VALUES '.implode( ', ', $itypes_insert_data ) );
5763                  // Delete old blog settings from DB (custom fields)
5764                  $blog_setting_delete_data[] = 'cset_name LIKE "count_custom_%"';
5765                  $DB->query( 'DELETE FROM T_coll_settings
5766                      WHERE ( '.implode( ') OR (', $blog_setting_delete_data ).' )' );
5767              }
5768          }
5769  
5770          // Update default post types
5771          $blogs = $DB->get_col( 'SELECT blog_ID FROM T_blogs' );
5772          $sql_update_blog_settings = array();
5773          foreach( $blogs as $blog_ID )
5774          {
5775              if( isset( $blog_setting_item_types[ $blog_ID ] ) )
5776              { // Set it from custom post type
5777                  $current_item_type = $blog_setting_item_types[ $blog_ID ];
5778              }
5779              else
5780              { // Set it from first non reserved post type
5781                  if( ! isset( $first_item_type ) )
5782                  {
5783                      $reserved_types = array();
5784                      foreach( $posttypes_perms as $r_types )
5785                      {
5786                          $reserved_types = array_merge( $reserved_types, $r_types );
5787                      }
5788                      $SQL = new SQL();
5789                      $SQL->SELECT( 'ityp_ID' );
5790                      $SQL->FROM( 'T_items__type' );
5791                      if( ! empty( $reserved_types ) )
5792                      {
5793                          $SQL->WHERE( 'ityp_ID NOT IN ( '.implode( ', ', $reserved_types ).' )' );
5794                      }
5795                      $SQL->ORDER_BY( 'ityp_ID' );
5796                      $SQL->LIMIT( '1' );
5797                      $first_item_type = $DB->get_var( $SQL->get() );;
5798                  }
5799                  $current_item_type = $first_item_type;
5800              }
5801              $sql_update_blog_settings[] = '( '.$DB->quote( $blog_ID ).', "default_post_type", '.$DB->quote( $current_item_type ).' )';
5802          }
5803          if( ! empty( $sql_update_blog_settings ) )
5804          { // Execute a query to update the blog settings
5805              $DB->query( 'REPLACE INTO T_coll_settings ( cset_coll_ID, cset_name, cset_value )
5806                  VALUES '.implode( ', ', $sql_update_blog_settings ) );
5807          }
5808          task_end();
5809  
5810          task_begin( 'Updating site settings... ' );
5811          if( $DB->get_var( 'SELECT set_value FROM T_settings WHERE set_name = "site_color"' ) === NULL )
5812          { // Set default site color only when it is not defined yet
5813              $DB->query( 'INSERT INTO T_settings ( set_name, set_value )'
5814                                  .' VALUES ( "site_color", "#ff8c0f" )' );
5815          }
5816          task_end();
5817  
5818          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11360' );
5819      }
5820  
5821      if( $old_db_version < 11370 )
5822      { // part 18.f trunk aka 8th part of "i7"
5823  
5824          task_begin( 'Updating user settings... ' );
5825          $DB->query( 'DELETE FROM T_users__usersettings WHERE uset_name = "admin_skin"' );
5826          task_end();
5827  
5828          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11370' );
5829      }
5830  
5831      if( $old_db_version < 11375 )
5832      { // part 18.g trunk aka 9th part of "i7"
5833  
5834          task_begin( 'Upgrade table user field definitions... ' );
5835          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_users__fielddefs
5836              ADD ufdf_icon_name varchar(100) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NULL' );
5837          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_users__fielddefs SET
5838              ufdf_icon_name = CASE
5839                  WHEN ufdf_name = "Yahoo IM"      THEN "fa fa-yahoo"
5840                  WHEN ufdf_name = "Skype"         THEN "fa fa-skype"
5841                  WHEN ufdf_name = "Main phone"    THEN "fa fa-phone"
5842                  WHEN ufdf_name = "Cell phone"    THEN "fa fa-mobile-phone"
5843                  WHEN ufdf_name = "Office phone"  THEN "fa fa-phone"
5844                  WHEN ufdf_name = "Home phone"    THEN "fa fa-phone"
5845                  WHEN ufdf_name = "Office FAX"    THEN "fa fa-fax"
5846                  WHEN ufdf_name = "Home FAX"      THEN "fa fa-fax"
5847                  WHEN ufdf_name = "Linkedin"      THEN "fa fa-linkedin fa-x-linkedin--nudge"
5848                  WHEN ufdf_name = "Twitter"       THEN "fa fa-twitter"
5849                  WHEN ufdf_name = "Facebook"      THEN "fa fa-facebook"
5850                  WHEN ufdf_name = "Flickr"        THEN "fa fa-flickr"
5851                  WHEN ufdf_name = "YouTube"       THEN "fa fa-youtube"
5852                  WHEN ufdf_name = "Digg"          THEN "fa fa-digg"
5853                  WHEN ufdf_name = "StumbleUpon"   THEN "fa fa-stumbleupon"
5854                  WHEN ufdf_name = "GitHub"        THEN "fa fa-github-alt"
5855                  WHEN ufdf_name = "Google Plus"   THEN "fa fa-google-plus fa-x-google-plus--nudge"
5856                  WHEN ufdf_name = "Pinterest"     THEN "fa fa-pinterest-p"
5857                  WHEN ufdf_name = "Main address"  THEN "fa fa-building"
5858                  WHEN ufdf_name = "Home address"  THEN "fa fa-home"
5859                  WHEN ufdf_name = "About me"      THEN "fa fa-info-circle"
5860                  WHEN ufdf_name = "I like"        THEN "fa fa-thumbs-o-up"
5861                  WHEN ufdf_name = "I don\'t like" THEN "fa fa-thumbs-o-down"
5862                  ELSE ufdf_icon_name
5863              END' );
5864          task_end();
5865  
5866          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11375' );
5867      }
5868  
5869      if( $old_db_version < 11380 )
5870      { // part 18.h trunk aka 10th part of "i7"
5871  
5872          task_begin( 'Update links table... ' );
5873          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_links
5874                SET link_position = "cover"
5875              WHERE link_position = "albumart"' );
5876          task_end();
5877  
5878          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11380' );
5879      }
5880  
5881      if( $old_db_version < 11390 )
5882      { // part 18.i trunk aka 11th part of "i7"
5883  
5884          task_begin( 'Upgrading table of relations users with organizations... ' );
5885          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_users__user_org
5886              ADD COLUMN uorg_role VARCHAR(255) NULL' );
5887          task_end();
5888  
5889          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11390' );
5890      }
5891  
5892      if( $old_db_version < 11400 )
5893      { // part 18.j trunk aka 12th part of "i7"
5894  
5895          task_begin( 'Upgrade table user field definitions... ' );
5896          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_users__fielddefs
5897              ADD ufdf_code varchar(20) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NULL' );
5898          $update_user_fields = array(
5899                  'Micro bio'     => 'microbio',
5900                  'I like'        => 'ilike',
5901                  'I don\'t like' => 'idontlike',
5902                  'MSN/Live IM'   => 'msnliveim',
5903                  'Yahoo IM'      => 'yahooim',
5904                  'AOL AIM'       => 'aolaim',
5905                  'ICQ ID'        => 'icqid',
5906                  'Skype'         => 'skype',
5907                  'Main phone'    => 'mainphone',
5908                  'Cell phone'    => 'cellphone',
5909                  'Office phone'  => 'officephone',
5910                  'Home phone'    => 'homephone',
5911                  'Office FAX'    => 'officefax',
5912                  'Home FAX'      => 'homefax',
5913                  'Twitter'       => 'twitter',
5914                  'Facebook'      => 'facebook',
5915                  'Google Plus'   => 'googleplus',
5916                  'Linkedin'      => 'linkedin',
5917                  'GitHub'        => 'github',
5918                  'Website'       => 'website',
5919                  'Blog'          => 'blog',
5920                  'Myspace'       => 'myspace',
5921                  'Flickr'        => 'flickr',
5922                  'YouTube'       => 'youtube',
5923                  'Digg'          => 'digg',
5924                  'StumbleUpon'   => 'stumbleupon',
5925                  'Pinterest'     => 'pinterest',
5926                  'Role'          => 'role',
5927                  'Organization'  => 'organization',
5928                  'Division'      => 'division',
5929                  'VAT ID'        => 'vatid',
5930                  'Main address'  => 'mainaddress',
5931                  'Home address'  => 'homeaddress',
5932              );
5933          foreach( $update_user_fields as $update_user_field_name => $update_user_field_code )
5934          {
5935              $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_users__fielddefs
5936                    SET ufdf_code = '.$DB->quote( $update_user_field_code ).'
5937                  WHERE ufdf_name = '.$DB->quote( $update_user_field_name ).'
5938                  LIMIT 1' ); // limit by 1 in order to update only first record to avoid the duplicate codes
5939          }
5940          // Update codes for all other unknown fields
5941          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_users__fielddefs
5942                  SET ufdf_code = CONCAT( "code_", ufdf_ID )
5943              WHERE ufdf_code IS NULL' );
5944          // Make code field unique
5945          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_users__fielddefs
5946              MODIFY ufdf_code varchar(20) COLLATE ascii_general_ci UNIQUE NOT NULL' );
5947          task_end();
5948  
5949          /*
5950           * ADD UPGRADES FOR i7 BRANCH __ABOVE__ IN THIS BLOCK.
5951           *
5952           * This part will be included in trunk and i7 branches
5953           */
5954  
5955          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11400' );
5956      }
5957  
5958      if( $old_db_version < 11410 )
5959      { // part 18.k trunk aka 13th part of "i7"
5960  
5961          task_begin( 'Upgrading skin names... ' );
5962          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_skins__skin 
5963                               SET skin_folder = CASE
5964                                      WHEN skin_folder = "bootstrap"        THEN "bootstrap_blog_skin"
5965                                      WHEN skin_folder = "bootstrap_main"   THEN "bootstrap_main_skin"
5966                                      WHEN skin_folder = "bootstrap_manual" THEN "bootstrap_manual_skin"
5967                                      ELSE skin_folder
5968              END' );
5969          task_end();
5970  
5971          /*
5972           * ADD UPGRADES FOR i7 BRANCH __ABOVE__ IN THIS BLOCK.
5973           *
5974           * This part will be included in trunk and i7 branches
5975           */
5976  
5977          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11410' );
5978      }
5979  
5980      if( $old_db_version < 11420 )
5981      { // part 18.l trunk aka 14th part of "i7"
5982  
5983          // This upgrade block restores all field collations that may have been broken by the back-office DB convert tool
5984          // to 'ascii_bin' and 'ascii_general_ci'
5985  
5986          task_begin( 'Updating hit log keyphrases table...' );
5987          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_track__keyphrase
5988              MODIFY keyp_phrase  VARCHAR( 255 ) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL' );
5989          task_end();
5990  
5991          task_begin( 'Check and normalize the ASCII charsets/collations... <br />' );
5992          task_begin( '- Converting skins table...' );
5993          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_skins__skin
5994              MODIFY skin_type enum('normal','feed','sitemap','mobile','tablet') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'normal'" );
5995          task_end();
5996          task_begin( '- Converting blogs table...' );
5997          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_blogs
5998              MODIFY blog_access_type    VARCHAR(10) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'extrapath',
5999              MODIFY blog_urlname        VARCHAR(255) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'urlname',
6000              MODIFY blog_in_bloglist    ENUM( 'public', 'logged', 'member', 'never' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT 'public' NOT NULL,
6001              MODIFY blog_media_location ENUM( 'default', 'subdir', 'custom', 'none' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT 'default' NOT NULL,
6002              MODIFY blog_type           ENUM( 'main', 'std', 'photo', 'group', 'forum', 'manual' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT 'std' NOT NULL" );
6003          task_end();
6004          task_begin( '- Converting blog settings table...' );
6005          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_coll_settings
6006              MODIFY cset_name VARCHAR( 50 ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL' );
6007          task_end();
6008          task_begin( '- Converting widgets table...' );
6009          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE {$tableprefix}widget
6010              MODIFY wi_type ENUM( 'core', 'plugin' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'core',
6011              MODIFY wi_code VARCHAR(32) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
6012          task_end();
6013          task_begin( '- Converting categories table...' );
6014          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_categories
6015              MODIFY cat_urlname varchar(255) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL,
6016              MODIFY cat_subcat_ordering enum('parent', 'alpha', 'manual') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL" );
6017          task_end();
6018          task_begin( '- Converting posts table...' );
6019          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_items__item
6020              MODIFY post_status               enum('published','community','deprecated','protected','private','review','draft','redirected') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'published',
6021              MODIFY post_urltitle             VARCHAR(210) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL,
6022              MODIFY post_notifications_status ENUM('noreq','todo','started','finished') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'noreq',
6023              MODIFY post_comment_status       ENUM('disabled', 'open', 'closed') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'open',
6024              MODIFY post_renderers            VARCHAR(255) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
6025          task_end();
6026          task_begin( '- Converting comments table...' );
6027          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_comments
6028              MODIFY comment_type         enum('comment','linkback','trackback','pingback','meta') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'comment',
6029              MODIFY comment_status       ENUM('published','community','deprecated','protected','private','review','draft','trash') COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT 'published' NOT NULL,
6030              MODIFY comment_author_email varchar(255) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NULL,
6031              MODIFY comment_author_IP    varchar(45) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default '',
6032              MODIFY comment_renderers    VARCHAR(255) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL,
6033              MODIFY comment_secret       CHAR(32) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NULL default NULL,
6034              MODIFY comment_notif_status ENUM('noreq','todo','started','finished') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'noreq' COMMENT 'Have notifications been sent for this comment? How far are we in the process?'" );
6035          task_end();
6036          task_begin( '- Converting post prerendered contents table...' );
6037          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_items__prerendering
6038              MODIFY itpr_format    ENUM('htmlbody','entityencoded','xml','text') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL,

6040          task_end();

6044              MODIFY cmpr_renderers VARCHAR(255) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
6045          task_end();

6047          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_items__version
6048              MODIFY iver_status ENUM('published','community','deprecated','protected','private','review','draft','redirected') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NULL" );
6049          task_end();
6050          task_begin( '- Converting post types table...' );
6051          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_items__type
6052              MODIFY ityp_use_title              ENUM( 'required', 'optional', 'never' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT 'required',
6053              MODIFY ityp_use_url                ENUM( 'required', 'optional', 'never' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT 'optional',
6054              MODIFY ityp_use_text               ENUM( 'required', 'optional', 'never' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT 'optional',
6055              MODIFY ityp_use_excerpt            ENUM( 'required', 'optional', 'never' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT 'optional',
6056              MODIFY ityp_use_title_tag          ENUM( 'required', 'optional', 'never' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT 'optional',
6057              MODIFY ityp_use_meta_desc          ENUM( 'required', 'optional', 'never' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT 'optional',

6062              MODIFY ityp_use_sub_region         ENUM( 'required', 'optional', 'never' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT 'never',

6064              MODIFY ityp_use_coordinates        ENUM( 'required', 'optional', 'never' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT 'never',

6075          task_end();

6078              MODIFY bloguser_perm_poststatuses set('review','draft','private','protected','deprecated','community','published','redirected') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default '',
6079              MODIFY bloguser_perm_edit         ENUM('no','own','lt','le','all','redirected') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'no',
6080              MODIFY bloguser_perm_cmtstatuses  set('review','draft','private','protected','deprecated','community','published') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default '',
6081              MODIFY bloguser_perm_edit_cmt     ENUM('no','own','anon','lt','le','all') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'no'" );
6082          task_end();
6083          task_begin( '- Converting group permissions table...' );
6084          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_coll_group_perms
6085              MODIFY bloggroup_perm_poststatuses set('review','draft','private','protected','deprecated','community','published','redirected') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default '',
6086              MODIFY bloggroup_perm_edit         ENUM('no','own','lt','le','all','redirected') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'no',
6087              MODIFY bloggroup_perm_cmtstatuses  set('review','draft','private','protected','deprecated','community','published') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default '',
6088              MODIFY bloggroup_perm_edit_cmt     ENUM('no','own','anon','lt','le','all') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'no'" );
6089          task_end();

6091          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_links
6092              MODIFY link_position varchar(10) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
6093          task_end();

6096              MODIFY file_type      enum('image', 'audio', 'other') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL,
6097              MODIFY file_root_type enum('absolute','user','collection','shared','skins','import') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'absolute'" );
6098          task_end();
6099          task_begin( '- Converting file types table...' );
6100          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_filetypes
6101              MODIFY ftyp_extensions varchar(30) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL,
6102              MODIFY ftyp_viewtype   varchar(10) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL,
6103              MODIFY ftyp_allowed    enum('any','registered','admin') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'admin'" );
6104          task_end();
6105          task_begin( '- Converting messages table...' );
6106          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_messaging__message
6107              MODIFY msg_renderers VARCHAR(255) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
6108          task_end();

6110          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_messaging__prerendering
6111              MODIFY mspr_format    ENUM('htmlbody','entityencoded','xml','text') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL,
6112              MODIFY mspr_renderers VARCHAR(255) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
6113          task_end();
6114          task_begin( '- Converting sessions table...' );
6115          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_sessions
6116              MODIFY sess_key       CHAR(32) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NULL,
6117              MODIFY sess_ipaddress VARCHAR(45) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
6118              MODIFY sess_device    VARCHAR(8) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT ''" );
6119          task_end();
6120          task_begin( '- Converting domains table...' );
6121          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_basedomains
6122              MODIFY dom_status ENUM('unknown','trusted','suspect','blocked') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'unknown',
6123              MODIFY dom_type   ENUM('unknown','normal','searcheng','aggregator','email') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'unknown'" );
6124          task_end();
6125          task_begin( '- Converting logs table...' );
6126          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_hitlog
6127              MODIFY hit_ctrl         VARCHAR(30) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT NULL,
6128              MODIFY hit_type         ENUM('standard','rss','admin','ajax', 'service') COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT 'standard' NOT NULL,
6129              MODIFY hit_referer_type ENUM('search','special','spam','referer','direct','self') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL,
6130              MODIFY hit_remote_addr  VARCHAR(45) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT NULL,
6131              MODIFY hit_agent_type   ENUM('robot','browser','unknown') COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT 'unknown' NOT NULL" );
6132          task_end();
6133          task_begin( '- Converting goal categories table...' );
6134          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_track__goalcat
6135              MODIFY gcat_color  char(7) COLLATE ascii_general_ci default NULL" );
6136          task_end();
6137          task_begin( '- Converting groups table...' );
6138          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_groups
6139              MODIFY grp_perm_blogs                  enum('user','viewall','editall') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'user',
6140              MODIFY grp_perm_xhtmlvalidation        VARCHAR(10) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'always',
6141              MODIFY grp_perm_xhtmlvalidation_xmlrpc VARCHAR(10) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'always',
6142              MODIFY grp_perm_stats                  enum('none','user','view','edit') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'none'" );
6143          task_end();
6144          task_begin( '- Converting group settings table...' );
6145          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_groups__groupsettings
6146              MODIFY gset_name VARCHAR(30) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
6147          task_end();
6148          task_begin( '- Converting settings table...' );
6149          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_settings
6150              MODIFY set_name VARCHAR(30) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
6151          task_end();
6152          task_begin( '- Converting cache table...' );
6153          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_global__cache
6154              MODIFY cach_name VARCHAR(30) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
6155          task_end();
6156          task_begin( '- Converting users table...' );
6157          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_users
6158              MODIFY user_email           varchar(255) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL,
6159              MODIFY user_status          enum( 'activated', 'autoactivated', 'closed', 'deactivated', 'emailchanged', 'failedactivation', 'new' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'new',
6160              MODIFY user_unsubscribe_key CHAR(32) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default '' COMMENT 'A specific key, it is used when a user wants to unsubscribe from a post comments without signing in',
6161              MODIFY user_gender          char(1) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NULL" );
6162          task_end();
6163          task_begin( '- Converting user fields table...' );
6164          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_users__fielddefs
6165              MODIFY ufdf_type       char(8) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL,
6166              MODIFY ufdf_required   enum('hidden','optional','recommended','require') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'optional',
6167              MODIFY ufdf_duplicated enum('forbidden','allowed','list') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'allowed',
6168              MODIFY ufdf_icon_name  varchar(100) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NULL,
6169              MODIFY ufdf_code       varchar(20) COLLATE ascii_general_ci UNIQUE NOT NULL" );
6170          task_end();
6171          task_begin( '- Converting user reports table...' );
6172          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_users__reports
6173              MODIFY urep_status enum( 'fake', 'guidelines', 'harass', 'spam', 'other' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci" );
6174          task_end();
6175          task_begin( '- Converting user invitation codes table...' );
6176          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_users__invitation_code
6177              MODIFY ivc_code varchar(32) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
6178          task_end();
6179          task_begin( '- Converting locales table...' );
6180          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_locales
6181              MODIFY loc_datefmt varchar(20) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'y-m-d',
6182              MODIFY loc_timefmt varchar(20) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'H:i:s',
6183              MODIFY loc_shorttimefmt varchar(20) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'H:i'" );
6184          task_end();
6185          task_begin( '- Converting antispam table...' );
6186          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE {$tableprefix}antispam
6187              MODIFY aspm_source enum( 'local','reported','central' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'reported'" );
6188          task_end();
6189          task_begin( '- Converting IP ranges table...' );
6190          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_antispam__iprange
6191              MODIFY aipr_status enum( 'trusted', 'suspect', 'blocked' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL" );
6192          task_end();
6193          task_begin( '- Converting user settings table...' );
6194          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_users__usersettings
6195              MODIFY uset_name VARCHAR( 30 ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
6196          task_end();
6197          task_begin( '- Converting plugins table...' );
6198          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_plugins
6199              MODIFY plug_classname VARCHAR(40) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default '',
6200              MODIFY plug_code      VARCHAR(32) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NULL,
6201              MODIFY plug_version   VARCHAR(42) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default '0',
6202              MODIFY plug_status    ENUM( 'enabled', 'disabled', 'needs_config', 'broken' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
6203          task_end();
6204          task_begin( '- Converting plugin settings table...' );
6205          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_pluginsettings
6206              MODIFY pset_name VARCHAR( 30 ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
6207          task_end();
6208          task_begin( '- Converting plugin user settings table...' );
6209          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_pluginusersettings
6210              MODIFY puset_name VARCHAR( 30 ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
6211          task_end();
6212          task_begin( '- Converting plugin events table...' );
6213          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_pluginevents
6214              MODIFY pevt_event VARCHAR(40) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
6215          task_end();
6216          task_begin( '- Converting cron tasks table...' );
6217          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_cron__task
6218              MODIFY ctsk_key varchar(50) COLLATE ascii_general_ci not null" );
6219          task_end();
6220          task_begin( '- Converting cron logs table...' );
6221          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_cron__log
6222              MODIFY clog_status enum('started','finished','error','timeout') COLLATE ascii_general_ci not null default 'started'" );
6223          task_end();
6224          task_begin( '- Converting countries table...' );
6225          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_regional__country
6226              MODIFY ctry_code   char(2) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL,
6227              MODIFY ctry_status enum( 'trusted', 'suspect', 'blocked' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL" );
6228          task_end();
6229          task_begin( '- Converting regions table...' );
6230          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_regional__region
6231              MODIFY rgn_code char(6) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
6232          task_end();
6233          task_begin( '- Converting subregions table...' );
6234          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_regional__subregion
6235              MODIFY subrg_code char(6) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
6236          task_end();
6237          task_begin( '- Converting cities table...' );
6238          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_regional__city
6239              MODIFY city_postcode char(12) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
6240          task_end();
6241          task_begin( '- Converting currencies table...' );
6242          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_regional__currency
6243              MODIFY curr_code char(3) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL" );
6244          task_end();
6245          task_begin( '- Converting slugs table...' );
6246          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_slug
6247              MODIFY slug_title varchar(255) COLLATE ascii_bin NOT NULL,
6248              MODIFY slug_type    char(6) COLLATE ascii_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT 'item'" );
6249          task_end();
6250          task_begin( '- Converting email logs table...' );
6251          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_email__log
6252              MODIFY emlog_to     VARCHAR(255) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT NULL,
6253              MODIFY emlog_result ENUM( 'ok', 'error', 'blocked' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'ok'" );
6254          task_end();
6255          task_begin( '- Converting email returns table...' );
6256          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_email__returns
6257              MODIFY emret_address   VARCHAR(255) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT NULL,
6258              MODIFY emret_errtype   CHAR(1) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'U'" );
6259          task_end();
6260          task_begin( '- Converting email addresses table...' );
6261          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_email__address
6262              MODIFY emadr_address VARCHAR(255) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT NULL,
6263              MODIFY emadr_status  ENUM( 'unknown', 'redemption', 'warning', 'suspicious1', 'suspicious2', 'suspicious3', 'prmerror', 'spammer' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'unknown'" );
6264          task_end();
6265          task_begin( '- Converting system log table...' );
6266          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_syslog
6267              MODIFY slg_type   ENUM('info', 'warning', 'error', 'critical_error') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'info',
6268              MODIFY slg_origin ENUM('core', 'plugin') COLLATE ascii_general_ci,
6269              MODIFY slg_object ENUM('comment', 'item', 'user', 'file') COLLATE ascii_general_ci" );
6270          task_end();
6271          task_end();
6272  
6273          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11420' );
6274      }
6275  
6276      if( $old_db_version < 11430 )
6277      { // part 18.m trunk aka 15th part of "i7"
6278  
6279          task_begin( 'Upgrading tags table...' );
6280          // Get all tags that contain not ascii chars, because some mysql versions cannot convert them correctly to utf8_bin
6281          $not_ascii_tags = $DB->get_results( 'SELECT *
6282               FROM T_items__tag
6283              WHERE tag_name NOT REGEXP "^[A-Za-z0-9_\-\s]+$"' );
6284          foreach( $not_ascii_tags as $not_ascii_tag )
6285          { // Replace each not ascii char with "_" in tag name in order to avoid error on below table upgrading
6286              $ascii_tag_name = preg_replace( '/[^A-Za-z0-9_\-\s]/', '_', $not_ascii_tag->tag_name );
6287              $ascii_tag_name = str_replace( '__', '_', $ascii_tag_name );
6288  
6289              if( $ascii_tag_name == $not_ascii_tag->tag_name )
6290              { // Skip this tag name because it doesn't contain not ascii chars really
6291                  continue;
6292              }
6293  
6294              // Check tag name for uniqueness
6295              $c = 1;
6296              $new_tag_name = $ascii_tag_name;
6297              while( $DB->get_var( 'SELECT tag_ID
6298                   FROM T_items__tag
6299                  WHERE tag_name = '.$DB->quote( $new_tag_name ) ) )
6300              {
6301                  $new_tag_name = $ascii_tag_name.$c;
6302                  $c++;
6303              }
6304  
6305              // Update tag name to new value without not ascii chars
6306              $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_items__tag
6307                    SET tag_name = '.$DB->quote( $new_tag_name ).'
6308                  WHERE tag_ID = '.$not_ascii_tag->tag_ID );
6309          }
6310          // Remove the empty tags
6311          $empty_tag_IDs = $DB->get_col( 'SELECT tag_ID FROM T_items__tag
6312              WHERE tag_name = ""' );
6313          if( ! empty( $empty_tag_IDs ) )
6314          {
6315              $DB->query( 'DELETE FROM T_items__tag
6316                  WHERE tag_ID IN ( '.$DB->quote( $empty_tag_IDs ).' ) ' );
6317              $DB->query( 'DELETE FROM T_items__itemtag
6318                  WHERE itag_tag_ID IN ( '.$DB->quote( $empty_tag_IDs ).' ) ' );
6319          }
6320          // Upgrade field "tag_name" from varbinary to varchar utf8_bin
6321          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_items__tag
6322              MODIFY tag_name VARCHAR(50) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL' ); // Allow multiple special char variations for each tag
6323          task_end();
6324  
6325          task_begin( 'Upgrading collection user/group permissions tables...' );
6326          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_coll_user_perms
6327              MODIFY bloguser_perm_edit ENUM('no','own','lt','le','all') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'no'" );
6328          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_coll_group_perms
6329              MODIFY bloggroup_perm_edit ENUM('no','own','lt','le','all') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'no'" );
6330          task_end();
6331  
6332          // fp> Note: do NOT put back and "add upgrades" comment here. The comment is OUTSIDE of the block now!
6333  
6334          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11430' );
6335      }
6336  
6337      if( $old_db_version < 11440 )
6338      { // part 18.n trunk aka 16th part of "i7"
6339  
6340          task_begin( 'Upgrading base domains table...' );
6341          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_basedomains
6342              MODIFY dom_name VARCHAR(250) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT ''" );
6343          task_end();
6344  
6345          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11440' );
6346      }
6347  
6348      if( $old_db_version < 11450 )
6349      { // part 18.o trunk aka 17th part of "i7"
6350  
6351          task_begin( 'Upgrading blog-group permissions table...' );
6352          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_coll_group_perms
6353              ADD COLUMN bloggroup_perm_item_type ENUM('standard','restricted','admin') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'standard' AFTER bloggroup_perm_poststatuses,
6354              DROP COLUMN bloggroup_perm_page,
6355              DROP COLUMN bloggroup_perm_intro,
6356              DROP COLUMN bloggroup_perm_podcast,
6357              DROP COLUMN bloggroup_perm_sidebar" );
6358          task_end();
6359  
6360          task_begin( 'Upgrading blog-user permissions table...' );
6361          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_coll_user_perms
6362              ADD COLUMN bloguser_perm_item_type ENUM('standard','restricted','admin') COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'standard' AFTER bloguser_perm_poststatuses,
6363              DROP COLUMN bloguser_perm_page,
6364              DROP COLUMN bloguser_perm_intro,
6365              DROP COLUMN bloguser_perm_podcast,
6366              DROP COLUMN bloguser_perm_sidebar" );
6367          task_end();
6368  
6369          task_begin( 'Upgrade post types table... ' );
6370          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_items__type
6371              ADD COLUMN ityp_perm_level ENUM( 'standard', 'restricted', 'admin' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL default 'standard'" );
6372          task_end();
6373  
6374          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11450' );
6375      }
6376  
6377      if( $old_db_version < 11460 )
6378      { // part 18.p trunk aka 18th part of "i7"
6379  
6380          task_begin( 'Creating table for PostType-to-Collection relationships...' );
6381          $DB->query( "CREATE TABLE T_items__type_coll (
6382              itc_ityp_ID int(11) unsigned NOT NULL,
6383              itc_coll_ID int(11) unsigned NOT NULL,
6384              PRIMARY KEY (itc_ityp_ID, itc_coll_ID),
6385              UNIQUE itemtypecoll ( itc_ityp_ID, itc_coll_ID )
6386          ) ENGINE = innodb" );
6387          task_end();
6388  
6389          task_begin( 'Updating collection permissions... ' );
6390          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_coll_group_perms
6391                SET bloggroup_perm_item_type = "restricted"
6392              WHERE bloggroup_perm_item_type = "standard"' );
6393          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_coll_user_perms
6394                SET bloguser_perm_item_type = "restricted"
6395              WHERE bloguser_perm_item_type = "standard"' );
6396          task_end();
6397  
6398          task_begin( 'Updating post types table... ' );
6399          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_items__type SET
6400              ityp_perm_level = CASE
6401                  WHEN ityp_ID = "1"    THEN "standard"
6402                  WHEN ityp_ID = "100"  THEN "standard"
6403                  WHEN ityp_ID = "200"  THEN "standard"
6404                  WHEN ityp_ID = "1000" THEN "restricted"
6405                  WHEN ityp_ID = "1400" THEN "restricted"
6406                  WHEN ityp_ID = "1500" THEN "restricted"
6407                  WHEN ityp_ID = "1520" THEN "restricted"
6408                  WHEN ityp_ID = "1530" THEN "restricted"
6409                  WHEN ityp_ID = "1570" THEN "restricted"
6410                  WHEN ityp_ID = "1600" THEN "restricted"
6411                  WHEN ityp_ID = "2000" THEN "standard"
6412                  WHEN ityp_ID = "3000" THEN "admin"
6413                  WHEN ityp_ID = "4000" THEN "admin"
6414                  ELSE ityp_perm_level
6415              END' );
6416          task_end();
6417  
6418          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11460' );
6419      }
6420  
6421      if( $old_db_version < 11470 )
6422      { // part 18.r trunk aka 19th part of "i7"
6423  
6424          task_begin( 'Updating widgets table... ' );
6425          // Disable all widgets of Menu container for all "Main" collections
6426          $DB->query( 'UPDATE '.$tableprefix.'widget
6427              INNER JOIN T_blogs ON blog_ID = wi_coll_ID AND blog_type = "main"
6428                SET wi_enabled = 0
6429              WHERE wi_sco_name = "Menu"' );
6430          task_end();
6431  
6432          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11470' );
6433      }
6434  
6435      if( $old_db_version < 11480 )
6436      { // part 18.s trunk aka 20th part of "i7"
6437  
6438          task_begin( 'Updating table for PostType-to-Collection relationships... ' );
6439          // Get all collections:
6440          $collections_SQL = new SQL();
6441          $collections_SQL->SELECT( 'blog_ID, blog_type' );
6442          $collections_SQL->FROM( 'T_blogs' );
6443          $collections = $DB->get_assoc( $collections_SQL->get() );
6444          // Get all post types:
6445          $posttypes_SQL = new SQL();
6446          $posttypes_SQL->SELECT( 'ityp_ID' );
6447          $posttypes_SQL->FROM( 'T_items__type' );
6448          $posttypes = $DB->get_col( $posttypes_SQL->get() );
6449          // Enable post types for the collections:
6450          $posttypes_collections = array();
6451          foreach( $collections as $collection_ID => $collection_type )
6452          {
6453              switch( $collection_type )
6454              { // Set what post types should not be enabled depending on the collection type:
6455                  case 'main':
6456                  case 'photo':
6457                      $skip_posttypes = array( 100, 200, 2000, 5000 );
6458                      break;
6459                  case 'forum':
6460                      $skip_posttypes = array( 1, 100, 2000, 5000 );
6461                      break;
6462                  case 'manual':
6463                      $skip_posttypes = array( 1, 200, 2000, 5000 );
6464                      break;
6465                  default: // 'std'
6466                      $skip_posttypes = array( 100, 200, 5000 );
6467                      break;
6468              }
6469              foreach( $posttypes as $posttype_ID )
6470              {
6471                  if( in_array( $posttype_ID, $skip_posttypes ) )
6472                  { // Skip(Don't enable) this post type for the collection:
6473                      continue;
6474                  }
6475                  $posttypes_collections[] = '( '.$posttype_ID.', '.$collection_ID.' )';
6476              }
6477          }
6478          if( count( $posttypes_collections ) )
6479          { // Update the relationships only when at least one is required:
6480              $DB->query( 'REPLACE INTO T_items__type_coll
6481                  ( itc_ityp_ID, itc_coll_ID )
6482                  VALUES '.implode( ', ', $posttypes_collections ) );
6483          }
6484          task_end();
6485  
6486          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11480' );
6487      }
6488  
6489      if( $old_db_version < 11482 )
6490      { // v6.6.3
6491          task_begin( 'Updating default post types for forums and manual collections... ' );
6492          $item_types = array(
6493                  'manual' => array( 'ID' => 100, 'name' => 'Manual Page' ),
6494                  'forum'  => array( 'ID' => 200, 'name' => 'Forum Topic' ),
6495              );
6496          $update_default_type_sql = array();
6497          foreach( $item_types as $collection_type => $item_type )
6498          {
6499              // Try to find an item type by ID or name:
6500              $item_type_ID = $DB->get_var( 'SELECT ityp_ID
6501                   FROM T_items__type
6502                  WHERE ityp_ID = '.$item_type['ID'].'
6503                     OR ityp_name = '.$DB->quote( $item_type['name'] ) );
6504              if( empty( $item_type_ID ) )
6505              { // Item type is not found in DB, Skip it:
6506                  continue;
6507              }
6508              // Get all collections with type:
6509              $type_collection_IDs = $DB->get_col( 'SELECT blog_ID
6510                   FROM T_blogs
6511                  WHERE blog_type = '.$DB->quote( $collection_type ) );
6512              foreach( $type_collection_IDs as $type_collection_ID )
6513              {
6514                  $update_default_type_sql[] = '( '.$type_collection_ID.', "default_post_type", '.$DB->quote( $item_type_ID ).' )';
6515              }
6516          }
6517          if( count( $update_default_type_sql ) > 0 )
6518          { // Update default post types of collections:
6519              $DB->query( 'REPLACE INTO T_coll_settings ( cset_coll_ID, cset_name, cset_value )
6520                  VALUES '.implode( ',', $update_default_type_sql ) );
6521          }
6522          task_end();
6523  
6524          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11482' );
6525      }
6526  
6527      if( $old_db_version < 11483 )
6528      { // v6.6.4
6529  
6530          task_begin( 'Updating general settings...' );
6531          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_settings
6532                  SET set_value = '.$DB->quote( 'no' ).'
6533              WHERE set_name = '.$DB->quote( 'newusers_canregister' ).'
6534                  AND set_value = '.$DB->quote( '0' ) );
6535          task_end();
6536  
6537          task_begin( 'Updating user settings...' );
6538          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_users__usersettings CHANGE COLUMN uset_name uset_name VARCHAR( 50 ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL' );
6539          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_pluginusersettings CHANGE COLUMN puset_name puset_name VARCHAR( 50 ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci NOT NULL' );
6540           task_end();
6541  
6542          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11483' );
6543      }
6544  
6545      if( $old_db_version < 11484 )
6546      { // part 2 of v6.6.4
6547  
6548          task_begin( 'Upgrade table item types... ' );
6549          $DB->query( "ALTER TABLE T_items__type
6550              ADD ityp_use_parent ENUM( 'required', 'optional', 'never' ) COLLATE ascii_general_ci DEFAULT 'never' AFTER ityp_use_url" );
6551          task_end();
6552  
6553          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11484' );
6554      }
6555  
6556      if( $old_db_version < 11485 )
6557      {    // v6.6.6
6558  
6559          task_begin( 'Upgrade table item types... ' );
6560          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_items__type
6561              ADD ityp_allow_breaks TINYINT DEFAULT 1 AFTER ityp_allow_html' );
6562          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_items__type
6563              SET ityp_allow_breaks = 0,
6564                  ityp_allow_featured = 0
6565              WHERE ityp_ID >= 1400
6566                AND ityp_ID <= 1600' );
6567          task_end();
6568  
6569          set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11485' );
6570      }
6571  
6572      if( $old_db_version < 11486 )
6573      {    // part 2 of v6.6.6
6574  
6575          task_begin( 'Upgrade timestamp fields... ' );
6576          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_email__log
6577              MODIFY emlog_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\'' );
6578          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_email__returns
6579              MODIFY emret_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\'' );
6580          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_syslog
6581              MODIFY slg_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\'' );
6582          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_items__prerendering
6583              MODIFY itpr_datemodified TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\'' );
6584          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_comments__prerendering
6585              MODIFY cmpr_datemodified TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\'' );
6586          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_messaging__prerendering
6587              MODIFY mspr_datemodified TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\'' );
6588          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_users__reports
6589              MODIFY urep_datetime datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\'' );
6590          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_items__version
6591              MODIFY iver_edit_datetime datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\'' );
6592          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_messaging__thread
6593              MODIFY thrd_datemodified datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\'' );
6594          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_messaging__message
6595              MODIFY msg_datetime datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\'' );
6596          $DB->query( 'ALTER TABLE T_messaging__contact
6597              MODIFY mct_last_contact_datetime datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT \'2000-01-01 00:00:00\'' );
6598          task_end();
6599  
6600          // set_upgrade_checkpoint( '11486' );
6601      }
6602  
6603      /*
6604       * ADD UPGRADES __ABOVE__ IN A NEW UPGRADE BLOCK.
6605       *
6606       * YOU MUST USE:
6607       * task_begin( 'Descriptive text about action...' );
6608       * task_end();
6609       *
6610       * ALL DB CHANGES MUST BE EXPLICITLY CARRIED OUT. DO NOT RELY ON SCHEMA UPDATES!
6611       * Schema updates do not survive after several incremental changes.
6612       *
6613       * NOTE: every change that gets done here, should bump {@link $new_db_version} (by 100).
6614       */
6615  
6616      // Execute general upgrade tasks.
6617      // These tasks needs to be called after every upgrade process, except if they were already executed but the upgrade was not finished because of the max execution time check.
6618      if( param( 'exec_general_tasks', 'boolean', 1 ) )
6619      {    // We haven't executed these general tasks yet:
6620  
6621          // Update modules own b2evo tables
6622          echo "Calling modules for individual upgrades...<br>\n";
6623          evo_flush();
6624          modules_call_method( 'upgrade_b2evo_tables' );
6625  
6626          // Just in case, make sure the db schema version is up to date at the end.
6627          if( $old_db_version != $new_db_version )
6628          { // Update DB schema version to $new_db_version
6629              set_upgrade_checkpoint( $new_db_version );
6630          }
6631  
6632          // We're going to need some environment in order to init caches and create profile picture links...
6633          if( ! is_object( $Settings ) )
6634          { // create Settings object
6635              load_class( 'settings/model/_generalsettings.class.php', 'GeneralSettings' );
6636              $Settings = new GeneralSettings();
6637          }
6638          if( ! is_object( $Plugins ) )
6639          { // create Plugins object
6640              load_class( 'plugins/model/_plugins.class.php', 'Plugins' );
6641              $Plugins = new Plugins();
6642          }
6643  
6644          // Init Caches:
6645          load_funcs('tools/model/_system.funcs.php');
6646          system_init_caches( true, ($old_db_version <= 11410) ); // Only force enabling the caches if we upgrade from a version older or equal to 11410 (6.4.2-beta)
6647          // note: the above outputs messages
6648  
6649          // Check/Repair Caches:
6650          task_begin( 'Checking &amp; repairing caches...' );
6651          load_funcs('tools/model/_system.funcs.php');
6652          // Check all cache folders if exist and work properly. Try to repair cache folders if they aren't ready for operation.
6653          $check_cache_messages = system_check_caches( true );
6654          if( is_array( $check_cache_messages ) && count( $check_cache_messages ) )
6655          { // Display errors of the cache checking
6656              foreach( $check_cache_messages as $check_cache_message )
6657              {
6658                  echo '<br /><span class="text-danger"><evo:error>'.$check_cache_message.'</evo:error></span>';
6659              }
6660              echo '<br />';
6661          }
6662          task_end();
6663  
6664          // Check if profile picture links should be recreated. It won't be executed in each upgrade, but only in those cases when it is required.
6665          // This requires an up to date database, and also $Plugins and $GeneralSettings objects must be initialized before this.
6666          // Note: Check $create_profile_picture_links intialization and usage above to get more information.
6667          if( $create_profile_picture_links )
6668          { // Create links for all files from the users profile_pictures folder
6669              task_begin( 'Creating profile picture links...' );
6670              create_profile_picture_links();
6671              task_end();
6672          }
6673  
6674          // Invalidate all page caches after every upgrade.
6675          // A new version of b2evolution may not use the same links to access special pages.
6676          // We want to play it safe here so that people don't think that upgrading broke their blog!
6677          task_begin( 'Invalidating all page caches to make sure they don\'t contain old action links...' );
6678          invalidate_pagecaches();
6679          task_end();
6680  
6681  
6682          // Reload plugins after every upgrade, to detect even those changes on plugins which didn't require db modifications
6683          task_begin( 'Reloading installed plugins to make sure their config is up to date...' );
6684          $Plugins_admin = & get_Plugins_admin();
6685          $Plugins_admin->reload_plugins();
6686          task_end();
6687  
6688  
6689          // This has to be at the end because plugin install may fail if the DB schema is not current (matching Plugins class).
6690          // Only new default plugins will be installed, based on $old_db_version.
6691          // dh> NOTE: if this fails (e.g. fatal error in one of the plugins), it will not get repeated
6692          task_begin( 'Installing new default plugins (if any)...' );
6693          install_basic_plugins( $old_db_version );
6694          task_end();
6695  
6696          // Create default cron jobs (this can be done at each upgrade):
6697          echo "Checking if some default cron jobs need to be installed...<br/>\n";
6698          evo_flush();
6699          require_once dirname(__FILE__).'/_functions_create.php';
6700          create_default_jobs( true );
6701  
6702          // "Time running low" test: Check if the upgrade script elapsed time is close to the max execution time.
6703          // Note: This should not really happen except the case when many plugins must be installed.
6704          task_begin( 'Checking timing of upgrade...' );
6705          $elapsed_time = time() - $script_start_time;
6706          $max_exe_time = ini_get( 'max_execution_time' );
6707          if( $max_exe_time && ( $elapsed_time > ( $max_exe_time - 20 ) ) )
6708          { // Max exe time not disabled and we're recahing the end
6709              // URL to continue the upgrade process from install folder
6710              $recreate_excerpts = $recreate_autogenerated_excerpts ? '&amp;recreate_excerpts=1' : '';
6711              $upgrade_continue_url = $baseurl.'install/index.php?locale='.$locale.'&amp;action='.$upgrade_action.'&amp;exec_general_tasks=0'.$recreate_excerpts;
6712              echo 'We are reaching the time limit for this script. Please click <a href="'.$upgrade_continue_url.'">continue</a>...';
6713              // Dirty temporary solution:
6714              exit(0);
6715          }
6716          task_end();
6717      }
6718  
6719      if( $recreate_autogenerated_excerpts )
6720      {
6721          if( ! is_object( $Settings ) )
6722          { // create Settings object
6723              load_class( 'settings/model/_generalsettings.class.php', 'GeneralSettings' );
6724              $Settings = new GeneralSettings();
6725          }
6726          if( ! is_object( $Plugins ) )
6727          { // create Plugins object
6728              load_class( 'plugins/model/_plugins.class.php', 'Plugins' );
6729              $Plugins = new Plugins();
6730          }
6731  
6732          task_begin( 'Recreate autogenerated post excerpts...' );
6733          $upgrade_continue_url = $baseurl.'install/index.php?locale='.$locale.'&amp;action='.$upgrade_action.'&amp;exec_general_tasks=0&amp;recreate_excerpts=1';
6734          $all_excerpt = param( 'all_excerpt', 'integer', 0 );
6735          recreate_autogenerated_excerpts( $upgrade_continue_url, $all_excerpt == 0 );
6736          task_end();
6737      }
6738  
6739  
6740      // Update the progress bar status
6741      update_install_progress_bar();
6742  
6743      /*
6744       * -----------------------------------------------
6745       * Check to make sure the DB schema is up to date:
6746       * -----------------------------------------------
6747       */
6748      echo "Starting to check DB...<br/>\n";
6749      evo_flush();
6750  
6751      $upgrade_db_deltas = array(); // This holds changes to make, if any (just all queries)
6752  
6753      global $debug;
6754  
6755      foreach( $schema_queries as $table => $query_info )
6756      {    // For each table in the schema, check diffs...
6757          if( $debug )
6758          {
6759              echo '<br />Checking table: '.$table.': ';
6760          }
6761          $updates = db_delta( $query_info[1], array('drop_column', 'drop_index'), false, true );
6762          if( empty($updates) )
6763          {
6764              if( $debug ) echo 'ok';
6765          }
6766          else
6767          {
6768              if( $debug ) echo 'NEEDS UPDATE!';
6769              foreach( $updates as $table => $queries )
6770              {
6771                  foreach( $queries as $qinfo )
6772                  {
6773                      foreach( $qinfo['queries'] as $query )
6774                      { // subqueries for this query (usually one, but may include required other queries)
6775                          $upgrade_db_deltas[] = $query;
6776                      }
6777                  }
6778              }
6779          }
6780      }
6781  
6782      if( $debug )
6783      {
6784          echo '<br />';
6785      }
6786  
6787      if( empty($upgrade_db_deltas) )
6788      {    // no upgrades needed:
6789          echo '<p>'.T_('The database schema is up to date.').'</p>';
6790      }
6791      else
6792      {    // Upgrades are needed:
6793  
6794          $confirmed_db_upgrade = param('confirmed', 'integer', 0); // force confirmation
6795          $upgrade_db_deltas_confirm_md5 = param( 'upgrade_db_deltas_confirm_md5', 'string', '' );
6796  
6797          if( ! $confirmed_db_upgrade )
6798          {
6799              if( ! empty($upgrade_db_deltas_confirm_md5) )
6800              { // received confirmation from form
6801                  if( $upgrade_db_deltas_confirm_md5 != md5( implode('', $upgrade_db_deltas) ) )
6802                  { // unlikely to happen
6803                      echo '<p class="text-danger"><evo:error>'
6804                          .T_('The DB schema has been changed since confirmation.')
6805                          .'</evo:error></p>';
6806                  }
6807                  else
6808                  {
6809                      $confirmed_db_upgrade = true;
6810                  }
6811              }
6812          }
6813  
6814          if( ! $confirmed_db_upgrade )
6815          {
6816              global $action, $form_action;
6817              load_class( '_core/ui/forms/_form.class.php', 'Form' );
6818  
6819              if( !empty( $form_action ) )
6820              {
6821                  $Form = new Form( $form_action, '', 'post' );
6822              }
6823              else
6824              {
6825                  $Form = new Form( NULL, '', 'post' );
6826              }
6827  
6828              $Form->begin_form( 'fform', T_('Upgrade database') );
6829  
6830              $Form->begin_fieldset();
6831              $Form->hidden( 'upgrade_db_deltas_confirm_md5', md5(implode( '', $upgrade_db_deltas )) );
6832              $Form->hidden( 'action', $action );
6833              $Form->hidden( 'locale', $locale );
6834  
6835  
6836              echo '<p>'.T_('The version number is correct, but we have detected changes in the database schema. This can happen if you\'ve been using development versions directly off GitHub...').'</p>';
6837  
6838              echo '<p>'.T_('The following database changes will be carried out. If you are not sure what this means, it will probably be alright.').'</p>';
6839  
6840              echo '<ul>';
6841              foreach( $upgrade_db_deltas as $l_delta )
6842              {
6843                  #echo '<li><code>'.nl2br($l_delta).'</code></li>';
6844                  echo '<li><pre>'.str_replace( "\t", '  ', $l_delta ).'</pre></li>';
6845              }
6846              echo '</ul>';
6847              $Form->submit( array( '', T_('Try to Repair/Upgrade database now!'), 'btn-warning' ) );
6848              $Form->end_form();
6849  
6850              return 'need-fix';
6851          }
6852  
6853          // Alter DB to match DB schema:
6854          install_make_db_schema_current( true );
6855      }
6856  
6857      // Force MySQL strict mode
6858      $DB->query( 'SET sql_mode = "TRADITIONAL"', 'Force MySQL "strict" mode (and make sure server is not configured with a weird incompatible mode)' );
6859  
6860      track_step( 'upgrade-success' );
6861  
6862      return true;
6863  }
6864  
6865  ?>

title

Description

Body
